1971         if (currentIndexFileFromBranch != null && GrouperInstallerUtils.contentEquals(currentIndexFileFromTag.getFile(), currentIndexFile.getFile())) {
1972           System.out.println("New file is same as old file: " + currentIndexFile.getFile().getAbsolutePath() + ", " 
1973               + currentIndexFileFromTag.getFile().getAbsolutePath());
1974           System.out.println("This file will not be included in patch");
1975           //remove from patch
1976           iterator.remove();
1977         } else {
1978           //add this as an old file
1979           indexFileToOldFile.put(currentIndexFile, currentIndexFileFromTag.getFile());
1980         }
1981       }
1982     }
1983     
1984     if (grouperInstallerIndexFilesToAddToPatch.size() == 0) {
1985       throw new RuntimeException("There are no files to put in patch!");
1986     }
1987     
1988 
1989     //# will show up on screen so user knows what it is
1990     //description = This patch fixes GRP-1080: browse folders refresh button only works in chrome, not other browsers
1991     System.out.print("\nEnter a description for this patch, e.g. GRP-123: fixes a problem with such and such: [required]\n");
1992     String patchDescription = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.patchDescription");
1993     
1994     if (GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(patchDescription)) {
1995       throw new RuntimeException("Cant have a blank description!");
1996     }
1997 
1998     //# (note, will try to get this from patch description, if its there, this can be blank)
1999     Matcher patchJiraKeyMatcher = Pattern.compile(".*(GRP-\\d+).*").matcher(patchDescription);
2000     String defaultPatchJiraKey = "";
2001     if (patchJiraKeyMatcher.matches()) {
2002       defaultPatchJiraKey = patchJiraKeyMatcher.group(1);
2003     }
2004     System.out.print("\nEnter a Jira key (e.g. GRP-123) for this patch: [required] " 
2005         + (GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(defaultPatchJiraKey) ? "" : ("[" + defaultPatchJiraKey + "]")) + "\n");
2006     String patchJiraKey = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.patchJiraKey");
2007     
2008     if (GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(patchJiraKey)) {
2009       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(defaultPatchJiraKey)) {
2010         patchJiraKey = defaultPatchJiraKey;
2011       } else {
2012         throw new RuntimeException("Cant have a blank jira key!");
2013       }
2014     }
2015     
2016     if (!Pattern.compile("^GRP-\\d+$").matcher(patchJiraKey).matches()) {
2017       throw new RuntimeException("Patch jira key must be valid: '" + patchJiraKey + "'");
2018     }
2019 
2020     String patchRiskLevel = null;
2021     
2022     {
2023       //# low, medium, or high risk to applying the patch
2024       //risk = low
2025       System.out.println("Enter the risk level for the patch: (low|medium|high): [required] ");
2026       String patchRiskLevelInput = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.patchRiskLevel");
2027       
2028       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.equalsIgnoreCase("low", patchRiskLevelInput)) {
2029         patchRiskLevel = "low";
2030       } else if (GrouperInstallerUtils.equalsIgnoreCase("medium", patchRiskLevelInput)) {
2031         patchRiskLevel = "medium";
2032       } else if (GrouperInstallerUtils.equalsIgnoreCase("high", patchRiskLevelInput)) {
2033         patchRiskLevel = "high";
2034       } else {
2035         throw new RuntimeException("Invalid risk level: '" + patchRiskLevelInput + "', expecting low|medium|high");
2036       }
2037       
2038     }
2039     
2040     //# is this is a security patch (true or false)
2041     //security = false
2042     System.out.println("Is this a security patch? (t|f): [t] ");
2043     boolean securityPatch = readFromStdInBoolean(false, "grouperInstaller.autorun.patchSecurity");
2044 
2045     boolean requiresRestart = false;
2046     for (GrouperInstallerIndexFile currentIndexFile : grouperInstallerIndexFilesToAddToPatch) {
2047       if (currentIndexFile.getSimpleName().endsWith(".jar")
2048           || currentIndexFile.getSimpleName().endsWith(".java")) {
2049         requiresRestart = true;
2050       }
2051     }
2052     //# if this patch requires restart of processes (true or false)
2053     //requiresRestart = false
2054     if (requiresRestart) {
2055       System.out.println("It is detected that your patch requires restart");
2056     } else {
2057       System.out.println("It is NOT detected that your patch requires restart, please confirm this, does it require restart (t|f)? [f] ");
2058       requiresRestart = readFromStdInBoolean(false, "grouperInstaller.autorun.overrideDoesntRequireRestart");
2059       
2060       if (requiresRestart) {
2061         System.out.println("Perhaps the maintainer of the Grouper Installer can use this feedback to make a better guess on restart, let them know");
2062         GrouperInstallerUtils.sleep(2000);
2063       }
2064     }
2065     //at this point we can build the patch dir and file and put files in there
2066     
2067     //# patches that this patch is dependant on (comma separated)
2068     //dependencies = 
2069 
2070     //create the dir
2071     GrouperInstallerUtils.mkdirs(patchDir);
2072     
2073     {
2074       String patchPropertiesContents = "# will show up on screen so user knows what it is\n"
2075           + "description = " + patchDescription + "\n"
2076           + "\n"
2077           + "# patches that this patch is dependant on (comma separated)\n"
2078           + "dependencies = " + GrouperInstallerUtils.join(dependencyPatchNames.iterator(), ", ") + "\n"
2079           + "\n"
2080           + "# low, medium, or high risk to applying the patch\n"
2081           + "risk = " + patchRiskLevel + "\n"
2082           + "\n"
2083           + "# is this is a security patch (true or false)\n"
2084           + "security = " + securityPatch + "\n"
2085           + "\n"
2086           + "# if this patch requires restart of processes (true or false)\n"
2087           + "requiresRestart = " + requiresRestart + "\n";
2088       String patchPropertiesFileName = patchDir + File.separator + patchDir.getName() + ".properties";
2089       GrouperInstallerUtils.saveStringIntoFile(new File(patchPropertiesFileName), patchPropertiesContents);
2090     }
2091     
2092     //lets do old files
2093     //start with old files
2094     if (indexFileToOldFile.size() > 0) {
2095       GrouperInstallerUtils.mkdirs(new File(patchDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "old"));
2096       for (GrouperInstallerIndexFile currentIndexFile : indexFileToOldFile.keySet()) {
2097 
2098         File oldFile = new File(patchDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "old" + File.separator
2099             + currentIndexFile.getPatchFileType().getDirName() + File.separator
2100             + GrouperInstallerUtils.replace(currentIndexFile.getRelativePath(), "/", File.separator));
2101         
2102         GrouperInstallerUtils.mkdirs(oldFile.getParentFile());
2103         
2104         System.out.println("Copying old file from " + indexFileToOldFile.get(currentIndexFile).getAbsolutePath()
2105             + "\n   to: " + oldFile.getAbsolutePath());
2106         
2107         GrouperInstallerUtils.copyFile(indexFileToOldFile.get(currentIndexFile), oldFile);
2108         
2109       }
2110     }
2111 
2112     //now put new files in place
2113     {
2114       GrouperInstallerUtils.mkdirs(new File(patchDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "new"));
2115       for (GrouperInstallerIndexFile currentIndexFile : grouperInstallerIndexFilesToAddToPatch) {
2116 
2117         //is it a delete? then there is no new file
2118         if (!indexOfFiles.containsKey(currentIndexFile.getRelativePath())) {
2119           continue;
2120         }
2121         
2122         File newFile = new File(patchDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "new" + File.separator
2123             + currentIndexFile.getPatchFileType().getDirName() + File.separator
2124             + GrouperInstallerUtils.replace(currentIndexFile.getRelativePath(), "/", File.separator));
2125         
2126         GrouperInstallerUtils.mkdirs(newFile.getParentFile());
2127         
2128         System.out.println("Copying new file from " + currentIndexFile.getFile().getAbsolutePath()
2129             + "\n   to: " + newFile.getAbsolutePath());
2130         
2131         GrouperInstallerUtils.copyFile(currentIndexFile.getFile().getAbsoluteFile(), newFile);
2132         
2133       }
2134     }
2135 
2136     {
2137       //generate the wiki markup
2138       //    <tr>
2139       //      <td>
2140       //        <p>
2141       //          <a href="https://software.internet2.edu/grouper/release/2.2.1/patches/grouper_v2_2_1_api_patch_1.tar.gz">grouper_v2_2_1_api_patch_1</a>
2142       //        </p>
2143       //      </td>
2144       //      <td>
2145       //        <p>
2146       //          <a href="https://bugs.internet2.edu/jira/browse/GRP-1096">GRP-1096: Use threads for 2.2 upgrade to decrease time of upgrade</a>
2147       //        </p>
2148       //      </td>
2149       //      <td>
2150       //        <p>classes/edu/internet2/middleware/grouper/internal/dao/hib3/Hib3StemSetDAO.java <br class="atl-forced-newline"/> classes/edu/internet2/middleware/grouper/misc/MigrateLegacyAttributes.java <br class="atl-forced-newline"/> classes/edu/internet2/middleware/grouper/misc/AddMissingGroupSets.java <br class="atl-forced-newline"/> classes/edu/internet2/middleware/grouper/misc/SyncPITTables.java <br class="atl-forced-newline"/> classes/edu/internet2/middleware/grouper/misc/SyncStemSets.java <br class="atl-forced-newline"/> classes/grouper.base.properties</p>
2151       //      </td>
2152       //    </tr>
2153       String grouperVersion = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("grouper.version", true);
2154 
2155       String wikiMarkup = "    <tr>\n"
2156         + "      <td>\n"
2157         + "        <p>\n"
2158         + "          <a href=\"https://software.internet2.edu/grouper/release/" + grouperVersion + "/patches/" + patchName + ".tar.gz\">" + patchName + "</a>\n"
2159         + "        </p>\n"
2160         + "      </td>\n"
2161         + "      <td>\n"
2162         + "        <p>\n"
2163         + "          <a href=\"https://bugs.internet2.edu/jira/browse/" + patchJiraKey + "\">" + patchDescription + "</a>\n"
2164         + "        </p>\n"
2165         + "      </td>\n"
2166         + "      <td>\n"
2167         + "        <p>";
2168       
2169       boolean isFirst = true;
2170       for (GrouperInstallerIndexFile currentIndexFile : grouperInstallerIndexFilesToAddToPatch) {
2171         
2172         //just do java files
2173         if (currentIndexFile.getSimpleName().endsWith(".class")) {
2174           continue;
2175         }
2176         
2177         //classes/edu/internet2/middleware/grouper/internal/dao/hib3/Hib3StemSetDAO.java 
2178         //<br class=\"atl-forced-newline\"/>
2179 
2180         if (!isFirst) {
2181           wikiMarkup += "<br class=\"atl-forced-newline\"/>";
2182         }
2183         wikiMarkup += currentIndexFile.getPatchFileType().getDirName() + "/" 
2184             + currentIndexFile.getRelativePath();
2185 
2186         isFirst = false;
2187         
2188       }
2189       wikiMarkup += "</p>\n      </td>\n"
2190         + "    </tr>\n";
2191     
2192       System.out.println("Here is the wiki markup for the release notes page, copy and paste that into confluence using the <> button:");
2193       System.out.println("\n" + wikiMarkup + "\n");
2194       System.out.println("Press <enter> to continue.");
2195       readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.patchContinueAfterWikiMarkup");
2196     }
2197     
2198     // tar this up
2199     File tarfile = new File(patchDir.getParentFile() + File.separator + patchName + ".tar");
2200     GrouperInstallerUtils.tar(patchDir, tarfile);
2201     
2202     System.out.println("\nDo you want to name this file as a test version so you can test it without affecting other users? (t|f) [t]: ");
2203     boolean patchUseTestFileName = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.patchNameFileAsTestVersion");
2204 
2205     File gzipfile = new File(patchDir.getParentFile() + File.separator + patchName + (patchUseTestFileName ? "_test" : "") + ".tar.gz");
2206     GrouperInstallerUtils.gzip(tarfile, gzipfile);
2207 
2208     System.out.println("\nSUCCESS: your patch is here: " + gzipfile.getAbsolutePath());
2209 
2210   }
2211 
2212   /**
2213    * patch pattern
2214    */
2215   private static final Pattern patchNamePattern = Pattern.compile("^grouper_v(\\d+)_(\\d+)_(\\d+)_(api|ws|ui|psp|pspng)_patch_\\d+$");
2216 
2217   
2218   /**
2219    * see if valid patch name e.g. grouper_v2_2_1_api_patch_0
2220    * @param patchName
2221    * @return true for valid
2222    */
2223   private static boolean patchNameValid(String patchName) {
2224     //validate patch names
2225     return patchNamePattern.matcher(patchName).matches();
2226 
2227   }
2228   
2229   /**
2230    * index files from a source directory
2231    * @param theIndexOfFiles index of label to the index file object
2232    * @param theSourceDir to look for files in
2233    * @param thePspSourceDir is psp source dir to look for files in
2234    */
2235   private void patchCreateIndexFiles(Map<String, GrouperInstallerIndexFile> theIndexOfFiles, File theSourceDir, File thePspSourceDir) {
2236     System.out.println("\nCreating file index to make patches from " + theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + "...\n");
2237     
2238     switch(this.appToUpgrade) {
2239       case CLIENT:
2240         throw new RuntimeException("No patching client, patch API instead");
2241       case API:
2242 
2243         //index the subject API
2244 // dont think we need lib from subject, only api
2245 //        this.patchCreateProcessFiles(indexOfFiles, 
2246 //            new File(sourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "subject"),
2247 //            new File(sourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "subject" + File.separator + "lib"),
2248 //            PatchFileType.lib);
2249 
2250         this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2251             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "subject"),
2252             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "subject" + File.separator + "dist" + File.separator + "build"),
2253             PatchFileType.clazz);
2254 
2255         this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2256             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "subject"),
2257             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "subject" + File.separator + "src"),
2258             PatchFileType.clazz);
2259 
2260         this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2261             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "subject"),
2262             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "subject" + File.separator + "conf"),
2263             PatchFileType.clazz);
2264 
2265         //index the grouper client
2266 // dont think we need lib from client, only api
2267 //        this.patchCreateProcessFiles(indexOfFiles, 
2268 //            new File(sourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-misc" + File.separator + "grouperClient"),
2269 //            new File(sourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-misc" + File.separator + "grouperClient" + File.separator + "lib"),
2270 //            PatchFileType.lib);
2271 
2272         this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2273             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-misc" + File.separator + "grouperClient"),
2274             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-misc" + File.separator + "grouperClient" 
2275                 + File.separator + "dist" + File.separator + "bin"),
2276             PatchFileType.clazz);
2277 
2278         this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2279             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-misc" + File.separator + "grouperClient"),
2280             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-misc" + File.separator + "grouperClient" 
2281                 + File.separator + "src" + File.separator + "java"),
2282             PatchFileType.clazz);
2283 
2284         this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2285             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-misc" + File.separator + "grouperClient"),
2286             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-misc" + File.separator + "grouperClient" 
2287                 + File.separator + "src" + File.separator + "ext"),
2288             PatchFileType.clazz);
2289 
2290         this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2291             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-misc" + File.separator + "grouperClient"),
2292             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-misc" + File.separator + "grouperClient" 
2293                 + File.separator + "conf"),
2294             PatchFileType.clazz);
2295 
2296         //add grouper api files
2297         this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2298             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper"),
2299             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper" + File.separator + "lib"),
2300             PatchFileType.lib);
2301 
2302         this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2303             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper"),
2304             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper" + File.separator + "dist" 
2305                 + File.separator + "build" + File.separator + "grouper"),
2306             PatchFileType.clazz);
2307 
2308         this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2309             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper"),
2310             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper" + File.separator + "conf"),
2311             PatchFileType.clazz);
2312 
2313         this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2314             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper"),
2315             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper" + File.separator + "src" 
2316                 + File.separator + "grouper"),
2317             PatchFileType.clazz);
2318 
2319         break;
2320       case UI:
2321         
2322         this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2323             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-ui"),
2324             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-ui" 
2325                 + File.separator + "java" + File.separator + "lib"),
2326             PatchFileType.lib);
2327         
2328         this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2329             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-ui"),
2330             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-ui" 
2331                 + File.separator + "java" + File.separator + "src"),
2332             PatchFileType.clazz);
2333         
2334         this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2335             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-ui"),
2336             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-ui" 
2337                 + File.separator + "conf"),
2338             PatchFileType.clazz);
2339         
2340         this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2341             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-ui"),
2342             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-ui" 
2343                 + File.separator + "temp" + File.separator + "jarBin"),
2344             PatchFileType.clazz);
2345         
2346         this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2347             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-ui"),
2348             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-ui" 
2349                 + File.separator + "webapp"),
2350             PatchFileType.file);
2351         
2352         break;
2353       case WS:
2354         
2355         this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2356             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-ws" + File.separator + "grouper-ws"),
2357             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-ws" + File.separator + "grouper-ws" 
2358                 + File.separator + "lib" + File.separator + "grouper-ws"),
2359             PatchFileType.lib);
2360 
2361         this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2362             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-ws" + File.separator + "grouper-ws"),
2363             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-ws" + File.separator + "grouper-ws" 
2364                 + File.separator + "lib" + File.separator + "rampart"),
2365             PatchFileType.lib);
2366 
2367         this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2368             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-ws" + File.separator + "grouper-ws"),
2369             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-ws" + File.separator + "grouper-ws" 
2370                 + File.separator + "build" + File.separator + "grouper-ws"),
2371             PatchFileType.clazz);
2372         
2373         this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2374             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-ws" + File.separator + "grouper-ws"),
2375             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-ws" + File.separator + "grouper-ws" 
2376                 + File.separator + "conf"),
2377             PatchFileType.clazz);
2378         
2379         // we need to get all the source folders except test, note, each release adds another
2380         File parentSourceDir = new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-ws" + File.separator + "grouper-ws"
2381             + File.separator + "src");
2382 
2383         for (File wsSourceDir : parentSourceDir.listFiles()) {
2384           if (wsSourceDir.isFile() || !wsSourceDir.getName().startsWith("grouper")) {
2385             continue;
2386           }
2387           this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2388               new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-ws" + File.separator + "grouper-ws"),
2389               new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-ws" + File.separator + "grouper-ws" 
2390                   + File.separator + "src" + File.separator + wsSourceDir.getName()),
2391               PatchFileType.clazz);
2392         }
2393 
2394         //files
2395         this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2396             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-ws" + File.separator + "grouper-ws"),
2397             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-ws" + File.separator + "grouper-ws" 
2398                 + File.separator + "webapp"),
2399             PatchFileType.file);
2400         
2401         break;
2402         
2403       case PSP:
2404         this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2405             new File(thePspSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "psp"),
2406             new File(thePspSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "psp" + File.separator + "target" 
2407                 + File.separator + "dependency"),
2408             PatchFileType.lib);
2409         this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2410             new File(thePspSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "psp"),
2411             new File(thePspSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "psp" + File.separator + "src" 
2412                 + File.separator + "main" + File.separator + "java"),
2413             PatchFileType.clazz);
2414         this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2415             new File(thePspSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "psp"),
2416             new File(thePspSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "psp" + File.separator + "src" 
2417                 + File.separator + "main" + File.separator + "resources"),
2418             PatchFileType.clazz);
2419         this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2420             new File(thePspSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "psp"),
2421             new File(thePspSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "psp" + File.separator + "target" 
2422                 + File.separator + "classes"),
2423             PatchFileType.clazz);
2424 
2425         break;
2426       case PSPNG:
2427 
2428         this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2429             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-misc" + File.separator + "grouper-pspng"),
2430             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-misc" + File.separator + "grouper-pspng" 
2431                 + File.separator + "target" + File.separator + "dependency"),
2432             PatchFileType.lib);
2433 
2434         this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2435             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-misc" + File.separator + "grouper-pspng"),
2436             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-misc" + File.separator + "grouper-pspng" 
2437                 + File.separator + "src" + File.separator + "main" + File.separator + "java"),
2438             PatchFileType.clazz);
2439 
2440         this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2441             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-misc" + File.separator + "grouper-pspng"),
2442             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-misc" + File.separator + "grouper-pspng" 
2443                 + File.separator + "target" + File.separator + "classes"),
2444             PatchFileType.clazz);
2445 
2446         break;
2447     }
2448     
2449     //print out files for debugging
2450     //for (String key : theIndexOfFiles.keySet()) {
2451     //  if (key.toLowerCase().contains("mygroupsmemberships")) {
2452     //    System.out.println(key + " -> " + theIndexOfFiles.get(key));
2453     //  }
2454     //}
2455 
2456     System.out.println("\nDone creating file index to make patches from " + theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + "... found " + theIndexOfFiles.size() + " files\n");
2457 
2458   }
2459   
2460   /**
2461    * @param directory to look in
2462    * @param projectDirectory is the directory where the project is for the files
2463    * @param indexOfFiles the index
2464    * @param patchFileType
2465    */
2466   private void patchCreateProcessFiles(Map<String, GrouperInstallerIndexFile> indexOfFiles, File projectDirectory, File directory, 
2467       PatchFileType patchFileType) {
2468     
2469     this.patchCreateProcessFilesHelper(indexOfFiles, projectDirectory, directory, patchFileType, "");
2470 
2471   }
2472 
2473   /**
2474    * @param directory to look in
2475    * @param projectDirectory is the directory where the project is for the files
2476    * @param indexOfFiles
2477    * @param relativePath in the main path to look in, helps with restrictions
2478    * @param patchFileType
2479    */
2480   private void patchCreateProcessFilesHelper(Map<String, GrouperInstallerIndexFile> indexOfFiles, 
2481       File projectDirectory, File directory, 
2482       PatchFileType patchFileType, String relativePath) {
2483 
2484     try {
2485       //lets spider through directory and add files to index
2486       //get the files into a vector
2487       File[] allFiles = directory.listFiles();
2488   
2489       //loop through the array
2490       for (int i = 0; i < allFiles.length; i++) {
2491   
2492         File currentFileOrDirectory = allFiles[i];
2493         
2494         if (-1 < currentFileOrDirectory.getName().indexOf("..")) {
2495           continue; //dont go to the parent directory
2496         }
2497   
2498         //go to sub directory
2499         String newRelativePath = GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(relativePath) ? currentFileOrDirectory.getName() 
2500             : (relativePath + "/" + currentFileOrDirectory.getName());
2501   
2502         if (currentFileOrDirectory.isFile()) {
2503   
2504           boolean addFile = false;
2505           
2506           String fileRelativePath = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileRelativePath(projectDirectory, currentFileOrDirectory);
2507   
2508           switch(patchFileType) {
2509   
2510             case lib:
2511               
2512               if (currentFileOrDirectory.getName().endsWith(".jar")) {
2513                 addFile = true;
2514               }
2515   
2516               break;
2517             case file:
2518               addFile = true;
2519               
2520               if (currentFileOrDirectory.getName().endsWith(".jar")) {
2521                 addFile = false;
2522               }
2523   
2524               if (currentFileOrDirectory.getName().endsWith(".class")) {
2525                 addFile = false;
2526               }
2527   
2528               if (currentFileOrDirectory.getName().endsWith(".java")) {
2529                 addFile = false;
2530               }
2531   
2532               //these are classes not files
2533               if (GrouperInstallerUtils.filePathStartsWith(fileRelativePath,"WEB-INF/classes")) {
2534                 addFile = false;
2535               }
2536   
2537               //these are libs not files
2538               if (GrouperInstallerUtils.filePathStartsWith(fileRelativePath,"WEB-INF/lib")) {
2539                 addFile = false;
2540               }
2541   
2542               break;
2543             default: 
2544               addFile = true;
2545           }
2546   
2547           if (addFile) {
2548             GrouperInstallerIndexFile grouperInstallerIndexFile = new GrouperInstallerIndexFile();
2549             grouperInstallerIndexFile.setSimpleName(currentFileOrDirectory.getName());
2550             grouperInstallerIndexFile.setRelativePath(newRelativePath);
2551             grouperInstallerIndexFile.setFile(currentFileOrDirectory);
2552             grouperInstallerIndexFile.setPatchFileType(patchFileType);
2553             grouperInstallerIndexFile.setPath(fileRelativePath);
2554             
2555             //add by name
2556             if (patchCreateAddFileToIndex(indexOfFiles, grouperInstallerIndexFile, currentFileOrDirectory.getName())) {
2557               //different file
2558               indexOfFiles.get(currentFileOrDirectory.getName()).setHasMultipleFilesBySimpleName(true);
2559               System.out.println("Note: duplicate file by name: " + currentFileOrDirectory.getAbsolutePath());
2560             }
2561             
2562             //add by relative path
2563             if (patchCreateAddFileToIndex(indexOfFiles, grouperInstallerIndexFile, newRelativePath)) {
2564               //different file
2565               indexOfFiles.get(currentFileOrDirectory.getName()).setHasMultipleFilesByRelativePath(true);
2566               System.out.println("Note: duplicate file by relative path: " + currentFileOrDirectory.getAbsolutePath());
2567             }
2568   
2569             //add by path
2570             if (patchCreateAddFileToIndex(indexOfFiles, grouperInstallerIndexFile, grouperInstallerIndexFile.getPath())) {
2571               //different file
2572               indexOfFiles.get(currentFileOrDirectory.getName()).setHasMultipleFilesByPath(true);
2573               System.out.println("Note: duplicate file by path: " + currentFileOrDirectory.getAbsolutePath());
2574             }
2575           }
2576           
2577         } else {
2578                   
2579           patchCreateProcessFilesHelper(indexOfFiles, projectDirectory, currentFileOrDirectory, patchFileType, newRelativePath);
2580           
2581         }
2582       }
2583     } catch (Exception e) {
2584       throw new RuntimeException("Problem with directory: " + directory.getAbsolutePath(), e);
2585     }
2586     
2587   }
2588 
2589   /**
2590    * @param indexOfFiles database of files by various lookup names
2591    * @param grouperInstallerIndexFile file to add
2592    * @param key add by this key
2593    * @return true if file already there and different
2594    */
2595   private boolean patchCreateAddFileToIndex(Map<String, GrouperInstallerIndexFile> indexOfFiles, 
2596       GrouperInstallerIndexFile grouperInstallerIndexFile, String key) {
2597     
2598     //convert slashes on key
2599     key = key.replace('\\', '/');
2600     
2601     GrouperInstallerIndexFile currentFileInIndex = indexOfFiles.get(key);
2602     if (currentFileInIndex == null) {
2603       indexOfFiles.put(key, grouperInstallerIndexFile);
2604     } else {
2605       //skip these, who cares, too many dupes
2606       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(grouperInstallerIndexFile.getSimpleName(), "package-info.java")
2607           && !GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(grouperInstallerIndexFile.getSimpleName(), "package.html")) {
2608         if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(grouperInstallerIndexFile.computeSha1(), currentFileInIndex.computeSha1())) {
2609           return true;
2610         }
2611       }
2612     }
2613     return false;
2614   }
2615   
2616   /**
2617    * build PSP
2618    * @param pspDir
2619    */
2620   private void buildPsp(File pspDir) {
2621     if (!pspDir.exists() || pspDir.isFile()) {
2622       throw new RuntimeException("Cant find psp: " + pspDir.getAbsolutePath());
2623     }
2624     
2625     File pspBuildToDir = new File(pspDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "psp" 
2626         + File.separator + "target" + File.separator + "classes");
2627     
2628     boolean rebuildPsp = true;
2629     
2630     if (pspBuildToDir.exists()) {
2631       System.out.print("The PSP has been built in the past, do you want it rebuilt? (t|f) [t]: ");
2632       rebuildPsp = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.rebuildPspAfterHavingBeenBuilt");
2633     }
2634     
2635     if (!rebuildPsp) {
2636       return;
2637     }
2638     
2639     List<String> commands = new ArrayList<String>();
2640     
2641 //    \bin\mvn compile -DskipTests
2642     addMavenCommands(commands);
2643 
2644     //put 'compile -DskipTests' in there so it wont run tests which we dont want to do
2645     // dependency:copy-dependencies package -DskipTests
2646     //not compile
2647     commands.add("dependency:copy-dependencies");
2648     commands.add("package");
2649     commands.add("-DskipTests");
2650     commands.add("-Drat.ignoreErrors=true");
2651     commands.add("-Dlicense.skip=true");
2652     
2653     System.out.println("\n##################################");
2654     System.out.println("Building PSP with command:\n" + pspDir.getAbsolutePath() + "> " 
2655         + convertCommandsIntoCommand(commands) + "\n");
2656     
2657     CommandResult commandResult = GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(GrouperInstallerUtils.toArray(commands, String.class),
2658         true, true, null, new File(pspDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "psp-parent"), null, true);
2659     
2660     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getErrorText())) {
2661       System.out.println("stderr: " + commandResult.getErrorText());
2662     }
2663     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getOutputText())) {
2664       System.out.println("stdout: " + commandResult.getOutputText());
2665     }
2666 
2667     System.out.println("\nEnd building PSP");
2668     System.out.println("##################################\n");
2669     
2670   }
2671 
2672   /**
2673    * build grouper API
2674    * @param grouperApiDir
2675    */
2676   private void buildGrouperApi(File grouperApiDir) {
2677 
2678     if (!grouperApiDir.exists() || grouperApiDir.isFile()) {
2679       throw new RuntimeException("Cant find grouper api: " + grouperApiDir.getAbsolutePath());
2680     }
2681     
2682     File grouperBuildToDir = new File(grouperApiDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "dist" + File.separator + "build" 
2683         + File.separator + "grouper");
2684     
2685     boolean rebuildGrouperApi = true;
2686     
2687     if (grouperBuildToDir.exists()) {
2688       System.out.print("The Grouper API has been built in the past, do you want it rebuilt? (t|f) [t]: ");
2689       rebuildGrouperApi = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.rebuildGrouperApiAfterHavingBeenBuilt");
2690     }
2691     
2692     if (!rebuildGrouperApi) {
2693       return;
2694     }
2695     
2696     List<String> commands = new ArrayList<String>();
2697     
2698     addAntCommands(commands);
2699 
2700     //this will run tests which we dont want to do
2701     commands.add("dist");
2702     
2703     System.out.println("\n##################################");
2704     System.out.println("Building grouper API with command:\n" + grouperApiDir.getAbsolutePath() + "> " 
2705         + convertCommandsIntoCommand(commands) + "\n");
2706     
2707     CommandResult commandResult = GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(GrouperInstallerUtils.toArray(commands, String.class),
2708         true, true, null, grouperApiDir, null, true);
2709     
2710     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getErrorText())) {
2711       System.out.println("stderr: " + commandResult.getErrorText());
2712     }
2713     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getOutputText())) {
2714       System.out.println("stdout: " + commandResult.getOutputText());
2715     }
2716 
2717     System.out.println("\nEnd building grouper API");
2718     System.out.println("##################################\n");
2719     
2720   }
2721   
2722 
2723 
2724   /**
2725    * build subject API
2726    * @param subjectApiDir
2727    */
2728   private void buildSubjectApi(File subjectApiDir) {
2729     if (!subjectApiDir.exists() || subjectApiDir.isFile()) {
2730       throw new RuntimeException("Cant find subject api: " + subjectApiDir.getAbsolutePath());
2731     }
2732     
2733     File subjectBuildToDir = new File(subjectApiDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "dist" + File.separator + "build");
2734     
2735     boolean rebuildSubject = true;
2736     
2737     if (subjectBuildToDir.exists()) {
2738       System.out.print("The Grouper subject API has been built in the past, do you want it rebuilt? (t|f) [t]: ");
2739       rebuildSubject = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.rebuildSubjectApiAfterHavingBeenBuilt");
2740     }
2741     
2742     if (!rebuildSubject) {
2743       return;
2744     }
2745     
2746     List<String> commands = new ArrayList<String>();
2747     
2748     addAntCommands(commands);
2749 
2750     //put 'compile' in there so it wont run tests which we dont want to do
2751     commands.add("compile");
2752     
2753     System.out.println("\n##################################");
2754     System.out.println("Building subject API with command:\n" + subjectApiDir.getAbsolutePath() + "> " 
2755         + convertCommandsIntoCommand(commands) + "\n");
2756     
2757     CommandResult commandResult = GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(GrouperInstallerUtils.toArray(commands, String.class),
2758         true, true, null, subjectApiDir, null, true);
2759     
2760     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getErrorText())) {
2761       System.out.println("stderr: " + commandResult.getErrorText());
2762     }
2763     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getOutputText())) {
2764       System.out.println("stdout: " + commandResult.getOutputText());
2765     }
2766 
2767     System.out.println("\nEnd building subject API");
2768     System.out.println("##################################\n");
2769     
2770     
2771     
2772   }
2773   
2774 
2775   /**
2776    * build client API
2777    * @param clientDir
2778    */
2779   private void buildClient(File clientDir) {
2780     if (!clientDir.exists() || clientDir.isFile()) {
2781       throw new RuntimeException("Cant find client: " + clientDir.getAbsolutePath());
2782     }
2783     
2784     File clientBuildToDir = new File(clientDir.getAbsoluteFile() + File.separator + "dist" + File.separator + "bin");
2785     
2786     boolean rebuildClient = true;
2787     
2788     if (clientBuildToDir.exists()) {
2789       System.out.print("The Grouper client has been built in the past, do you want it rebuilt? (t|f) [t]: ");
2790       rebuildClient = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.rebuildClientAfterHavingBeenBuilt");
2791     }
2792     
2793     if (!rebuildClient) {
2794       return;
2795     }
2796 
2797     List<String> commands = new ArrayList<String>();
2798     
2799     addAntCommands(commands);
2800     
2801     System.out.println("\n##################################");
2802     System.out.println("Building client with command:\n" + clientDir.getAbsolutePath() + "> " 
2803         + convertCommandsIntoCommand(commands) + "\n");
2804     
2805     CommandResult commandResult = GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(GrouperInstallerUtils.toArray(commands, String.class),
2806         true, true, null, clientDir, null, true);
2807     
2808     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getErrorText())) {
2809       System.out.println("stderr: " + commandResult.getErrorText());
2810     }
2811     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getOutputText())) {
2812       System.out.println("stdout: " + commandResult.getOutputText());
2813     }
2814 
2815     System.out.println("\nEnd building client");
2816     System.out.println("##################################\n");
2817     
2818   }
2819 
2820   /**
2821    * admin
2822    */
2823   private void mainAdminLogic() {
2824     
2825     this.version = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("grouper.version", true);
2826     
2827     GrouperInstallerAdminAction grouperInstallerMiscAction = null;
2828     
2829     for (int i=0;i<10;i++) {
2830       //what do we want to do, install, revert, or get status?
2831       System.out.print("What admin action do you want to do (manage, upgradeTask)? : ");
2832       String adminAction = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.adminAction");
2833       try {
2834         grouperInstallerMiscAction = GrouperInstallerAdminAction.valueOfIgnoreCase(adminAction, false, true);
2835         if (grouperInstallerMiscAction != null) {
2836           break;
2837         }
2838       } catch (Exception e) {
2839         //ignore, let user try again
2840       }
2841     }
2842     
2843     switch(grouperInstallerMiscAction) {
2844       case manage:
2845         mainManageLogic();
2846         break;
2847 
2848       case upgradeTask:
2849         mainUpgradeTaskLogic();
2850         break;
2851     }
2852         
2853   }
2854 
2855   /**
2856    * admin manage
2857    */
2858   private void mainManageLogic() {
2859     
2860     //####################################
2861     //Find out what directory to install to.  This ends in a file separator
2862     this.grouperInstallDirectoryString = grouperInstallDirectory();
2863 
2864     GrouperInstallerManageAction grouperInstallerManageAction = null;
2865 
2866     while (true) {
2867       for (int i=0;i<10;i++) {
2868         System.out.print("What do you want to manage (logs, services, back, exit)? : ");
2869         String manageAction = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.manageAction");
2870         try {
2871           grouperInstallerManageAction = GrouperInstallerManageAction.valueOfIgnoreCase(manageAction, false, true);
2872           if (grouperInstallerManageAction != null) {
2873             break;
2874           }
2875         } catch (Exception e) {
2876           //ignore, let user try again
2877         }
2878       }
2879       switch(grouperInstallerManageAction) {
2880         case logs:
2881       
2882           adminManageLogs();
2883   
2884           break;
2885         case services:
2886 
2887           adminManageServices();
2888           
2889           break;
2890         case exit:
2891           
2892           System.exit(0);
2893           
2894           break;
2895         case back:
2896           
2897           this.mainAdminLogic();
2898   
2899           break;
2900       }
2901     }
2902   }
2903 
2904   /**
2905    * try 10 times to get enum
2906    * @param prompt
2907    * @param configKey
2908    * @param theClass
2909    * @return the object
2910    */
2911   public static Object promptForEnum(String prompt, String configKey, Class<?> theClass) {
2912     for (int i=0;i<10;i++) {
2913       System.out.print(prompt);
2914       String input = readFromStdIn(configKey);
2915       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(input)) {
2916         System.out.println("Input is required");
2917         continue;
2918       }
2919 
2920       //call a static method via reflection
2921       Object result = GrouperInstallerUtils.callMethod(theClass, null, "valueOfIgnoreCase",
2922           new Object[]{String.class, boolean.class, boolean.class}, new Object[]{input, false, false});
2923       if (result != null) {
2924         return result;
2925       }
2926     }
2927     throw new RuntimeException("Cant find valid answer!!!!");
2928   }
2929   
2930   /**
2931    * 
2932    */
2933   private void adminManageServices() {
2934     
2935     //see what we are upgrading: api, ui, ws, client
2936     GrouperInstallerAdminManageService grouperInstallerAdminManageService = 
2937         (GrouperInstallerAdminManageService)promptForEnum(
2938             "What service do you want to manage?  database, tomcat, grouperDaemon? : ",
2939             "grouperInstaller.autorun.serviceToManage", GrouperInstallerAdminManageService.class);
2940 
2941     GrouperInstallerAdminManageServiceAction grouperInstallerAdminManageServiceAction = 
2942         (GrouperInstallerAdminManageServiceAction)promptForEnum(
2943             "What " + grouperInstallerAdminManageService + " action do you want to perform?  stop, start, restart, status? : ",
2944             "grouperInstaller.autorun.serviceToManageAction", GrouperInstallerAdminManageServiceAction.class);
2945 
2946     switch (grouperInstallerAdminManageService) {
2947       case daemon:
2948       
2949         System.out.println("In unix you should have a /etc/init.d script which manages the grouper daemon (see details on wiki).");
2950 
2951         //appadmin 14477     1  0 01:24 pts/0    00:00:00 /bin/sh /opt/tomcats/tomcat_d_gsh/webapps/grouper_v2_2/WEB-INF/bin/gsh -loader
2952         //appadmin 14478 14477 92 01:24 pts/0    00:00:03 /opt/java6/bin/java -Xms64m -Xmx750m -Dgrouper.home=/opt/tomcats/tomcat_d_gsh/webapps/grouper_v2_2/WEB-INF/bin/../ -classpath /opt/tomcats/tomcat_d_gsh/webapps/grouper_v2_2/WEB-INF/bin/../classes:/opt/tomcats/tomcat_d_gsh/webapps/grouper_v2_2/WEB-INF/bin/../lib/*: edu.internet2.middleware.grouper.app.gsh.GrouperShellWrapper -loader
2953         
2954         break;
2955       case database:
2956 
2957         File localGrouperHibernatePropertiesFile = new File(this.untarredApiDir.getAbsoluteFile() + File.separator + "conf" 
2958             + File.separator + "grouper.hibernate.properties");
2959 
2960         Properties grouperHibernateProperties = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesFromFile(localGrouperHibernatePropertiesFile);
2961 
2962         this.dbUrl = GrouperInstallerUtils.defaultString(grouperHibernateProperties.getProperty("hibernate.connection.url"), "jdbc:hsqldb:hsql://localhost:9001/grouper");
2963         this.dbUser = GrouperInstallerUtils.defaultString(grouperHibernateProperties.getProperty("hibernate.connection.username"));
2964         this.dbPass = GrouperInstallerUtils.defaultString(grouperHibernateProperties.getProperty("hibernate.connection.password"));
2965 
2966         boolean useHsqldb = false;
2967 
2968         if (this.dbUrl.contains(":hsqldb:")) {
2969 
2970         }
2971 
2972         this.giDbUtils = new GiDbUtils(this.dbUrl, this.dbUser, this.dbPass);
2973 
2974 
2975 
2976         if (this.dbUrl.contains("hsqldb")) {
2977           //C:\mchyzer\grouper\trunk\grouper-installer\grouper.apiBinary-2.1.0
2978           startHsqlDb();
2979         }
2980         
2981         //####################################
2982         //check connection to database
2983         checkDatabaseConnection();
2984         break;
2985       case tomcat:
2986 
2987         //tomcat dir
2988         File catalinaServerXmlFile = new File(this.grouperInstallDirectoryString + "conf" + File.separator + "server.xml");
2989         if (!catalinaServerXmlFile.exists()) {
2990           //if used the webapps dir
2991           catalinaServerXmlFile = new File(this.grouperInstallDirectoryString + ".." + File.separator + ".." + File.separator + "conf" + File.separator + "server.xml");
2992         }
2993         //normal installer dir
2994         if (!catalinaServerXmlFile.exists()) {
2995           catalinaServerXmlFile = new File(this.grouperInstallDirectoryString + File.separator 
2996               + "apache-tomcat-6.0.35" + File.separator + "conf" + File.separator + "server.xml");
2997         }
2998 
2999         this.untarredTomcatDir = catalinaServerXmlFile.getParentFile().getParentFile();       
3000 
3001         //  /Server/Service/Connector <Connector port="8080" protocol="HTTP/1.1" 
3002         this.tomcatHttpPort = GrouperInstallerUtils.xpathEvaluateAttributeInt(catalinaServerXmlFile, "/Server/Service/Connector[@protocol='HTTP/1.1']", "port", -1);
3003 
3004         System.out.print("Enter the default IP address for checking ports (just hit enter to accept the default unless on a machine with no network, might want to change to 127.0.0.1): [0.0.0.0]: ");
3005         this.defaultIpAddress = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.defaultIpAddressForPorts");
3006         
3007         if (GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(this.defaultIpAddress)) {
3008           this.defaultIpAddress = "0.0.0.0";
3009         }
3010 
3011         switch (grouperInstallerAdminManageServiceAction) {
3012           case stop:
3013           case start:
3014           case restart:
3015             
3016             tomcatBounce(grouperInstallerAdminManageServiceAction.name().toString());
3017             break;
3018           case status:
3019             
3020             if (GrouperInstallerUtils.portAvailable(this.tomcatHttpPort, this.defaultIpAddress)) {
3021               System.out.println("Tomcat is running.  It is detected to be listening on port: " + this.tomcatHttpPort);
3022             } else {
3023               System.out.println("Tomcat is stopped.  It is not detected to be listening on port: " + this.tomcatHttpPort);
3024             }
3025             break;
3026         }
3027         
3028 
3029         break;
3030 
3031     }
3032     
3033     System.out.println("Press <enter> to continue.");
3034     readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.logsContinue");
3035 
3036   }
3037 
3038   /**
3039    * admin manage logs
3040    */
3041   private void adminManageLogs() {
3042     //see what we are upgrading: api, ui, ws, client
3043     this.appToUpgrade = grouperAppToUpgradeOrPatch("look at logs for");
3044 
3045     System.out.println("Find where the application is running, then find the log4j.properties in the classpath.");
3046     
3047     switch (this.appToUpgrade) {
3048       case PSP:
3049       case PSPNG:
3050         System.out.println("This runs in the API, so logging for the API will be examined.");
3051         //pass through to API
3052       case API:
3053         System.out.println("The API (generally invoked via GSH) logs to where the log4.properties specifies.");
3054         File log4jPropertiesFile = new File(this.grouperInstallDirectoryString + "grouper.apiBinary-" + this.version + File.separator 
3055             + "conf" + File.separator + "log4j.properties");
3056         
3057         if (!log4jPropertiesFile.exists()) {
3058           
3059           List<File> allFiles = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileListRecursive(new File(this.grouperInstallDirectoryString));
3060           log4jPropertiesFile = null;
3061           boolean multipleFound = false;
3062           for (File file : allFiles) {
3063             if ("log4j.properties".equals(file.getName())) {
3064               if (log4jPropertiesFile != null) {
3065                 multipleFound = true;
3066                 log4jPropertiesFile = null;
3067                 break;
3068               }
3069               log4jPropertiesFile = file;
3070             }
3071           }
3072           if (multipleFound || log4jPropertiesFile == null) {
3073             System.out.print("What is the absolute path of the log4j.properties? : ");
3074             String log4jPropertiesLocation = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.log4jPropertiesLocation");
3075             log4jPropertiesFile = new File(log4jPropertiesLocation);
3076             if (!log4jPropertiesFile.exists()) {
3077               System.out.println("Bad location: " + log4jPropertiesFile.getAbsolutePath());
3078               System.exit(1);
3079             }
3080           }
3081         }
3082         
3083         File logFile = new File(this.grouperInstallDirectoryString  
3084             + "logs" + File.separator + "grouper_error.log");
3085         String grouperHomeWithSlash = this.grouperInstallDirectoryString;
3086 
3087         if (!logFile.exists()) {
3088           logFile = new File(this.grouperInstallDirectoryString + "grouper.apiBinary-" + this.version + File.separator 
3089               + "logs" + File.separator + "grouper_error.log");
3090           grouperHomeWithSlash = this.grouperInstallDirectoryString + "grouper.apiBinary-" + this.version + File.separator;
3091         }              
3092         System.out.println("By default the installer configures the log file to be: " + logFile.getAbsolutePath());
3093         
3094         
3095         analyzeLogFile(log4jPropertiesFile, grouperHomeWithSlash, null, null);
3096         break;
3097       case CLIENT:
3098         System.out.println("The client generally logs to STDOUT.  Check the grouper.client.properties or if there is a log4j.properties in the clients classpath.");
3099         break;
3100       case WS:
3101       case UI:
3102         File catalinaLogFile = new File(this.grouperInstallDirectoryString + "logs");
3103         if (!catalinaLogFile.exists()) {
3104           //if used the webapps dir
3105           catalinaLogFile = new File(this.grouperInstallDirectoryString + ".." + File.separator + ".." + File.separator + "logs");
3106         }
3107         if (!catalinaLogFile.exists()) {
3108           catalinaLogFile = new File(this.grouperInstallDirectoryString + File.separator 
3109               + "apache-tomcat-6.0.35" + File.separator + "logs");
3110         }
3111         
3112         System.out.println("Tomcat logs STDOUT and STDERR to the catalinaErr.log "
3113             + "and catalinaOut.log logfiles, which should be here: " + catalinaLogFile.getAbsolutePath());
3114         if (!catalinaLogFile.exists()) {
3115           System.out.println("Warning: that directory does not exist, so you will need to locate the logs directory for tomcat.");
3116         }
3117         System.out.println("Locate the " + this.appToUpgrade + " application files.");
3118         System.out.println("By default the installer has the " + this.appToUpgrade + " running based on the tomcat server.xml, "
3119             + "but could also run in the webapps dir.");
3120         
3121         File serverXmlFile = new File(catalinaLogFile.getParentFile().getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "conf" + File.separator + "server.xml");
3122         
3123         if (!serverXmlFile.exists()) {
3124           System.out.println("server.xml not found: " + serverXmlFile.getAbsolutePath());
3125         } else {
3126           //<Context docBase="/Users/mchyzer/tmp/grouperInstaller/grouper.ws-2.3.0/grouper-ws/build/dist/grouper-ws" path="/grouper-ws" reloadable="false"/>
3127           //<Context docBase="/Users/mchyzer/tmp/grouperInstaller/grouper.ui-2.3.0/dist/grouper" path="/grouper" reloadable="false"/>
3128 
3129           System.out.println("The server.xml is located: " + serverXmlFile.getAbsolutePath());
3130 
3131           String tomcatPath = this.appToUpgrade == AppToUpgrade.UI ? "grouper" : "grouper-ws";
3132 
3133           System.out.print("What is the URL starting path? [" + tomcatPath + "]: ");
3134           String newTomcatPath = readFromStdIn(this.appToUpgrade == AppToUpgrade.UI ? "grouperInstaller.autorun.urlPathForUi" : "grouperInstaller.autorun.urlPathForWs");
3135           
3136           if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(newTomcatPath)) {
3137             tomcatPath = newTomcatPath;
3138           }
3139 
3140           if (tomcatPath.endsWith("/") || tomcatPath.endsWith("\\")) {
3141             tomcatPath = tomcatPath.substring(0, tomcatPath.length()-1);
3142           }
3143           if (tomcatPath.startsWith("/") || tomcatPath.startsWith("\\")) {
3144             tomcatPath = tomcatPath.substring(1, tomcatPath.length());
3145           }                  
3146           String currentDocBase = GrouperInstallerUtils.xpathEvaluateAttribute(serverXmlFile, 
3147               "Server/Service/Engine/Host/Context[@path='/" + tomcatPath + "']", "docBase");
3148 
3149           if (this.appToUpgrade == AppToUpgrade.UI) {
3150             //<Context docBase="/Users/mchyzer/tmp/grouperInstaller/grouper.ui-2.3.0/dist/grouper" path="/grouper" reloadable="false"/>
3151             System.out.println("Looking for an entry in the server.xml that looks like this:");
3152             System.out.println("  <Context docBase=\""
3153                 + GrouperInstallerUtils.defaultIfBlank(currentDocBase, this.grouperInstallDirectoryString 
3154                     + "grouper.ui-" + this.version + File.separator + "dist" + File.separator 
3155                     + "grouper")
3156                 + "\" path=\"/" + tomcatPath + "\" reloadable=\"false\"/>");
3157 
3158           } else if (this.appToUpgrade == AppToUpgrade.WS) {
3159             //<Context docBase="/Users/mchyzer/tmp/grouperInstaller/grouper.ws-2.3.0/grouper-ws/build/dist/grouper-ws" path="/grouper-ws" reloadable="false"/>
3160             System.out.println("Looking for an entry in the server.xml that looks like this:");
3161             System.out.println("  <Context docBase=\""
3162                 + GrouperInstallerUtils.defaultIfBlank(currentDocBase, this.grouperInstallDirectoryString 
3163                     + "grouper.ws-" + this.version + File.separator + "grouper-ws" 
3164                     + File.separator + "build" + File.separator + "dist" + File.separator 
3165                     + "grouper-ws")
3166                 + "\" path=\"/" + tomcatPath + "\" reloadable=\"false\"/>");
3167           }
3168           
3169           if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(currentDocBase)) {
3170             System.out.println("The docBase for the " + tomcatPath + " entry in the server.xml is: " + currentDocBase);
3171           } else {
3172             //check webapps
3173             System.out.println("The docBase could not be found in the server.xml, check in the tomcat" 
3174                 + File.separator + "webapps directory");
3175             currentDocBase = catalinaLogFile.getParentFile().getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "webapps" + File.separator + tomcatPath;
3176             if (!new File(currentDocBase).exists()) {
3177               System.out.println("Cant find where grouper is linked from tomcat, looked in server.xml and the webapps directory");
3178               currentDocBase = null;
3179             }
3180           }
3181           if (currentDocBase != null) {
3182             log4jPropertiesFile = new File(currentDocBase + File.separator + "WEB-INF" + File.separator + "classes" + File.separator + "log4j.properties");
3183             
3184             analyzeLogFile(log4jPropertiesFile, "${grouper.home}" + File.separator, new File(catalinaLogFile + File.separator + "catalinaOut.log"),
3185                 new File(catalinaLogFile + File.separator + "catalinaErr.log"));
3186           }
3187         }
3188         
3189         break;
3190         
3191       default: 
3192         throw new RuntimeException("Not expecting appToUpgrade: " + this.appToUpgrade + "!");
3193     }
3194     
3195     System.out.println("Press <enter> to continue.");
3196     readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.logsContinue");
3197 
3198   }
3199   
3200   /**
3201    * 
3202    * @param log4jPropertiesFile
3203    * @param grouperHomeWithSlash
3204    * @param stdoutLocation
3205    * @param stderrLocation
3206    */
3207   private void analyzeLogFile(File log4jPropertiesFile, String grouperHomeWithSlash, File stdoutLocation, File stderrLocation) {
3208     System.out.println("The log4j.properties is located in: " 
3209         + log4jPropertiesFile.getAbsolutePath());
3210 
3211     if (!log4jPropertiesFile.exists()) {
3212     
3213       System.out.println("Error, the log4j.properties file could not be found.");
3214 
3215     } else {
3216       
3217       System.out.println("Examine the log4j.properties to see where it is logging");
3218       
3219       Properties log4jProperties = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesFromFile(log4jPropertiesFile);
3220       
3221       //= ERROR, grouper_error")
3222       String rootLoggerValue = log4jProperties.getProperty("log4j.rootLogger");              
3223       
3224       System.out.println("Generally the log4j.rootLogger property shows where logs go, it is set to: " + rootLoggerValue);
3225       
3226       Pattern pattern = Pattern.compile("\\s*[A-Z]+\\s*,\\s*(\\w+)\\s*");
3227       Matcher matcher = pattern.matcher(rootLoggerValue);
3228       if (!matcher.matches()) {
3229         System.out.println("Examine the log4j.properties for more information");
3230       } else {
3231         String logger = matcher.group(1);
3232         System.out.println("The log4j.rootLogger property in log4j.properties is set to: " + logger);
3233         //log4j.appender.grouper_error = org.apache.log4j.DailyRollingFileAppender
3234         //log4j.appender.grouper_error.File = ${grouper.home}logs/grouper_error.log
3235         String logFileName = log4jProperties.getProperty("log4j.appender." + logger + ".File");
3236         if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(logFileName)) {
3237           System.out.println("There is a property in log4j.properties: log4j.appender." + logger + ".File = " + logFileName);
3238           if (logFileName.contains("${grouper.home}")) {
3239             logFileName = GrouperInstallerUtils.replace(logFileName, "${grouper.home}", grouperHomeWithSlash);
3240           }
3241           System.out.println("Grouper log should be: " + logFileName);
3242         } else {
3243           //log4j.appender.grouper_stdout = org.apache.log4j.ConsoleAppender
3244           String appender = log4jProperties.getProperty("log4j.appender." + logger);
3245           //log4j.appender.grouper_stderr.Target                    = System.err
3246           String target = log4jProperties.getProperty("log4j.appender." + logger + ".Target");
3247           String targetFriendly = null;
3248           if (GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(target, "System.err")) {
3249             targetFriendly = "STDERR";
3250           } else if (GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(target, "System.out")) {
3251             targetFriendly = "STDOUT";
3252           }
3253           if (GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(appender, "org.apache.log4j.ConsoleAppender") && targetFriendly != null) {
3254             System.out.println("Since log4j.properties log4j.appender." + logger + " = org.apache.log4j.ConsoleAppender you are logging to " + targetFriendly);
3255             if (GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(target, "System.err") && stderrLocation != null) {
3256               System.out.println("Grouper logs should be in " + stderrLocation.getAbsolutePath());
3257             } else if (GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(target, "System.out") && stdoutLocation != null) {
3258               System.out.println("Grouper logs should be in " + stdoutLocation.getAbsolutePath());
3259             }
3260           } else {
3261             System.out.println("Examine the log4j.properties for more information");
3262           }
3263         }
3264       }
3265     }
3266   }
3267   
3268   /**
3269    * admin
3270    */
3271   private void mainUpgradeTaskLogic() {
3272     GrouperInstallerConvertAction grouperInstallerConvertAction = null;
3273 
3274     for (int i=0;i<10;i++) {
3275       //what do we want to do, install, revert, or get status?
3276       System.out.print("What upgrade task do you want to do (convertEhcacheXmlToProperties)? : ");
3277       String convertAction = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.upgradeTaskAction");
3278       try {
3279         grouperInstallerConvertAction = GrouperInstallerConvertAction.valueOfIgnoreCase(convertAction, false, true);
3280         if (grouperInstallerConvertAction != null) {
3281           break;
3282         }
3283       } catch (Exception e) {
3284         //ignore, let user try again
3285       }
3286     }
3287     switch(grouperInstallerConvertAction) {
3288       case convertEhcacheXmlToProperties:
3289 
3290         System.out.println("Note, you need to convert the ehcache.xml file for each Grouper runtime, e.g. loader, WS, UI.");
3291         System.out.println("Note, you need to be running Grouper 2.3.0 with API patch 35 installed.");
3292         System.out.print("Enter the location of the ehcache.xml file: ");
3293         String convertEhcacheXmlLocation = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.convertEhcacheXmlLocation");
3294 
3295         File ehcacheXmlFile = new File(convertEhcacheXmlLocation);
3296         if (!ehcacheXmlFile.exists()) {
3297           System.out.println("Cant find ehcache.xml: " + ehcacheXmlFile.getAbsolutePath());
3298           System.exit(1);
3299         }
3300 
3301         File grouperCacheBaseProperties = new File(ehcacheXmlFile.getParentFile().getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper.cache.base.properties");
3302 
3303         {
3304           System.out.print("Enter the location of the grouper.cache.base.properties file [" + grouperCacheBaseProperties.getAbsolutePath() + "]: ");
3305           String grouperCacheBasePropertiesLocation = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.convertEhcacheBasePropertiesLocation");
3306   
3307           if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(grouperCacheBasePropertiesLocation)) {
3308             grouperCacheBaseProperties = new File(grouperCacheBasePropertiesLocation);
3309           }
3310         }
3311         
3312         File grouperCacheProperties = new File(ehcacheXmlFile.getParentFile().getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper.cache.properties");
3313 
3314         {
3315           System.out.print("Enter the location of the grouper.cache.properties file (to be created)  [" + grouperCacheProperties.getAbsolutePath() + "]: ");
3316           String grouperCachePropertiesLocation = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.convertEhcachePropertiesLocation");
3317   
3318           if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(grouperCachePropertiesLocation)) {
3319             grouperCacheProperties = new File(grouperCachePropertiesLocation);
3320           }
3321         }
3322         
3323         try {
3324           convertEhcacheXmlToProperties(grouperCacheBaseProperties, grouperCacheProperties,
3325               ehcacheXmlFile.toURI().toURL());
3326         } catch (MalformedURLException mue) {
3327           throw new RuntimeException("Malformed url on " + convertEhcacheXmlLocation);
3328         }
3329 
3330         System.out.println("File was written: " + grouperCacheProperties.getAbsolutePath());
3331 
3332         break;
3333     }
3334 
3335   }
3336   
3337   /**
3338    * patch grouper
3339    */
3340   private void mainPatchLogic() {
3341     
3342     //####################################
3343     //Find out what directory to upgrade to.  This ends in a file separator
3344     this.grouperTarballDirectoryString = grouperUpgradeTempDirectory();
3345     
3346     //see what we are upgrading: api, ui, ws, client
3347     this.appToUpgrade = grouperAppToUpgradeOrPatch("patch");
3348 
3349     //get the directory where the existing installation is
3350     this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString = upgradeExistingDirectory();
3351 
3352     GrouperInstallerPatchAction grouperInstallerPatchAction = null;
3353     
3354     
3355     for (int i=0;i<10;i++) {
3356       //what do we want to do, install, revert, or get status?
3357       System.out.print("What do you want to do with patches (install, revert, status, fixIndexFile)? [install]: ");
3358       String patchAction = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.patchAction");
3359       try {
3360         grouperInstallerPatchAction = GrouperInstallerPatchAction.valueOfIgnoreCase(patchAction, false, true);
3361         if (grouperInstallerPatchAction == null) {
3362           grouperInstallerPatchAction = GrouperInstallerPatchAction.install;
3363         }
3364         break;
3365       } catch (Exception e) {
3366         //ignore, let user try again
3367       }
3368     }
3369     
3370     switch(grouperInstallerPatchAction) {
3371       case install:
3372         
3373         fixIndexFileIfOk();
3374 
3375         //loop through applications, check patches
3376         this.appToUpgrade.patch(this);
3377 
3378         break;
3379         
3380       case revert:
3381         
3382         fixIndexFileIfOk();
3383 
3384         //look through applications, check for reverts
3385         this.appToUpgrade.revertPatch(this);
3386         break;
3387         
3388       case status:
3389         
3390         fixIndexFileIfOk();
3391 
3392         //print out status for applications
3393         this.appToUpgrade.patchStatus(this);
3394         break;
3395         
3396       case fixIndexFile:
3397         
3398         //print out status for applications
3399         this.appToUpgrade.fixIndexFile(this);
3400         break;
3401         
3402       default:
3403         throw new RuntimeException("Invalid patch action: " + grouperInstallerPatchAction);  
3404     }
3405     
3406   }
3407 
3408   /**
3409    * 
3410    */
3411   public static enum GrouperInstallerPatchAction {
3412 
3413     /** fix index file */
3414     fixIndexFile,
3415     
3416     /** install patches */
3417     install,
3418 
3419     /**
3420      * revert patches
3421      */
3422     revert,
3423     
3424     /**
3425      * get status on patches
3426      */
3427     status;
3428     
3429     /**
3430      * 
3431      * @param string
3432      * @param exceptionIfInvalid
3433      * @param exceptionIfBlank
3434      * @return the action
3435      */
3436     public static GrouperInstallerPatchAction valueOfIgnoreCase(String string, boolean exceptionIfBlank, boolean exceptionIfInvalid) {
3437       return GrouperInstallerUtils.enumValueOfIgnoreCase(GrouperInstallerPatchAction.class, string, exceptionIfBlank, exceptionIfInvalid);
3438     }
3439     
3440   }
3441   
3442   /**
3443    * 
3444    */
3445   public static enum GrouperInstallerAdminAction {
3446 
3447     /** manage */
3448     manage,
3449     
3450     /** convert */
3451     upgradeTask;
3452     
3453     /**
3454      * 
3455      * @param string
3456      * @param exceptionIfInvalid
3457      * @param exceptionIfBlank
3458      * @return the action
3459      */
3460     public static GrouperInstallerAdminAction valueOfIgnoreCase(String string, boolean exceptionIfBlank, boolean exceptionIfInvalid) {
3461       return GrouperInstallerUtils.enumValueOfIgnoreCase(GrouperInstallerAdminAction.class, string, exceptionIfBlank, exceptionIfInvalid);
3462     }
3463     
3464   }
3465   
3466   /**
3467    * 
3468    */
3469   public static enum GrouperInstallerMiscConvertAction {
3470 
3471     /** convert ehcache xml to properties */
3472     convertEhcacheXmlToProperties
3473     ;
3474     
3475     /**
3476      * 
3477      * @param string
3478      * @param exceptionIfInvalid
3479      * @param exceptionIfBlank
3480      * @return the action
3481      */
3482     public static GrouperInstallerMiscConvertAction valueOfIgnoreCase(String string, boolean exceptionIfBlank, boolean exceptionIfInvalid) {
3483       return GrouperInstallerUtils.enumValueOfIgnoreCase(GrouperInstallerMiscConvertAction.class, string, exceptionIfBlank, exceptionIfInvalid);
3484     }
3485     
3486   }
3487   
3488   /**
3489    * 
3490    */
3491   public static enum GrouperInstallerConvertAction {
3492 
3493     /** convert */
3494     convertEhcacheXmlToProperties;
3495     
3496     /**
3497      * 
3498      * @param string
3499      * @param exceptionIfInvalid
3500      * @param exceptionIfBlank
3501      * @return the action
3502      */
3503     public static GrouperInstallerConvertAction valueOfIgnoreCase(String string, boolean exceptionIfBlank, boolean exceptionIfInvalid) {
3504       return GrouperInstallerUtils.enumValueOfIgnoreCase(GrouperInstallerConvertAction.class, string, exceptionIfBlank, exceptionIfInvalid);
3505     }
3506     
3507   }
3508   
3509   /**
3510    * 
3511    */
3512   public static enum GrouperInstallerAdminManageService {
3513 
3514     /** tomcat */
3515     tomcat,
3516     
3517     /** database (hsqldb) */
3518     database,
3519     
3520     /** daemon (loader) */
3521     daemon;
3522     
3523     /**
3524      * 
3525      * @param string
3526      * @param exceptionIfInvalid
3527      * @param exceptionIfBlank
3528      * @return the action
3529      */
3530     public static GrouperInstallerAdminManageService valueOfIgnoreCase(String string, boolean exceptionIfBlank, boolean exceptionIfInvalid) {
3531       return GrouperInstallerUtils.enumValueOfIgnoreCase(GrouperInstallerAdminManageService.class, string, exceptionIfBlank, exceptionIfInvalid);
3532     }
3533     
3534   }
3535   
3536   /**
3537    * 
3538    */
3539   public static enum GrouperInstallerManageAction {
3540 
3541     /** logs */
3542     logs,
3543 
3544     /** back to admin */
3545     back,
3546 
3547     /** exit */
3548     exit,
3549 
3550     /** services */
3551     services;
3552     
3553     /**
3554      * 
3555      * @param string
3556      * @param exceptionIfInvalid
3557      * @param exceptionIfBlank
3558      * @return the action
3559      */
3560     public static GrouperInstallerManageAction valueOfIgnoreCase(String string, boolean exceptionIfBlank, boolean exceptionIfInvalid) {
3561       return GrouperInstallerUtils.enumValueOfIgnoreCase(GrouperInstallerManageAction.class, string, exceptionIfBlank, exceptionIfInvalid);
3562     }
3563     
3564   }
3565   
3566   /**
3567    * get the existing properties file of patches
3568    * @return the file for patches
3569    */
3570   private Properties patchExistingProperties() {
3571     File patchExistingPropertiesFile = this.patchExistingPropertiesFile();
3572     if (patchExistingPropertiesFile == null || !patchExistingPropertiesFile.exists()) {
3573       return new Properties();
3574     }
3575     return GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesFromFile(patchExistingPropertiesFile);
3576    }
3577 
3578   /**
3579    * get the existing properties file of patches
3580    * @return the file for patches
3581    */
3582   private File patchExistingPropertiesFile() {
3583     
3584     //dont cache this in a variable since the upgrade existing application variable
3585     File patchExistingPropertiesFile = null;
3586     //if theres a web-inf, put it there, if not, put it in regular...
3587     if (new File(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString + "WEB-INF").exists()) {
3588       patchExistingPropertiesFile = new File(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString 
3589           + "WEB-INF" + File.separator + "grouperPatchStatus.properties");
3590     } else {
3591       patchExistingPropertiesFile = new File(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString 
3592           + "grouperPatchStatus.properties");
3593     }
3594     return patchExistingPropertiesFile;
3595   }
3596   
3597   /**
3598    * 
3599    */
3600   private void mainUpgradeLogic() {
3601 
3602     System.out.println("You should backup your files and database before you start.  Press <enter> to continue.");
3603     readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.backupFiles");
3604     
3605     System.out.println("\n##################################");
3606     System.out.println("Gather upgrade information\n");
3607 
3608     //####################################
3609     //Find out what directory to upgrade to.  This ends in a file separator
3610     this.grouperTarballDirectoryString = grouperUpgradeTempDirectory();
3611     
3612     //GRP-1429: grouperInstaller tarballs dir fails on upgrade
3613     //set this here since on upgrade some things download to this dir...
3614     this.grouperInstallDirectoryString = this.grouperTarballDirectoryString;
3615     
3616     //see what we are upgrading: api, ui, ws, client
3617     this.appToUpgrade = grouperAppToUpgradeOrPatch("upgrade");
3618 
3619     for (int i=0;i<10;i++) {
3620       System.out.println("Are there any running processes using this installation?  tomcats?  loader?  psp?  etc?  (t|f)? [f]:");
3621       boolean runningProcesses = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.runningProcesses");
3622       if (runningProcesses) {
3623         break;
3624       }
3625       System.out.println("Please stop any processes using this installation...");
3626       //lets sleep for a bit to let it start
3627       GrouperInstallerUtils.sleep(2000);
3628     }
3629     
3630     //get the directory where the existing installation is
3631     this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString = upgradeExistingDirectory();
3632 
3633     this.version = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("grouper.version", true);
3634     System.out.println("Upgrading to grouper " + this.appToUpgrade.name() + " version: " + this.version);
3635  
3636     fixIndexFileIfOk();
3637     
3638     System.out.println("\n##################################");
3639     System.out.println("Download and build grouper packages\n");
3640 
3641     //download new files
3642     this.appToUpgrade.downloadAndBuildGrouperProjects(this);
3643 
3644     System.out.println("End download and build grouper packages\n");
3645     System.out.println("\n##################################");
3646 
3647     this.grouperBaseBakDir = this.grouperTarballDirectoryString + "bak_" + this.appToUpgrade + "_" 
3648         + new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy_MM_dd_HH_mm_ss_SSS").format(new Date()) + File.separator; 
3649 
3650     GrouperInstallerUtils.tempFilePathForJars = this.grouperBaseBakDir 
3651         + "jarToDelete" + File.separator;
3652 
3653     //when we revert patches, default should be true
3654     this.revertAllPatchesDefault = true;
3655     try {
3656       this.appToUpgrade.upgradeApp(this);
3657     } finally {
3658       this.revertAllPatchesDefault = false;
3659     }
3660
