3661     this.reportOnConflictingJars();
3662     
3663     System.out.println("\nGrouper is upgraded from " + (this.originalGrouperJarVersion == null ? null : this.originalGrouperJarVersion) 
3664         + " to " + GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("grouper.version", true) +  "\n");
3665 
3666     //this file keeps track of partial upgrades
3667     GrouperInstallerUtils.fileDelete(this.grouperUpgradeOriginalVersionFile);
3668 
3669     //reset this so that patches go against new version
3670     this.grouperVersionOfJar = null;
3671     
3672   }
3673 
3674   /**
3675    * 
3676    */
3677   private void fixIndexFileIfOk() {
3678     Properties patchesExistingProperties = patchExistingProperties();
3679     
3680     //see what is already there
3681     String existingDate = patchesExistingProperties.getProperty("grouperInstallerLastFixedIndexFile.date");
3682 
3683     boolean defaultToFixIndex = true;
3684     
3685     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(existingDate)) {
3686       try {
3687         Date theDate = GrouperInstallerUtils.dateMinutesSecondsFormat.parse(existingDate);
3688         //this is when the installer was fixed to do the index file correctly
3689         if (theDate.getTime() > GrouperInstallerUtils.dateValue("20150929").getTime()) {
3690           defaultToFixIndex = false;
3691         }
3692       } catch (ParseException pe) {
3693         System.out.println("Cant parse date: " + existingDate);
3694       }
3695     }
3696 
3697     //if we are affecting 2.2.2+ then dont recommend this
3698     if (defaultToFixIndex) {
3699       
3700       //see the version
3701       String grouperVersion = this.grouperVersionOfJar().toString();
3702 
3703       GiGrouperVersion giGrouperVersion = GiGrouperVersion.valueOfIgnoreCase(grouperVersion);
3704       
3705       if (giGrouperVersion.greaterOrEqualToArg(GiGrouperVersion.valueOfIgnoreCase("2.2.2"))) {
3706         defaultToFixIndex = false;
3707       }
3708       
3709     }
3710     
3711     
3712     System.out.println("Do you want to fix the patch index file (download all patches and see if they are installed?) (" + (defaultToFixIndex ? "recommended" : "not recommended") + ") (t|f)? [" + (defaultToFixIndex ? "t" : "f") + "]: ");
3713     boolean fixIndexFile = readFromStdInBoolean(defaultToFixIndex, "grouperInstaller.autorun.fixIndexFile");
3714     if (fixIndexFile) {
3715       this.appToUpgrade.fixIndexFile(this);
3716     }
3717   }
3718 
3719   /**
3720    * upgrade the client
3721    */
3722   private void upgradeClient() {
3723 
3724     System.out.println("\n##################################");
3725     System.out.println("Upgrading grouper client\n");
3726 
3727     this.compareAndReplaceJar(this.grouperClientJar, new File(this.untarredClientDir + File.separator + "grouperClient.jar"), true, null);
3728 
3729     this.compareUpgradePropertiesFile(this.grouperClientBasePropertiesFile, 
3730       new File(this.untarredClientDir + File.separator + "grouper.client.base.properties"),
3731       this.grouperClientPropertiesFile,
3732       this.grouperClientExamplePropertiesFile,
3733       GrouperInstallerUtils.toSet("grouperClient.webService.client.version"),
3734       "grouperInstaller.autorun.removeRedundantPropetiesFromGrouperClient"
3735     );
3736 
3737     
3738   }
3739 
3740 
3741   /**
3742    * upgrade the ui
3743    */
3744   private void upgradeUi() {
3745 
3746     this.upgradeApiPreRevertPatch();
3747 
3748     System.out.println("You need to revert all patches to upgrade");
3749     this.patchRevertUi();
3750     
3751     this.upgradeApiPostRevertPatch();
3752     
3753     System.out.println("\n##################################");
3754     System.out.println("Upgrading UI\n");
3755     
3756     //copy the jars there
3757     System.out.println("\n##################################");
3758     System.out.println("Upgrading UI jars\n");
3759 
3760     this.upgradeJars(new File(this.untarredUiDir + File.separator + "dist" + File.separator + "grouper" + File.separator 
3761         + "WEB-INF" + File.separator + "lib" + File.separator));
3762 
3763     System.out.println("\n##################################");
3764     System.out.println("Upgrading UI files\n");
3765 
3766     //copy files there
3767     this.copyFiles(this.untarredUiDir + File.separator + "dist" + File.separator + "grouper" + File.separator,
3768         this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString,
3769         GrouperInstallerUtils.toSet("WEB-INF/lib", "WEB-INF/web.xml", "WEB-INF/classes",
3770             "WEB-INF/bin/gsh", "WEB-INF/bin/gsh.bat", "WEB-INF/bin/gsh.sh"));
3771 
3772     {
3773       boolean hadChange = false;
3774       for (String gshName : new String[]{"gsh", "gsh.bat", "gsh.sh"}) {
3775         File newGshFile = new File(this.untarredUiDir + File.separator + "dist" 
3776             + File.separator + "grouper" + File.separator + "WEB-INF" + File.separator + "bin" 
3777             + File.separator + gshName);
3778 
3779         File existingGshFile = new File(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString 
3780             + "WEB-INF" + File.separator + "bin" + File.separator + gshName);
3781 
3782         if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.contentEquals(newGshFile, existingGshFile)) {
3783           this.backupAndCopyFile(newGshFile, existingGshFile, true);
3784           if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.equals("gsh.bat", gshName)) {
3785             hadChange = true;
3786           }
3787         }
3788         
3789       }
3790       if (hadChange) {
3791         //set executable and dos2unix
3792         gshExcutableAndDos2Unix(this.untarredUiDir + File.separator + "dist" 
3793             + File.separator + "grouper" + File.separator + "WEB-INF" + File.separator + "bin" 
3794             + File.separator);
3795       }
3796     }
3797     
3798     upgradeWebXml(new File(this.untarredUiDir + File.separator + "dist" 
3799             + File.separator + "grouper" + File.separator + "WEB-INF" + File.separator + "web.xml"),
3800             new File(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString 
3801                 + File.separator + "WEB-INF" + File.separator + "web.xml"));
3802     
3803     System.out.println("\n##################################");
3804     System.out.println("Upgrading UI config files\n");
3805 
3806     this.changeConfig("WEB-INF/classes/resources/grouper/nav.properties", 
3807         "WEB-INF/classes/grouperText/grouper.text.en.us.base.properties",
3808         "WEB-INF/classes/grouperText/grouper.text.en.us.properties", null, GiGrouperVersion.valueOfIgnoreCase("2.2.0"), true, 
3809         "grouperInstaller.autorun.continueAfterNavProperties",
3810         "grouperInstaller.autorun.removeOldKeysFromNavProperties");
3811 
3812     this.changeConfig("WEB-INF/classes/resources/grouper/media.properties", 
3813         "WEB-INF/classes/grouper-ui.base.properties",
3814         "WEB-INF/classes/grouper-ui.properties", null, GiGrouperVersion.valueOfIgnoreCase("2.2.0"), false,
3815         "grouperInstaller.autorun.continueAfterMediaProperties",
3816         "grouperInstaller.autorun.removeOldKeysFromMediaProperties");
3817 
3818     {
3819       File newBaseOwaspFile = new File(this.untarredUiDir + File.separator + "dist" 
3820           + File.separator + "grouper" + File.separator + "WEB-INF" + File.separator + "classes" 
3821           + File.separator + "Owasp.CsrfGuard.properties");
3822 
3823       File newOwaspFile = new File(this.untarredUiDir + File.separator + "dist" 
3824           + File.separator + "grouper" + File.separator + "WEB-INF" + File.separator + "classes" 
3825           + File.separator + "Owasp.CsrfGuard.overlay.properties");
3826 
3827       if (this.owaspCsrfGuardBaseFile == null) {
3828         this.owaspCsrfGuardBaseFile = new File(this.upgradeExistingClassesDirectoryString + newBaseOwaspFile.getName());
3829       }
3830       
3831       if (this.owaspCsrfGuardFile == null) {
3832         this.owaspCsrfGuardFile = new File(this.upgradeExistingClassesDirectoryString + newOwaspFile.getName());
3833       }
3834       
3835       this.backupAndCopyFile(newBaseOwaspFile, this.owaspCsrfGuardBaseFile, true);
3836 
3837       boolean editedOwaspOverlay = this.owaspCsrfGuardFile != null && this.owaspCsrfGuardFile.exists();
3838 
3839       File bakFile = this.backupAndCopyFile(newOwaspFile, this.owaspCsrfGuardFile, true);
3840 
3841       if (bakFile != null && editedOwaspOverlay) {
3842         if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.contentEquals(this.owaspCsrfGuardFile, newOwaspFile)) {
3843           System.out.println("If you have edited the Owasp.CsrfGuard.overlay.properties please merge the changes to the new file");
3844           System.out.println("Press <enter> when done");
3845           readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.continueAfterEditedOwaspCsrfGuard");
3846         }
3847       }
3848     }    
3849 
3850     //patch it
3851     this.patchUi();
3852     
3853   }
3854 
3855   /**
3856    * upgrade the psp
3857    */
3858   private void upgradePsp() {
3859 
3860     this.upgradeApiPreRevertPatch();
3861 
3862     System.out.println("You need to revert all patches to upgrade");
3863     this.patchRevertPsp();
3864     
3865     this.upgradeApiPostRevertPatch();
3866     
3867     System.out.println("\n##################################");
3868     System.out.println("Upgrading PSP\n");
3869     
3870     //copy the jars there
3871     System.out.println("\n##################################");
3872     System.out.println("Upgrading PSP jars\n");
3873 
3874     this.upgradeJars(new File(this.untarredPspDir + File.separator + "lib" + File.separator + "custom" + File.separator),
3875         new File(new File(this.upgradeExistingLibDirectoryString).getParentFile().getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "custom"));
3876 
3877     System.out.println("\n##################################");
3878     System.out.println("Upgrading PSP files\n");
3879 
3880     //copy files there (this is the conf examples)
3881     this.copyFiles(this.untarredPspDir + File.separator + "conf" + File.separator,
3882         this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString + "conf" + File.separator, null);
3883 
3884     //patch it
3885     this.patchPsp();
3886   }
3887 
3888   /**
3889    * upgrade the pspng
3890    */
3891   private void upgradePspng() {
3892 
3893     this.upgradeApiPreRevertPatch();
3894 
3895     System.out.println("You need to revert all patches to upgrade");
3896     this.patchRevertPspng();
3897     
3898     this.upgradeApiPostRevertPatch();
3899     
3900     System.out.println("\n##################################");
3901     System.out.println("Upgrading PSPNG\n");
3902     
3903     //copy the jars there
3904     System.out.println("\n##################################");
3905     System.out.println("Upgrading PSPNG jars\n");
3906 
3907     this.upgradeJars(new File(this.untarredPspngDir + File.separator + "lib" + File.separator + "custom" + File.separator),
3908         new File(new File(this.upgradeExistingLibDirectoryString).getParentFile().getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "custom"));
3909 
3910     System.out.println("\n##################################");
3911     System.out.println("Upgrading PSPNG files\n");
3912 
3913     //copy files there (this is the conf examples)
3914     this.copyFiles(this.untarredPspngDir + File.separator + "conf" + File.separator,
3915         this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString + "conf" + File.separator, null);
3916 
3917     //patch it
3918     this.patchPspng();
3919   }
3920 
3921   
3922   /**
3923    * upgrade a web.xml file
3924    * @param newWebXml
3925    * @param existingWebXml
3926    */
3927   public void upgradeWebXml(File newWebXml, File existingWebXml) {
3928     
3929     File bakFile = backupAndCopyFile(newWebXml, existingWebXml, true);
3930     
3931     if (bakFile != null) {
3932       //it existed
3933       NodeList nodeList = GrouperInstallerUtils.xpathEvaluate(bakFile, "/web-app/security-constraint");
3934       boolean tookOutAuthn = false;
3935       if (nodeList == null || nodeList.getLength() == 0) {
3936         //take out authn from web.xml
3937         String webXmlContents = GrouperInstallerUtils.readFileIntoString(existingWebXml);
3938         int startAuthnIndex = webXmlContents.indexOf("<security-constraint>");
3939         int endAuthnIndex = webXmlContents.indexOf("</security-role>");
3940         if (startAuthnIndex != -1 && endAuthnIndex != -1 && endAuthnIndex > startAuthnIndex) {
3941           endAuthnIndex = endAuthnIndex + "</security-role>".length();
3942           //authn is there
3943           webXmlContents = webXmlContents.substring(0, startAuthnIndex) + webXmlContents.substring(endAuthnIndex, webXmlContents.length());
3944           GrouperInstallerUtils.saveStringIntoFile(existingWebXml, webXmlContents);
3945           tookOutAuthn = true;
3946           System.out.println("Taking out basic authentication from " + existingWebXml + " since it wasnt there before");
3947         }
3948       }
3949       System.out.println("If you customized the web.xml please merge your changes back in "
3950           + (tookOutAuthn ? "\n  Note: basic authentication was removed from the new web.xml to be consistent with the old web.xml" : "")
3951           + "\n  New file: " + existingWebXml.getAbsolutePath() + ", bak file:" + bakFile.getAbsolutePath() );
3952       System.out.println("Press the <enter> key to continue");
3953       readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.continueAfterMergeWebXml");
3954       
3955       if (tookOutAuthn) {
3956         GrouperInstallerUtils.xpathEvaluate(existingWebXml, "/web-app");        
3957       }
3958     }
3959   }
3960 
3961   
3962   /**
3963    * @param legacyPropertiesFileRelativePath legacy file we are converting from
3964    * @param propertiesFileRelativePath 
3965    * @param propertiesToIgnore
3966    * @param basePropertiesFileRelativePath
3967    * @param versionMigrationHappened
3968    * @param removeOldCopy
3969    * @param autorunPropertiesKey key in properties file to automatically fill in a value
3970    * @param autorunPropertiesKeyRemoveOldKeys key in properties file to automatically fill in a value to remove old keys
3971    */
3972   @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
3973   private void changeConfig(String legacyPropertiesFileRelativePath,
3974       String basePropertiesFileRelativePath,
3975       String propertiesFileRelativePath,
3976       Set<String> propertiesToIgnore,
3977       GiGrouperVersion versionMigrationHappened, boolean removeOldCopy, 
3978       String autorunPropertiesKey, String autorunPropertiesKeyRemoveOldKeys) {
3979 
3980     File legacyPropertiesFile = new File(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString + legacyPropertiesFileRelativePath);
3981     File newBasePropertiesFile = new File(this.untarredUiDir + File.separator + "dist" 
3982         + File.separator + "grouper" + File.separator + basePropertiesFileRelativePath);
3983     File existingBasePropertiesFile = new File(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString + basePropertiesFileRelativePath);
3984     File existingPropertiesFile = new File(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString + propertiesFileRelativePath);
3985 
3986     this.compareUpgradePropertiesFile(existingBasePropertiesFile, newBasePropertiesFile, 
3987         existingPropertiesFile, null, propertiesToIgnore, autorunPropertiesKeyRemoveOldKeys);
3988 
3989     //look for existing properties in legacy file, and if there are properties in the base, then remove them
3990     if (legacyPropertiesFile.exists()) {
3991       
3992       Properties existingBaseProperties = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesFromFile(existingBasePropertiesFile);
3993       Properties existingProperties = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesFromFile(existingPropertiesFile);
3994       Properties legacyProperties = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesFromFile(legacyPropertiesFile);
3995       Set<String> propertyNamesToRemove = new LinkedHashSet<String>();
3996       Set<String> propertyNamesWrongValue = new LinkedHashSet<String>();
3997 
3998       for (String propertyName : (Set<String>)(Object)existingBaseProperties.keySet()) {
3999         if (legacyProperties.containsKey(propertyName)) {
4000           
4001           Object existingValue = existingProperties.containsKey(propertyName) ?
4002              existingProperties.get(propertyName) : existingBaseProperties.get(propertyName);
4003           
4004           //it might be in the override, what about other overrides?  who knows
4005           if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(existingValue, 
4006               legacyProperties.get(propertyName))) {
4007 
4008             propertyNamesWrongValue.add(propertyName);
4009           }
4010           propertyNamesToRemove.add(propertyName);
4011         }
4012       }
4013       
4014       //if we found some, see if we can remove them
4015       if (propertyNamesToRemove.size() > 0) {
4016         
4017         if (propertyNamesWrongValue.size() > 0) {
4018 
4019           //these are properties that we different in the previous legacy file
4020           System.out.println(legacyPropertiesFileRelativePath + " has properties that have a different value than\n  the new place they are managed: "
4021               + basePropertiesFileRelativePath + ",\n  and the everride(s) which could be: " + propertiesFileRelativePath);
4022           System.out.println("Review these properties and merge the values, this could have happened due to changes in Grouper:");
4023           for (String propertyName: propertyNamesWrongValue) {
4024             System.out.println(" - " + propertyName);
4025           }
4026           System.out.println("When you are done merging press <enter>");
4027           readFromStdIn(autorunPropertiesKey);
4028 
4029         }
4030 
4031         if (removeOldCopy) {
4032           
4033           System.out.println(legacyPropertiesFileRelativePath + " is not used anymore by grouper, can it be backed up and removed (t|f)? [t]: ");
4034           boolean removeLegacy = readFromStdInBoolean(true, autorunPropertiesKeyRemoveOldKeys);
4035           if (removeLegacy) {
4036             File backupLegacy = bakFile(legacyPropertiesFile);
4037             GrouperInstallerUtils.copyFile(legacyPropertiesFile, backupLegacy, true);
4038             GrouperInstallerUtils.fileDelete(legacyPropertiesFile);
4039             System.out.println("File as removed.  Backup path: " + backupLegacy.getAbsolutePath());
4040           }
4041           
4042         } else {
4043           System.out.println(legacyPropertiesFileRelativePath + " has properties that can be removed since they are now managed in "
4044               + basePropertiesFileRelativePath);
4045           System.out.print("Would you like to have the properties automatically removed from " 
4046               + legacyPropertiesFile.getName() + " (t|f)? [t]: ");
4047           boolean removeRedundantProperties = readFromStdInBoolean(true, autorunPropertiesKeyRemoveOldKeys);
4048           
4049           if (removeRedundantProperties) {
4050             removeRedundantProperties(legacyPropertiesFile, propertyNamesToRemove);
4051           }
4052         }
4053       }
4054     }
4055   }
4056 
4057   
4058   /**
4059    * copy files if they are different from one place to another, print out statuses
4060    * @param fromDirString where to copy files from
4061    * @param toDirString where to copy files to
4062    * @param relativePathsToIgnore
4063    */
4064   public void copyFiles(String fromDirString, String toDirString, 
4065       Set<String> relativePathsToIgnore) {
4066     
4067     fromDirString = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileAddLastSlashIfNotExists(fromDirString);
4068     toDirString = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileAddLastSlashIfNotExists(toDirString);
4069 
4070     {
4071       //lets massage all the paths so they dont start or end with slash and
4072       //so they have File.separator instead of the wrong slash
4073       Set<String> tempRelativePathsToIgnore = new HashSet<String>();
4074       for (String path : GrouperInstallerUtils.nonNull(relativePathsToIgnore)) {
4075         path = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileMassagePathsNoLeadingOrTrailing(path);
4076         tempRelativePathsToIgnore.add(path);
4077       }
4078       relativePathsToIgnore = tempRelativePathsToIgnore;
4079     }
4080 
4081     int insertCount = 0;
4082     int updateCount = 0;
4083     Map<String, Boolean> relativeFilePathsChangedAndIfInsert = new LinkedHashMap<String, Boolean>();
4084 
4085     List<File> allFiles = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileListRecursive(new File(fromDirString));
4086     for (File fileToCopyFrom : allFiles) {
4087       String relativePath = null;
4088       {
4089         //get the relative path with no leading or trailing slash
4090         String path = fileToCopyFrom.getAbsolutePath();
4091         if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.filePathStartsWith(path,fromDirString)) {
4092           throw new RuntimeException("Why does path not start with fromDirString: " + path + ", " + fromDirString);
4093         }
4094         relativePath = path.substring(fromDirString.length());
4095         relativePath = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileMassagePathsNoLeadingOrTrailing(relativePath);
4096       }
4097       boolean ignore = false;
4098       
4099       //ignore paths passed in
4100       for (String pathToIgnore : relativePathsToIgnore) {
4101         if (GrouperInstallerUtils.filePathStartsWith(relativePath,pathToIgnore)) {
4102           ignore = true;
4103           break;
4104         }
4105       }
4106       
4107       if (!ignore) {
4108         
4109         //File to copy to
4110         File fileToCopyTo = new File(toDirString + relativePath);
4111         if (fileToCopyTo.exists()) {
4112           //compare contents
4113           if (GrouperInstallerUtils.contentEquals(fileToCopyFrom, fileToCopyTo)) {
4114             continue;
4115           }
4116           //not equals, make backup
4117           updateCount++;
4118 
4119           relativeFilePathsChangedAndIfInsert.put(relativePath, false);
4120 
4121           this.backupAndCopyFile(fileToCopyFrom, fileToCopyTo, false);
4122 
4123           continue;
4124         }
4125         
4126         //insert
4127         insertCount++;
4128         relativeFilePathsChangedAndIfInsert.put(relativePath, true);
4129         GrouperInstallerUtils.copyFile(fileToCopyFrom, fileToCopyTo, false);
4130         
4131       }
4132     }
4133 
4134     System.out.println("Upgrading files from: " + fromDirString + "\n  to: " + toDirString 
4135         + (GrouperInstallerUtils.length(relativePathsToIgnore) == 0 ? "" : 
4136         ("\n  ignoring paths: " + GrouperInstallerUtils.join(relativePathsToIgnore.iterator(), ", "))));
4137     System.out.println("Compared " + allFiles.size() + " files and found " 
4138         + insertCount + " adds and " + updateCount + " updates");
4139 
4140     if (insertCount > 0 || updateCount > 0) {
4141       
4142       System.out.println((insertCount + updateCount) + " files were backed up to: " + this.grouperBaseBakDir);
4143 
4144       boolean listFiles = insertCount + updateCount <= 10;
4145       if (!listFiles) {
4146         System.out.println("Do you want to see the list of files changed (t|f)? [f]: ");
4147         listFiles = readFromStdInBoolean(false, "grouperInstaller.autorun.viewListOfFilesChangedInCopy");
4148       }
4149 
4150       if (listFiles) {
4151 
4152         for (String relativeFilePathChanged : relativeFilePathsChangedAndIfInsert.keySet()) {
4153           boolean isInsert = relativeFilePathsChangedAndIfInsert.get(relativeFilePathChanged);
4154           System.out.println(relativeFilePathChanged + " was " + (isInsert ? "added" : "updated"));
4155         }
4156       }
4157     }
4158     
4159   }
4160 
4161   /**
4162    * upgrade the api
4163    */
4164   private void upgradeApi() {
4165     this.upgradeApiPreRevertPatch();
4166 
4167     System.out.println("You need to revert all patches to upgrade");
4168     this.patchRevertApi();
4169     
4170     this.upgradeApiPostRevertPatch();
4171   }
4172 
4173 
4174   /**
4175    * upgrade the api
4176    */
4177   private void upgradeApiPreRevertPatch() {
4178 
4179     //make sure existing gsh is executable and dos2unix
4180     gshExcutableAndDos2Unix(new File(gshCommand()).getParentFile().getAbsolutePath(), "existing");
4181     
4182     this.runChangeLogTempToChangeLog();
4183   }
4184   
4185   
4186   /**
4187    * upgrade the api
4188    */
4189   private void upgradeApiPostRevertPatch() {
4190 
4191     //revert patches
4192     this.upgradeClient();
4193 
4194     System.out.println("\n##################################");
4195     System.out.println("Upgrading API\n");
4196 
4197     //lets get the version of the existing jar
4198     this.originalGrouperJarVersionOrUpgradeFileVersion();
4199 
4200     this.compareAndReplaceJar(this.grouperJar, 
4201         new File(this.untarredApiDir + File.separator + "dist" + File.separator 
4202             + "lib" + File.separator + "grouper.jar"), true, null);
4203 
4204     System.out.println("\n##################################");
4205     System.out.println("Upgrading API config files\n");
4206 
4207     this.compareUpgradePropertiesFile(this.grouperBasePropertiesFile, 
4208       new File(this.untarredApiDir + File.separator + "conf" + File.separator + "grouper.base.properties"),
4209       this.grouperPropertiesFile,
4210       this.grouperExamplePropertiesFile, null, 
4211       "grouperInstaller.autorun.removeRedundantPropetiesFromGrouperProperties"
4212     );
4213       
4214     this.compareUpgradePropertiesFile(this.grouperHibernateBasePropertiesFile, 
4215         new File(this.untarredApiDir + File.separator + "conf" + File.separator + "grouper.hibernate.base.properties"),
4216         this.grouperHibernatePropertiesFile,
4217         this.grouperHibernateExamplePropertiesFile, null, 
4218         "grouperInstaller.autorun.removeRedundantPropetiesFromGrouperHibernateProperties"
4219       );
4220         
4221     this.compareUpgradePropertiesFile(this.grouperLoaderBasePropertiesFile, 
4222         new File(this.untarredApiDir + File.separator + "conf" + File.separator + "grouper-loader.base.properties"),
4223         this.grouperLoaderPropertiesFile,
4224         this.grouperLoaderExamplePropertiesFile, null,
4225         "grouperInstaller.autorun.removeRedundantPropetiesFromGrouperLoaderProperties"
4226       );
4227     
4228     this.compareUpgradePropertiesFile(this.subjectBasePropertiesFile, 
4229         new File(this.untarredApiDir + File.separator + "conf" + File.separator + "subject.base.properties"),
4230         this.subjectPropertiesFile,
4231         null, null,
4232         "grouperInstaller.autorun.removeRedundantPropetiesFromSubjectProperties"
4233       );
4234 
4235     this.upgradeEhcacheXml();
4236     this.upgradeEhcacheXmlToProperties();
4237 
4238     this.compareAndCopyFile(this.grouperUtf8File, 
4239         new File(this.untarredApiDir + File.separator + "conf" + File.separator + "grouperUtf8.txt"),
4240         true,
4241         new File(this.upgradeExistingClassesDirectoryString)
4242         );
4243     
4244     System.out.println("\nYou should compare " + this.grouperPropertiesFile.getParentFile().getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "sources.xml"
4245         + "\n  with " + this.untarredApiDir + File.separator + "conf" + File.separator + "sources.xml");
4246     System.out.println("Press <enter> to continue after you have merged the sources.xml");
4247     readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.continueAfterMergingSourcesXml");
4248     
4249     System.out.println("\n##################################");
4250     System.out.println("Upgrading API jars\n");
4251 
4252     this.upgradeJars(new File(this.untarredApiDir + File.separator + "lib" 
4253       + File.separator + "grouper" + File.separator));
4254     if (this.appToUpgrade.isApiOrganized()) {
4255 
4256       //if we need to put the jars in the jdbcSamples dir...
4257       this.upgradeJars(new File(this.untarredApiDir + File.separator + "lib" 
4258           + File.separator + "jdbcSamples" + File.separator), 
4259           new File(new File(this.upgradeExistingLibDirectoryString).getParentFile().getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "jdbcSamples"));
4260     
4261     } else {
4262     
4263       this.upgradeJars(new File(this.untarredApiDir + File.separator + "lib" 
4264           + File.separator + "jdbcSamples" + File.separator));
4265     
4266     }
4267 
4268     System.out.println("\n##################################");
4269     System.out.println("Patch API\n");
4270 
4271     //patch it
4272     this.patchApi();
4273 
4274     //make sure log4j is debugging sql statements
4275     log4jDebugSql(this.upgradeExistingClassesDirectoryString + "log4j.properties");
4276     
4277     //verify that grouper.hibernate.properties doesn't have legacy properties
4278     removeLegacyHibernateProperties(this.upgradeExistingClassesDirectoryString + "grouper.hibernate.properties");
4279     
4280     System.out.println("\n##################################");
4281     System.out.println("Upgrading DB (registry)\n");
4282 
4283     this.apiUpgradeDbVersion(true);
4284 
4285     this.apiUpgradeAdditionalGshScripts();
4286 
4287   }
4288 
4289   /**
4290    * run additional GSH scripts based on what we are upgrading from...
4291    */
4292   private void apiUpgradeAdditionalGshScripts() {
4293     GiGrouperVersion giGrouperVersion = this.originalGrouperJarVersionOrUpgradeFileVersion();
4294     if (giGrouperVersion == null) {
4295       System.out.println("Grouper jar file: " + (this.grouperJar == null ? null : this.grouperJar.getAbsolutePath()));
4296       System.out.println("ERROR, cannot find grouper version in grouper jar file, do you want to continue? (t|f)? [f]: ");
4297       boolean continueScript = readFromStdInBoolean(false, "grouperInstaller.autorun.shouldContinueAfterNoGrouperVersionFound");
4298       if (!continueScript) {
4299         System.exit(1);
4300       }
4301     }
4302 
4303     boolean lessThan2_0 = this.originalGrouperJarVersion.lessThanArg(new GiGrouperVersion("2.0.0"));
4304     {
4305       String runUsduAutorun = null;
4306       if (lessThan2_0) {
4307         System.out.println("You are upgrading from pre API version 2.0.0, do you want to run Unresolvable Subject Deletion Utility (USDU) (recommended) (t|f)? [t]: ");
4308         runUsduAutorun = "grouperInstaller.autorun.runUsduPre2.0.0";
4309       } else {
4310         System.out.println("You are upgrading from after API version 2.0.0, so you dont have to do this,\n  "
4311             + "but do you want to run Unresolvable Subject Deletion Utility (USDU) (not recommended) (t|f)? [f]: ");
4312         runUsduAutorun = "grouperInstaller.autorun.runUsduPost2.0.0";
4313       }
4314       boolean runScript = readFromStdInBoolean(lessThan2_0, runUsduAutorun);
4315       
4316       if (runScript) {
4317         
4318         //running with command on command line doenst work on linux since the args with whitespace translate to 
4319         //save the commands to a file, and runt he file
4320         StringBuilder gshCommands = new StringBuilder();
4321   
4322         //gsh 0% GrouperSession.startRootSession()
4323         //edu.internet2.middleware.grouper.GrouperSession: 6f94c99d5b0948a3be96f94f00ab4d87,'GrouperSystem','application'
4324         //gsh 1% // run USDU to resolve all the subjects with type=person
4325         //gsh 3% usdu()
4326   
4327         gshCommands.append("grouperSession = GrouperSession.startRootSession();\n");
4328         gshCommands.append("usdu();\n");
4329   
4330         File gshFile = new File(this.untarredApiDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "gshUsdu.gsh");
4331         GrouperInstallerUtils.saveStringIntoFile(gshFile, gshCommands.toString());
4332         
4333         List<String> commands = new ArrayList<String>();
4334   
4335         addGshCommands(commands);
4336         commands.add(gshFile.getAbsolutePath());
4337   
4338         System.out.println("\n##################################");
4339         System.out.println("Running USDU with command:\n  " + convertCommandsIntoCommand(commands) + "\n");
4340   
4341         GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(
4342             GrouperInstallerUtils.toArray(commands, String.class), true, true, null, 
4343            new File(this.gshCommand()).getParentFile(), null, true);
4344   
4345       }
4346     }
4347     
4348     {
4349 
4350       String autorunResolveGroupSubjects = null;
4351       if (lessThan2_0) {
4352         System.out.println("You are upgrading from pre API version 2.0.0, do you want to resolve all group subjects (recommended) (t|f)? [t]: ");
4353         autorunResolveGroupSubjects = "grouperInstaller.autorun.resolveGroupSubjectsPre2.0.0";
4354       } else {
4355         System.out.println("You are upgrading from after API version 2.0.0, so you dont have to do this,\n  "
4356             + "but do you want to resolve all group subjects (not recommended) (t|f)? [f]: ");
4357         autorunResolveGroupSubjects = "grouperInstaller.autorun.resolveGroupSubjectsPost2.0.0";
4358       }
4359       boolean runScript = readFromStdInBoolean(lessThan2_0, autorunResolveGroupSubjects);
4360       
4361       if (runScript) {
4362         
4363         //running with command on command line doenst work on linux since the args with whitespace translate to 
4364         //save the commands to a file, and runt he file
4365         StringBuilder gshCommands = new StringBuilder();
4366   
4367         //gsh 5% GrouperSession.startRootSession();
4368         //edu.internet2.middleware.grouper.GrouperSession: 4163fb08b3b24922b55a14010d48e121,'GrouperSystem','application'
4369         //gsh 6% for (String g : HibernateSession.byHqlStatic().createQuery("select uuid from Group").listSet(String.class)) { subj = SubjectFinder.findByIdAndSource(g, "g:gsa", true); GrouperDAOFactory.getFactory().getMember().findBySubject(subj).updateMemberAttributes(subj, true); }
4370   
4371         gshCommands.append("grouperSession = GrouperSession.startRootSession();\n");
4372         gshCommands.append("for (String g : HibernateSession.byHqlStatic().createQuery(\"select uuid from Group\").listSet(String.class)) { subj = SubjectFinder.findByIdAndSource(g, \"g:gsa\", true); GrouperDAOFactory.getFactory().getMember().findBySubject(subj).updateMemberAttributes(subj, true); }\n");
4373   
4374         File gshFile = new File(this.untarredApiDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "gshGroupUsdu.gsh");
4375         GrouperInstallerUtils.saveStringIntoFile(gshFile, gshCommands.toString());
4376         
4377         List<String> commands = new ArrayList<String>();
4378   
4379         addGshCommands(commands);
4380         commands.add(gshFile.getAbsolutePath());
4381   
4382         System.out.println("\n##################################");
4383         System.out.println("Resolving group subjects with command:\n  " + convertCommandsIntoCommand(commands) + "\n");
4384 
4385         GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(
4386             GrouperInstallerUtils.toArray(commands, String.class), true, true, null, 
4387            new File(this.gshCommand()).getParentFile(), null, true);
4388       }
4389     }
4390 
4391     {
4392       boolean lessThan2_1 = giGrouperVersion.lessThanArg(new GiGrouperVersion("2.1.0"));
4393       String autorunSeeRuleCheckType = null;
4394       if (lessThan2_1) {
4395         System.out.println("You are upgrading from pre API version 2.1.0, do you want to "
4396             + "see if you have rules with ruleCheckType: flattenedPermission* (recommended) (t|f)? [t]: ");
4397         autorunSeeRuleCheckType = "grouperInstaller.autorun.seeRulesFlattenedPermissionsPre2.1.0";
4398       } else {
4399         System.out.println("You are upgrading from after API version 2.1.0, so you dont have to do this,\n  "
4400             + "but do you want to see if you have rules with ruleCheckType: flattenedPermission* (not recommended) (t|f)? [f]: ");
4401         autorunSeeRuleCheckType = "grouperInstaller.autorun.seeRulesFlattenedPermissionsPost2.1.0";
4402       }
4403       boolean runScript = readFromStdInBoolean(lessThan2_1, autorunSeeRuleCheckType);
4404       
4405       if (runScript) {
4406         
4407         //running with command on command line doenst work on linux since the args with whitespace translate to 
4408         //save the commands to a file, and runt he file
4409         StringBuilder gshCommands = new StringBuilder();
4410     
4411         gshCommands.append("\"Count: \" + HibernateSession.bySqlStatic().select(int.class, \"SELECT count(*) FROM grouper_rules_v WHERE rule_check_type LIKE 'flattenedPermission%'\");\n");
4412   
4413         File gshFile = new File(this.untarredApiDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "gshRuleFlattenedPermissionCount.gsh");
4414         GrouperInstallerUtils.saveStringIntoFile(gshFile, gshCommands.toString());
4415         
4416         List<String> commands = new ArrayList<String>();
4417   
4418         addGshCommands(commands);
4419         commands.add(gshFile.getAbsolutePath());
4420   
4421         System.out.println("\n##################################");
4422         System.out.println("Counting flattenedPermission rules with command:\n  " + convertCommandsIntoCommand(commands) + "\n");
4423 
4424         CommandResult commandResult = GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(
4425           GrouperInstallerUtils.toArray(commands, String.class), true, true, null, 
4426           new File(this.gshCommand()).getParentFile(), null, true);
4427 
4428         if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getErrorText())) {
4429           System.out.println("stderr: " + commandResult.getErrorText());
4430         }
4431         if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getOutputText())) {
4432           System.out.println("stdout: " + commandResult.getOutputText());
4433         }
4434 
4435         String result = commandResult.getOutputText().trim();
4436         String[] lines = GrouperInstallerUtils.splitLines(result);
4437         {
4438           Pattern pattern = Pattern.compile("^Count: ([0-9]+)$");
4439           int count = -1;
4440           for (String line : lines) {
4441             Matcher matcher = pattern.matcher(line);
4442             if (matcher.matches()) {
4443               count = GrouperInstallerUtils.intValue(matcher.group(1));
4444               break;
4445             }
4446           }
4447           if (count == -1) {
4448             System.out.println("Error getting count of rules, would you like to continue (t|f)? [t]:");
4449             if (!readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.shouldContinueAfterErrorCountFlattenedRules")) {
4450               System.exit(1);
4451             }
4452           } else {
4453             if (count > 0) {
4454               System.out.println("You have " + count + " flattenedPermission rules that need to be removed.  You need to look in the view grouper_rules_v and notify the owners and remove these rules.  Do you want to continue (t|f)? [t]: ");
4455               
4456               if (!readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.shouldContinueAfterFoundFlattenedRules")) {
4457                 System.exit(1);
4458               }
4459             }
4460           }
4461         }
4462       }
4463     }
4464 
4465     {
4466       boolean lessThan2_2_0 = giGrouperVersion.lessThanArg(new GiGrouperVersion("2.2.0"));
4467       String autorunRun2_2gshScript = null;
4468       if (lessThan2_2_0) {
4469         System.out.println("You are upgrading from pre API version 2.2.0, "
4470             + "do you want to run the 2.2 upgrade GSH script (recommended) (t|f)? [t]: ");
4471         autorunRun2_2gshScript = "grouperInstaller.autorun.run2.2gshUpgradeScriptPre2.2.0";
4472       } else {
4473         System.out.println("You are upgrading from after API version 2.2.0, so you dont have to do this,\n  "
4474             + "but do you want to run the 2.2 upgrade GSH script (not recommended) (t|f)? [f]: ");
4475         autorunRun2_2gshScript = "grouperInstaller.autorun.run2.2gshUpgradeScriptPost2.2.0";
4476       }
4477       boolean runScript = readFromStdInBoolean(lessThan2_2_0, autorunRun2_2gshScript);
4478       
4479       if (runScript) {
4480         
4481         File gshFile = new File(this.untarredApiDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "misc" + File.separator + "postGrouper2_2Upgrade.gsh");
4482         
4483         List<String> commands = new ArrayList<String>();
4484   
4485         addGshCommands(commands);
4486         commands.add(gshFile.getAbsolutePath());
4487   
4488         System.out.println("\n##################################");
4489         System.out.println("Running 2.2 upgrade GSH with command:\n  " + convertCommandsIntoCommand(commands) + "\n");
4490   
4491         GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(
4492             GrouperInstallerUtils.toArray(commands, String.class), true, true, null, 
4493            new File(this.gshCommand()).getParentFile(), null, true);
4494   
4495       }
4496       
4497     }
4498 
4499     {
4500       boolean lessThan2_2_1 = giGrouperVersion.lessThanArg(new GiGrouperVersion("2.2.1"));
4501       String autorunRun2_2_1gshUpgradeScript = null;
4502       if (lessThan2_2_1) {
4503         System.out.println("You are upgrading from pre API version 2.2.1, do you want to "
4504             + "run the 2.2.1 upgrade GSH script (recommended) (t|f)? [t]: ");
4505         autorunRun2_2_1gshUpgradeScript = "grouperInstaller.autorun.run2.2.1gshUpgradeScriptPre2.2.1";
4506       } else {
4507         System.out.println("You are upgrading from after API version 2.2.1, so you dont have to do this,\n  "
4508             + "but do you want to run the 2.2.1 upgrade GSH script (not recommended) (t|f)? [f]: ");
4509         autorunRun2_2_1gshUpgradeScript = "grouperInstaller.autorun.run2.2.1gshUpgradeScriptPost2.2.1";
4510       }
4511       boolean runScript = readFromStdInBoolean(lessThan2_2_1, autorunRun2_2_1gshUpgradeScript);
4512       
4513       if (runScript) {
4514         
4515         File gshFile = new File(this.untarredApiDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "misc" + File.separator + "postGrouper2_2_1Upgrade.gsh");
4516         
4517         List<String> commands = new ArrayList<String>();
4518 
4519         addGshCommands(commands);
4520         commands.add(gshFile.getAbsolutePath());
4521 
4522         System.out.println("\n##################################");
4523         System.out.println("Running 2.2.1 upgrade GSH with command:\n  " + convertCommandsIntoCommand(commands) + "\n");
4524 
4525         GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(
4526             GrouperInstallerUtils.toArray(commands, String.class), true, true, null, 
4527            new File(this.gshCommand()).getParentFile(), null, true);
4528 
4529       }
4530     }
4531 
4532     {
4533       boolean lessThan2_3_0 = giGrouperVersion.lessThanArg(new GiGrouperVersion("2.3.0"));
4534       String autorunRun2_3_0gshUpgradeScript = null;
4535       if (lessThan2_3_0) {
4536         System.out.println("You are upgrading from pre API version 2.3.0, do you want to "
4537             + "run the 2.3.0 upgrade GSH script (recommended) (t|f)? [t]: ");
4538         autorunRun2_3_0gshUpgradeScript = "grouperInstaller.autorun.run2.3.0gshUpgradeScriptPre2.3.0";
4539       } else {
4540         System.out.println("You are upgrading from after API version 2.3.0, so you dont have to do this,\n  "
4541             + "but do you want to run the 2.3.0 upgrade GSH script (not recommended) (t|f)? [f]: ");
4542         autorunRun2_3_0gshUpgradeScript = "grouperInstaller.autorun.run2.3.0gshUpgradeScriptPost2.3.0";
4543       }
4544       boolean runScript = readFromStdInBoolean(lessThan2_3_0, autorunRun2_3_0gshUpgradeScript);
4545       
4546       if (runScript) {
4547         
4548         File gshFile = new File(this.untarredApiDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "misc" + File.separator + "postGrouper2_3_0Upgrade.gsh");
4549         
4550         List<String> commands = new ArrayList<String>();
4551 
4552         addGshCommands(commands);
4553         commands.add(gshFile.getAbsolutePath());
4554 
4555         System.out.println("\n##################################");
4556         System.out.println("Running 2.3.0 upgrade GSH with command:\n  " + convertCommandsIntoCommand(commands) + "\n");
4557 
4558         GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(
4559             GrouperInstallerUtils.toArray(commands, String.class), true, true, null, 
4560            new File(this.gshCommand()).getParentFile(), null, true);
4561 
4562       }
4563     }
4564 
4565   }
4566 
4567   /**
4568    * grouper version of jar
4569    */
4570   private GiGrouperVersion grouperVersionOfJar = null;
4571   
4572   /**
4573    * 
4574    * @return the version
4575    */
4576   private GiGrouperVersion grouperVersionOfJar() {
4577     if (this.grouperVersionOfJar == null) {
4578       String grouperJarVersionString = null;
4579       if (this.grouperJar != null && this.grouperJar.exists()) {
4580         grouperJarVersionString = GrouperInstallerUtils.jarVersion(this.grouperJar);
4581         
4582       } else if (this.grouperClientJar != null && this.grouperClientJar.exists()) {
4583         grouperJarVersionString = GrouperInstallerUtils.jarVersion(this.grouperClientJar);
4584         
4585       }
4586       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(grouperJarVersionString)) {
4587         this.grouperVersionOfJar = new GiGrouperVersion(grouperJarVersionString);
4588       }
4589   
4590       if (this.grouperVersionOfJar == null) {
4591         throw new RuntimeException("Cant find version of grouper! " + this.grouperJar + ", " + this.grouperClientJar);
4592       }
4593     }
4594     
4595     return this.grouperVersionOfJar;
4596   }
4597   
4598   /**
4599    * grouper jar version e.g. 2.1.5
4600    */
4601   private GiGrouperVersion originalGrouperJarVersion = null;
4602   
4603   /**
4604    * keep trac if we have found it or not
4605    */
4606   private boolean originalGrouperJarVersionRetrieved = false;
4607   
4608   /**
4609    * get the version of the grouper jar
4610    * @return the version or null if couldnt be found
4611    */
4612   private GiGrouperVersion originalGrouperJarVersionOrUpgradeFileVersion() {
4613 
4614     if (!this.originalGrouperJarVersionRetrieved) {
4615 
4616       this.originalGrouperJarVersionRetrieved = true;
4617       
4618       //lets see if an upgrade went halfway through
4619       this.grouperUpgradeOriginalVersionFile = new File(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString + "grouperUpgradeOriginalVersion.txt");
4620 
4621       this.originalGrouperJarVersion = this.grouperVersionOfJar();
4622       
4623       if (this.grouperUpgradeOriginalVersionFile.exists()) {
4624         String grouperJarVersionString = GrouperInstallerUtils.readFileIntoString(this.grouperUpgradeOriginalVersionFile);
4625         GiGrouperVersion fileGrouperJarVersion = new GiGrouperVersion(grouperJarVersionString);
4626         
4627         if (fileGrouperJarVersion != this.originalGrouperJarVersion) {
4628           
4629           System.out.println("It is detected that an upgrade did not complete from version " + fileGrouperJarVersion);
4630           this.originalGrouperJarVersion = fileGrouperJarVersion;
4631         }
4632       } else {
4633         GrouperInstallerUtils.writeStringToFile(this.grouperUpgradeOriginalVersionFile, this.originalGrouperJarVersion.toString());
4634       }
4635     }
4636     
4637     return this.originalGrouperJarVersion;
4638   }
4639   
4640   /**
4641    * file where version is kept for partial upgrades
4642    */
4643   private File grouperUpgradeOriginalVersionFile;
4644   
4645   /**
4646    * @param firstTime if first time
4647    */
4648   private void apiUpgradeDbVersion(boolean firstTime) {
4649     
4650     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValueBoolean("grouperInstaller.default.api.checkDdlVersion", true, false)) {
4651       System.out.println("Not checking DDL version since grouper.installer.properties: grouperInstaller.default.api.checkDdlVersion = false");
4652       return;
4653     }
4654 
4655     List<String> commands = new ArrayList<String>();
4656 
4657     addGshCommands(commands);
4658     commands.add("-registry");
4659     commands.add("-check");
4660     commands.add("-noprompt");
4661 
4662     System.out.println("\n##################################");
4663     System.out.println("Checking API database version with command: " + convertCommandsIntoCommand(commands) + "\n");
4664 
4665     CommandResult commandResult = GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(
4666         GrouperInstallerUtils.toArray(commands, String.class), true, true, null, 
4667         new File(this.gshCommand()).getParentFile(), null, true);
4668     
4669     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getOutputText())) {
4670       System.out.println("stdout: " + commandResult.getOutputText());
4671     }
4672     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getErrorText())) {
4673       System.out.println("stderr: " + commandResult.getErrorText());
4674     }
4675 
4676     String result = commandResult.getErrorText().trim();
4677     
4678     // Grouper ddl object type 'Grouper' has dbVersion: 27 and java version: 28
4679     // NOTE: Grouper database schema DDL may require updates, but the temp change log must 
4680     // be empty to perform an upgrade.  To process the temp change log, start up your current 
4681     // version of GSH and run: loaderRunOneJob("CHANGE_LOG_changeLogTempToChangeLog")
4682     if (result != null && result.contains("CHANGE_LOG_changeLogTempToChangeLog")) {
4683       System.out.println("You must run the change log temp to change log before upgrading.  You can start the upgrader again and run it.");
4684       System.exit(1);
4685     }
4686     
4687     String[] lines = GrouperInstallerUtils.splitLines(result);
4688     {
4689       boolean okWithVersion = false;
4690       boolean notOkWithVersion = false;
4691       for (String line : lines) {
4692         line = line.toLowerCase();
4693         //expecting stderr: NOTE: database table/object structure (ddl) is up to date
4694         if (line.contains("ddl") && line.contains("up to date") && line.contains("note:")) {
4695           okWithVersion = true;
4696         }
4697         //cant have this line
4698         if (line.contains("requires updates")) {
4699           notOkWithVersion = true;
4700         }
4701       }
4702       if (okWithVersion && !notOkWithVersion) {
4703         return;
4704       }
4705     }
4706 
4707     if (!firstTime) {
4708       System.out.println("Error: we tried to upgrade the database but it didnt work, would you like to continue skipping DDL (t|f)? ");
4709       boolean continueOn = readFromStdInBoolean(null, "grouperInstaller.autorun.shouldContinueIfErrorUpgradingDatabase");
4710       if (continueOn) {
4711         return;
4712       }
4713     }
4714     
4715     //we need to upgrade the DDL
4716     //Grouper ddl object type 'Grouper' has dbVersion: 26 and java version: 28
4717     //Grouper database schema DDL requires updates
4718     //(should run script manually and carefully, in sections, verify data before drop statements, backup/export important data before starting, follow change log on confluence, dont run exact same script in multiple envs - generate a new one for each env),
4719     //script file is:
4720     //C:\app\grouper_2_2_0_installer\grouper.apiBinary-2.2.0\ddlScripts\grouperDdl_20141014_10_17_12_577.sql
4721     //Note: this script was not executed due to option passed in
4722     //To run script via gsh, carefully review it, then run this:
4723     //gsh -registry -runsqlfile C:\\app\\grouper_2_2_0_installer\\grouper.apiBinary-2.2.0\\ddlScripts\\grouperDdl_20141014_10_17_12_577.sql
4724 
4725     System.out.println("Review the script(s) above if there are any, do you want the upgrader to run it to upgrade the DDL for you (t|f)? [t]: ");
4726     boolean runIt = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.shouldRunDdlScript");
4727     
4728     if (runIt) {
4729 
4730       boolean foundScript = false;
4731 
4732       for (String line : lines) {
4733         if (line.contains("-registry -runsqlfile")) {
4734           
4735           String regexPattern = "^[^\\s]+\\s+-registry -runsqlfile (.*)$";
4736           Pattern pattern = Pattern.compile(regexPattern);
4737           
4738           Matcher matcher = pattern.matcher(line);
4739           
4740           if (!matcher.matches()) {
4741             throw new RuntimeException("Expected " + regexPattern + " but received: " + line);
4742           }
4743 
4744           String fileName = matcher.group(1);
4745           
4746           commands = new ArrayList<String>();
4747           
4748           addGshCommands(commands);
4749           commands.add("-registry");
4750           commands.add("-noprompt");
4751           commands.add("-runsqlfile");
4752           commands.add(fileName);
4753           
4754           foundScript = true;
4755           
4756           System.out.println("\n##################################");
4757           System.out.println("Upgrading database with command: " + convertCommandsIntoCommand(commands) + "\n");
4758 
4759           commandResult = GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(
4760               GrouperInstallerUtils.toArray(commands, String.class), true, true, null, 
4761              new File(this.gshCommand()).getParentFile(), null, true);
4762 
4763           //no out/err since printing as we go
4764           System.out.println("\nDone upgrading database");
4765           System.out.println("\n##################################\n");
4766         }
4767       }
4768       //cant find script, thats ok, just check and go
4769       if (!foundScript) {
4770         throw new RuntimeException("didnt find script to to run: " + result);
4771       }
4772 
4773       //check again to make sure ok
4774       apiUpgradeDbVersion(false);
4775     }
4776   }
4777 
4778   /**
4779    * upgrade jars from a directory
4780    * @param fromDir jars from this directory
4781    */
4782   private void upgradeJars(File fromDir) {
4783     this.upgradeJars(fromDir, new File(this.upgradeExistingLibDirectoryString));
4784   }
4785   
4786   /**
4787    * upgrade jars from a directory
4788    * @param fromDir jars from this directory
4789    * @param toDir is where jars go if not there
4790    */
4791   private void upgradeJars(File fromDir, File toDir) {
4792 
4793     //for each jar in the directory
4794     if (!fromDir.exists() || !fromDir.isDirectory()) {
4795       throw new RuntimeException("Why does jar directory not exist? " + fromDir);
4796     }
4797     
4798     int changes = 0;
4799 
4800     for (File jarFile : fromDir.listFiles()) {
4801       
4802       //only do jar files
4803       if (!jarFile.getName().endsWith(".jar")) {
4804         continue;
4805       }
4806       
4807       // File existingJar = this.findLibraryFile(jarFile.getName(), false);
4808 
4809       List<File> relatedJars = null;
4810       
4811       relatedJars = GrouperInstallerUtils.jarFindJar(toDir, jarFile.getName());
4812       
4813       boolean foundFile = false;
4814       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.length(relatedJars) > 0) {
4815         
4816         for (File relatedJar : relatedJars) {
4817           if (GrouperInstallerUtils.fileSha1(relatedJar).equals(GrouperInstallerUtils.fileSha1(jarFile))) {
4818             if (relatedJar.getName().equals(jarFile.getName())) {
4819               foundFile = true;
4820               continue;
4821             }
4822           }
4823           
4824           File bakFile = bakFile(relatedJar);
4825           
4826           System.out.println("Deleting " + relatedJar.getAbsolutePath() + ", backed up to: " + bakFile.getAbsolutePath());
4827           changes++;
4828           boolean moved = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileMove(relatedJar, bakFile, false);
4829           if (!moved) {
4830             System.out.println("Non-fatal error: could not delete file: " + relatedJar.getAbsolutePath() 
4831                 + ",\ndelete this file when all processed are terminated.  Press <enter> to acknowledge this.");
4832             readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.continueAfterCantDeleteJar");
4833           }
4834         }
4835       }
4836       if (!foundFile) {
4837         changes += this.compareAndReplaceJar(null, jarFile, false, toDir) ? 1 : 0;
4838       }
4839           
4840       
4841 //      if (existingJar == null) {
4842 //        //see if one exists by another version
4843 //        if (GrouperInstallerUtils.length(relatedJars) == 1) {
4844 //          existingJar = relatedJars.get(0);
4845 //        }
4846 //      }
4847 
4848     }
4849 
4850     System.out.println("Upgraded " + changes + " jar files from: " + fromDir.getAbsolutePath()
4851         + "\n  to: " + toDir.getAbsolutePath());
4852     
4853   }
4854   
4855   /**
4856    * 
4857    */
4858   private void upgradeEhcacheXml() {
4859 
4860     //ehcache, prompt to see if do it (if difference than example, and if old example different than new example?
4861     File newEhcacheExample = new File(this.untarredApiDir + File.separator + "conf" + File.separator + "ehcache.xml");
4862 
4863     //this file is done
4864     if (!newEhcacheExample.exists() || this.ehcacheFile == null || !this.ehcacheFile.exists()) {
4865       return;
4866     }
4867     
4868     //lets see if different
4869     String existingEhcacheContents = GrouperInstallerUtils.readFileIntoString(this.ehcacheFile);
4870     String existingExampleEhcacheContents = GrouperInstallerUtils.readFileIntoString(this.ehcacheExampleFile);
4871     String newEhcacheContents = GrouperInstallerUtils.readFileIntoString(newEhcacheExample);
4872     
4873     //if existing is the same as new...
4874     if (GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(existingEhcacheContents, newEhcacheContents)) {
4875       //make sure example is up to date
4876       if (this.ehcacheExampleFile != null && !GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(existingExampleEhcacheContents, newEhcacheContents)) {
4877         this.backupAndCopyFile(newEhcacheExample, this.ehcacheExampleFile, true);
4878       }
4879 
4880       //we are all good
4881       return;
4882     }
4883 
4884     //lets backup the example and regular file
4885     File ehcacheBakFile = bakFile(this.ehcacheFile);
4886     GrouperInstallerUtils.copyFile(this.ehcacheFile, ehcacheBakFile, true);
4887 
4888     boolean mergeFiles = true;
4889     
4890     if (this.ehcacheExampleFile != null) {
4891       File ehcacheExampleBakFile = bakFile(this.ehcacheExampleFile);
4892   
4893       GrouperInstallerUtils.copyFile(this.ehcacheExampleFile, ehcacheExampleBakFile, true);
4894     } else {
4895       GrouperInstallerUtils.copyFile(newEhcacheExample, this.ehcacheFile, true);
4896       mergeFiles = false;
4897     }
4898 
4899     if (mergeFiles) {
4900       //if the ehcache is the same as the example, lets just copy
4901       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(existingEhcacheContents, existingExampleEhcacheContents)) {
4902         this.backupAndCopyFile(newEhcacheExample, this.ehcacheFile, false);
4903         if (this.ehcacheExampleFile != null) {
4904           this.backupAndCopyFile(newEhcacheExample, this.ehcacheExampleFile, false);
4905         }
4906         return;
4907       }
4908 
4909       //the ehcache file is different from the example and different from the new one, so merge it in
4910       mergeEhcacheXmlFiles(newEhcacheExample, this.ehcacheExampleFile, this.ehcacheFile);
4911     }
4912 
4913     System.out.println("Compare you old ehcache.xml with the new ehcache.xml file: " 
4914         + "\n  Old file: "
4915         + ehcacheBakFile.getAbsolutePath()
4916         + "\n  New file: " + this.ehcacheFile.getAbsolutePath()
4917         + "\n  Press <enter> when done");
4918     readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.continueAfterCompareEhcache");
4919 
4920   }
4921 
4922   /**
4923    * 
4924    */
4925   private void upgradeEhcacheXmlToProperties() {
4926 
4927     //dont do this is less than 2.3.1
4928     if (new GiGrouperVersion(this.version).lessThanArg(new GiGrouperVersion("2.3.1"))) {
4929       return;
4930     }
4931     
4932     //this file is done
4933     if (!this.ehcacheFile.exists()
4934         && this.grouperCacheBasePropertiesFile.exists() && this.grouperCachePropertiesFile.exists()) {
4935       return;
4936     }
4937     
4938     System.out.print("Do you want to convert from ehcache.xml to grouper.cache.properties, note you need to do this to upgrade (t|f)? [t]: ");
4939     boolean convert = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.convertEhcacheXmlToProperties");
4940 
4941     if (!convert) {
4942       System.out.println("Note: grouper will not run, but whatever you want to do!!!!");
4943     }
4944     
4945     if (this.grouperCachePropertiesFile.exists()) {
4946       //see if there is anything in it
4947       Properties grouperCacheProperties = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesFromFile(this.grouperCachePropertiesFile);
4948       if (grouperCacheProperties.size() > 0) {
4949         this.backupAndDeleteFile(this.grouperCachePropertiesFile, true);
4950       } else {
4951         GrouperInstallerUtils.fileDelete(this.grouperCachePropertiesFile);
4952       }
4953     }
4954 
4955     URL ehcacheXmlUrl = null;
4956     
4957     try {
4958       ehcacheXmlUrl = this.ehcacheFile.toURI().toURL();
4959     } catch (Exception e) {
4960       throw new RuntimeException("Problem with ehcache.xml: " + (this.ehcacheFile == null ? null : this.ehcacheFile.getAbsoluteFile()), e);
4961     }
4962     
4963     //convert
4964     convertEhcacheXmlToProperties(this.grouperCacheBasePropertiesFile, this.grouperCachePropertiesFile, ehcacheXmlUrl);
4965     
4966     File bakFile = bakFile(this.grouperCachePropertiesFile);
4967     GrouperInstallerUtils.copyFile(this.grouperCachePropertiesFile, bakFile, true);
4968     this.backupAndDeleteFile(this.ehcacheFile, true);
4969     this.backupAndDeleteFile(this.ehcacheExampleFile, true);
4970     
4971   }
4972 
4973   /**
4974    * 
4975    * @param newFile
4976    * @param existingFile
4977    * @param printDetails
4978    * @return the bakFile
4979    */
4980   public File backupAndCopyFile(File newFile, File existingFile, boolean printDetails) {
4981     
4982     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.contentEquals(newFile, existingFile)) {
4983       
4984       File bakFile = null;
4985           
4986       boolean fileExists = existingFile.exists();
4987       if (fileExists) {
4988         bakFile = bakFile(existingFile);
4989         GrouperInstallerUtils.copyFile(existingFile, bakFile, true);
4990         if (printDetails) {
4991           System.out.println("Backing up: " + existingFile.getAbsolutePath() + " to: " + bakFile.getAbsolutePath());
4992         }
4993       }
4994       if (printDetails) {
4995         System.out.println("Copying " + (fileExists ? "new file" : "upgraded file") + ": " + newFile.getAbsolutePath() + " to: " + existingFile.getAbsolutePath());
4996       }
4997       GrouperInstallerUtils.copyFile(newFile, existingFile, false);
4998       return bakFile;
4999       
5000     }
5001 
5002     if (printDetails) {
5003       System.out.println(existingFile.getAbsolutePath() + " has not been updated so it was not changed");
5004     }
5005     
5006     return null;
5007   }
5008 
5009   /**
5010    * @param file
5011    * @param printDetails
5012    * @return the bakFile
5013    */
5014   public File backupAndDeleteFile(File file, boolean printDetails) {
5015 
5016     if (file.exists()) {
5017 
5018       File bakFile = null;
5019 
5020       bakFile = bakFile(file);
5021       GrouperInstallerUtils.copyFile(file, bakFile, true);
5022       if (printDetails) {
5023         System.out.println("Backing up: " + file.getAbsolutePath() + " to: " + bakFile.getAbsolutePath());
5024       }
5025       if (printDetails) {
5026         System.out.println("Deleting file: " + file.getAbsolutePath());
5027       }
5028       GrouperInstallerUtils.fileDelete(file);
5029       return bakFile;
5030 
5031     }
5032 
5033     if (printDetails) {
5034       System.out.println(file + " did not exist so it was not deleted");
5035     }
5036 
5037     return null;
5038   }
5039 
5040   /**
5041    * 
5042    * @param existingFile
5043    * @return the bak file
5044    */
5045   public File bakFile(File existingFile) {
5046     String existingFilePath = existingFile.getAbsolutePath();
5047     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.filePathStartsWith(existingFilePath, this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString)) {
5048       throw new RuntimeException("Why does existing path not start with upgrade path??? " 
5049           + existingFilePath + ", " + this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString);
5050     }
5051     
5052     String bakString = this.grouperBaseBakDir 
5053         + existingFilePath.substring(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString.length());
5054 
5055     File bakFile = new File(bakString);
5056     return bakFile;
5057   }
5058   
5059   /**
5060    * @param existingBasePropertiesFile 
5061    * @param newBasePropertiesFile 
5062    * @param existingPropertiesFile 
5063    * @param existingExamplePropertiesFile 
5064    * @param propertiesToIgnore
5065    * @param autorunPropertiesKeyRemoveRedundantProperties key in properties file to automatically fill in a value
5066    */
5067   private void compareUpgradePropertiesFile(File existingBasePropertiesFile, 
5068       File newBasePropertiesFile,
5069       File existingPropertiesFile,
5070       File existingExamplePropertiesFile,
5071       Set<String> propertiesToIgnore, String autorunPropertiesKeyRemoveRedundantProperties) {
5072 
5073     boolean hadChange = false;
5074     
5075     if (!newBasePropertiesFile.exists() || !newBasePropertiesFile.isFile()) {
5076       throw new RuntimeException("Why does this file not exist? " + newBasePropertiesFile.getAbsolutePath());
5077     }
5078     
5079     //if there is an existing base properties file, compare and replace and done
5080     if (existingBasePropertiesFile != null && existingBasePropertiesFile.exists() && existingBasePropertiesFile.isFile()) {
5081       
5082       String existingBaseContents = GrouperInstallerUtils.readFileIntoString(existingBasePropertiesFile);
5083       String newBaseContents = GrouperInstallerUtils.readFileIntoString(newBasePropertiesFile);
5084       
5085       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(existingBaseContents, newBaseContents)) {
5086         
5087         String existingBasePropertiesFilePath = existingBasePropertiesFile.getAbsolutePath();
5088         if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.filePathStartsWith(existingBasePropertiesFilePath, this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString)) {
5089           throw new RuntimeException("Why does existing path not start with upgrade path??? " 
5090               + existingBasePropertiesFilePath + ", " + this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString);
5091         }
5092         
5093         String bakBasePropertiesString = this.grouperBaseBakDir + existingBasePropertiesFilePath.substring(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString.length());
5094 
5095         File bakBasePropertiesFile = new File(bakBasePropertiesString);
5096         
5097         //make sure parents exist
5098         GrouperInstallerUtils.createParentDirectories(bakBasePropertiesFile);
5099 
5100         System.out.println(existingBasePropertiesFile.getName() + " has changes and was upgraded.\n  It is backed up to " 
5101             + bakBasePropertiesFile.getAbsolutePath());
5102         
5103         hadChange = true;
5104         
5105         GrouperInstallerUtils.fileMove(existingBasePropertiesFile, bakBasePropertiesFile);
5106         
5107         GrouperInstallerUtils.copyFile(newBasePropertiesFile, existingBasePropertiesFile, true);
5108 
5109       }
5110       
5111     } else {
5112       
5113       hadChange = true;
5114       
5115       System.out.println(newBasePropertiesFile.getName() + " didn't exist and was installed.");
5116       
5117       //its null, but we dont have the path...
5118       if (existingBasePropertiesFile == null) {
5119         existingBasePropertiesFile = new File(this.upgradeExistingClassesDirectoryString + newBasePropertiesFile.getName());
5120       }
5121       GrouperInstallerUtils.copyFile(newBasePropertiesFile, existingBasePropertiesFile, true);
5122     }
5123     
5124     // if there is an example there, it can be removed
5125     if (existingExamplePropertiesFile != null && existingExamplePropertiesFile.exists() && existingExamplePropertiesFile.isFile()) {
5126 
5127       String existingExamplePropertiesFilePath = existingExamplePropertiesFile.getAbsolutePath();
5128       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.filePathStartsWith(existingExamplePropertiesFilePath, this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString)) {
5129         throw new RuntimeException("Why does existing path not start with upgrade path??? " 
5130             + existingExamplePropertiesFilePath + ", " + this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString);
5131       }
5132       
5133       String bakExamplePropertiesString = this.grouperBaseBakDir 
5134           + existingExamplePropertiesFilePath.substring(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString.length());
5135 
5136       File bakExamplePropertiesFile = new File(bakExamplePropertiesString);
5137       
5138       //make sure parents exist
5139       GrouperInstallerUtils.createParentDirectories(bakExamplePropertiesFile);
5140 
5141       System.out.println(existingExamplePropertiesFile.getName() + " is not needed and was deleted.\n  It is backed up to " 
5142           + bakExamplePropertiesFile.getAbsolutePath());
5143 
5144       GrouperInstallerUtils.fileMove(existingExamplePropertiesFile, bakExamplePropertiesFile);
5145     
5146     }
5147 
5148     if (existingPropertiesFile != null && existingPropertiesFile.exists() && existingPropertiesFile.isFile()) {
5149       
5150       // now then, if there is a properties file, we can look for duplicate configs, and remove them...
5151       Set<String> duplicateConfigPropertyNames = configPropertyDuplicates(newBasePropertiesFile, existingPropertiesFile);
5152 
5153       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.length(propertiesToIgnore) > 0 && GrouperInstallerUtils.length(duplicateConfigPropertyNames) > 0) {
5154         duplicateConfigPropertyNames.addAll(propertiesToIgnore);
5155       }
5156       
5157       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.length(duplicateConfigPropertyNames) > 0) {
5158 
5159         hadChange = true;
5160         
5161         System.out.println(existingPropertiesFile.getName() + " has " + duplicateConfigPropertyNames.size() 
5162             + " properties that can be removed since the values are the same in "
5163             + newBasePropertiesFile.getName());
5164 
5165         System.out.println("Would you like to have the " + duplicateConfigPropertyNames.size() 
5166             + " redundant properties automatically removed from " 
5167             + existingPropertiesFile.getName() + " (t|f)? [t]: ");
5168         boolean removeRedundantProperties = readFromStdInBoolean(true, autorunPropertiesKeyRemoveRedundantProperties);
5169         
5170         if (removeRedundantProperties) {
5171 
5172           String existingPropertiesFilePath = existingPropertiesFile.getAbsolutePath();
5173           if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.filePathStartsWith(existingPropertiesFilePath, this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString)) {
5174             throw new RuntimeException("Why does existing path not start with upgrade path??? " 
5175                 + existingPropertiesFilePath + ", " + this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString);
5176           }
5177           
5178           String bakPropertiesString = this.grouperBaseBakDir 
5179               + existingPropertiesFilePath.substring(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString.length());
5180 
5181           File bakPropertiesFile = new File(bakPropertiesString);
5182           
5183           //make sure parents exist
5184           GrouperInstallerUtils.createParentDirectories(bakPropertiesFile);
5185 
5186           System.out.println(existingPropertiesFile.getName() + " had redundant properties removed after being backed up to " 
5187               + bakPropertiesFile.getAbsolutePath());
5188 
5189           GrouperInstallerUtils.copyFile(existingPropertiesFile, bakPropertiesFile, true);
5190           
5191           removeRedundantProperties(existingPropertiesFile, duplicateConfigPropertyNames);
5192           
5193         }
5194       }
5195     } else {
5196       
5197       hadChange = true;
5198       
5199       //if we didnt have a properties file, create one
5200       //file is null...
5201       String contents = "\n# The " + newBasePropertiesFile.getName().replace(".base", "") 
5202           + " file uses Grouper Configuration Overlays (documented on wiki)\n"
5203           + "# By default the configuration is read from " + newBasePropertiesFile.getName() + "\n"
5204           + "# (which should not be edited), and the " +newBasePropertiesFile.getName().replace(".base", "") + " overlays\n"
5205           + "# the base settings.  See the " + newBasePropertiesFile.getName() + " for the possible\n"
5206           + "# settings that can be applied to the " + newBasePropertiesFile.getName().replace(".base", "") + "\n\n";
5207 
5208       File file = null;
5209       
5210       if (existingPropertiesFile != null) {
5211         file = existingPropertiesFile;
5212       } else if (existingBasePropertiesFile != null) {
5213         file = new File(existingBasePropertiesFile.getAbsolutePath().replace(".base", ""));
5214 //      } else {
5215 //        String fileName =  existingPropertiesFile != null ? existingPropertiesFile.getAbsolutePath() : this.upgradeExistingClassesDirectoryString + newBasePropertiesFile.getName().replace(".base", "");
5216 //        file = new File(fileName);
5217       }
5218       
5219       System.out.println("Created overlay config file: " + file.getAbsolutePath());
5220       
5221       GrouperInstallerUtils.saveStringIntoFile(file, contents);
5222     }
5223     
5224     if (!hadChange) {
5225       System.out.println("Found no changes in " + existingBasePropertiesFile.getAbsolutePath());
5226     }
5227     
5228   }
5229 
5230   /**
5231    * remove duplicate properties
5232    * @param propertiesFile
5233    * @param duplicatePropertyNames
5234    */
5235   private static void removeRedundantProperties(File propertiesFile, Set<String> duplicatePropertyNames) {
5236     
5237     String fileContents = GrouperInstallerUtils.readFileIntoString(propertiesFile);
5238     
5239     String newline = GrouperInstallerUtils.newlineFromFile(fileContents);
5240 
5241     StringBuilder newContents = new StringBuilder();
5242 
5243     String[] lines = GrouperInstallerUtils.splitLines(fileContents);
5244     
5245     boolean inStartComments = true;
5246     boolean inHeaderComments = false;
5247 
5248     StringBuilder captureHeader = new StringBuilder();
5249     StringBuilder propertyAndComments = new StringBuilder();
5250     
5251     for (String line: lines) {
5252       
5253       line = line.trim();
5254       
5255       boolean isBlank = GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(line);
5256       boolean isComment = line.startsWith("#");
5257       boolean isSingleComment = line.startsWith("#") && !line.startsWith("##");
5258       boolean isHeaderComment = line.contains("#####");
5259       boolean isProperty = !isBlank && !isComment;
5260       
5261       //if in header then we are done with the start comments
5262       if (isHeaderComment) {
5263         inStartComments = false;
5264       }
5265 
5266       //we want to keep the start comments
5267       if (inStartComments) {
5268         
5269         if (isBlank || isComment) {
5270           newContents.append(line).append(newline);
5271           continue;
5272         }
5273         inStartComments = false;
5274       }
5275 
5276       //we are done with headers
5277       if (isProperty || isBlank || isSingleComment) {
5278         inHeaderComments = false;
5279       }
5280 
5281       if (isHeaderComment) {
5282         //if header and in headers, then we arent in headers
5283         if (inHeaderComments) {
5284           inHeaderComments = false;
5285         } else {
5286           //if this is a header, and we arent in headers, then we are in headers
5287           inHeaderComments = true;          
5288           captureHeader.setLength(0);
5289         }
5290       }
5291 
5292       if (isHeaderComment || inHeaderComments) {
5293         propertyAndComments.setLength(0);
5294         captureHeader.append(line).append(newline);
5295         continue;
5296       }
5297       
5298       if (isProperty) {
5299         
5300         //get the property
5301         int equalsIndex = line.indexOf('=');
5302         if (equalsIndex == -1) {
5303           //uh... ignore this... 
5304           System.out.println("Invalid line removed from properties file: " + propertiesFile.getAbsolutePath() + ":\n  " + line);
5305           continue;
5306         }
5307         
5308         String propertyName = line.substring(0, equalsIndex).trim();
5309         //unescape colons...
5310         if (duplicatePropertyNames.contains(propertyName) || duplicatePropertyNames.contains(propertyName.replace("\\:", ":"))) {
5311           propertyAndComments.setLength(0);
5312           //remove it!
5313           continue;
5314         }
5315 
5316         //keep it
5317         propertyAndComments.append(line).append(newline);
5318 
5319         //we need a header if there is one
5320         if (captureHeader.length() > 0) {
5321           newContents.append(newline);
5322           newContents.append(captureHeader);
5323           captureHeader.setLength(0);
5324         }
5325 
5326         //append the property and contents
5327         newContents.append(propertyAndComments);
5328 
5329         propertyAndComments.setLength(0);
5330         continue;
5331       }
5332       
5333       //must be whitespace or comment...
5334       propertyAndComments.append(line).append(newline);
5335     }
5336     
5337     GrouperInstallerUtils.saveStringIntoFile(propertiesFile, newContents.toString());
5338     
5339   }
5340   
5341   /**
5342    * 
5343    * @param file1
5344    * @param file2
5345    * @return the property names which are the same
5346    */
5347   @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
5348   public static Set<String> configPropertyDuplicates(File file1, File file2) {
5349     Properties file1properties = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesFromFile(file1);
5350     Properties file2properties = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesFromFile(file2);
5351     
5352     Set<String> duplicatePropertyNames = new LinkedHashSet<String>();
5353     
5354     for (String propertyName : (Set<String>)(Object)file2properties.keySet()) {
5355       
5356       String file1Value = GrouperInstallerUtils.trimToEmpty(file1properties.getProperty(propertyName));
5357       String file2Value = GrouperInstallerUtils.trimToEmpty(file2properties.getProperty(propertyName));
5358       
5359       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(file1Value, file2Value)) {
5360         duplicatePropertyNames.add(propertyName);
5361       }
