5362       
5363     }
5364     return duplicatePropertyNames;
5365   }
5366   
5367   
5368   /**
5369    * the location of the existing installation, must end in file separator
5370    */
5371   private String upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString;
5372   
5373   /**
5374    * 
5375    */
5376   private static enum AppToUpgrade {
5377     
5378     /**
5379      * upgrading the UI
5380      */
5381     UI {
5382 
5383       @Override
5384       public void patchStatus(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5385         grouperInstaller.patchStatusUi();
5386       }
5387 
5388       @Override
5389       public void patch(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5390         grouperInstaller.patchUi();
5391       }
5392 
5393       @Override
5394       public void revertPatch(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5395         grouperInstaller.patchRevertUi();
5396       }
5397 
5398       @Override
5399       public boolean validateExistingDirectory(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5400         //API and client are in the UI
5401         if (!API.validateExistingDirectory(grouperInstaller)) {
5402           return false;
5403         }
5404         
5405         //no need to check if it exists... its new in 2.2
5406 
5407         //grouperInstaller.mediaPropertiesFile = grouperInstaller.findClasspathFile("media.properties", false);
5408 
5409         //media should be there, but not forever
5410         
5411         return true;
5412       }
5413 
5414       @Override
5415       public void downloadAndBuildGrouperProjects(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5416         API.downloadAndBuildGrouperProjects(grouperInstaller);
5417         
5418         //####################################
5419         //download and configure ui
5420         grouperInstaller.downloadAndConfigureUi();
5421 
5422         //####################################
5423         //get ant
5424         grouperInstaller.downloadAndUnzipAnt();
5425 
5426         //####################################
5427         //build UI
5428         grouperInstaller.buildUi(false);
5429 
5430         File serverXml = null;
5431         for (int i=0;i<10;i++) {
5432           String defaultServerXml = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("grouperInstaller.default.ui.server.xml", false);
5433           System.out.println("What is the location of your tomcat server.xml for the UI?  "
5434               + "Note, if you dont use tomcat just leave it blank or type 'blank': " 
5435               + (GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(defaultServerXml) ? "" : ("[" + defaultServerXml + "]: ")));
5436           String serverXmlLocation = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.locationOfTomcatServerXml");
5437           
5438           if (GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(defaultServerXml, "blank")) {
5439             defaultServerXml = null;
5440             break;
5441           }
5442           
5443           if (GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(serverXmlLocation)) {
5444             if (GrouperInstallerUtils.isNotBlank(defaultServerXml)) {
5445               serverXmlLocation = defaultServerXml;
5446             } else {
5447               break;
5448             }
5449           }
5450           serverXml = new File(serverXmlLocation);
5451           if (serverXml.exists() && serverXml.isFile()) {
5452             break;
5453           }
5454           if (i != 9) {
5455             System.out.println("Error: server.xml cant be found, try again.");
5456           }
5457         }
5458         if (serverXml != null && serverXml.exists() && serverXml.isFile()) {
5459           grouperInstaller.configureTomcatUriEncoding(serverXml);
5460         }
5461                 
5462       }
5463 
5464       @Override
5465       public void upgradeApp(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5466         grouperInstaller.upgradeUi();
5467       }
5468 
5469       @Override
5470       public void fixIndexFile(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5471         grouperInstaller.fixIndexFileUi();
5472       }
5473 
5474       @Override
5475       public boolean isApiOrganized() {
5476         return false;
5477       }
5478     },
5479     
5480     /**
5481      * upgrading the API
5482      */
5483     API {
5484 
5485       @Override
5486       public boolean validateExistingDirectory(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5487 
5488         //client is in the API
5489         if (!CLIENT.validateExistingDirectory(grouperInstaller)) {
5490           return false;
5491         }
5492         
5493         grouperInstaller.subjectPropertiesFile = grouperInstaller.findClasspathFile("subject.properties", false);
5494         grouperInstaller.subjectBasePropertiesFile = grouperInstaller.findClasspathFile("subject.base.properties", false);
5495 
5496         grouperInstaller.grouperUtf8File = grouperInstaller.findClasspathFile("grouperUtf8.txt", false);
5497 
5498         //no need to check if it exists... its new in 2.2
5499         
5500         grouperInstaller.grouperPropertiesFile = grouperInstaller.findClasspathFile("grouper.properties", false);
5501         grouperInstaller.grouperBasePropertiesFile = grouperInstaller.findClasspathFile("grouper.base.properties", false);
5502         grouperInstaller.grouperExamplePropertiesFile = grouperInstaller.findClasspathFile("grouper.example.properties", false);
5503 
5504         if (grouperInstaller.grouperBasePropertiesFile == null 
5505             && grouperInstaller.grouperPropertiesFile == null 
5506             && grouperInstaller.grouperExamplePropertiesFile == null) {
5507           return false;
5508         }
5509         
5510         grouperInstaller.grouperHibernatePropertiesFile = grouperInstaller.findClasspathFile("grouper.hibernate.properties", false);
5511         grouperInstaller.grouperHibernateBasePropertiesFile = grouperInstaller.findClasspathFile("grouper.hibernate.base.properties", false);
5512         grouperInstaller.grouperHibernateExamplePropertiesFile = grouperInstaller.findClasspathFile("grouper.hibernate.example.properties", false);
5513 
5514         if (grouperInstaller.grouperHibernateBasePropertiesFile == null 
5515             && grouperInstaller.grouperHibernatePropertiesFile == null 
5516             && grouperInstaller.grouperHibernateExamplePropertiesFile == null) {
5517           return false;
5518         }
5519         
5520         grouperInstaller.grouperLoaderPropertiesFile = grouperInstaller.findClasspathFile("grouper-loader.properties", false);
5521         grouperInstaller.grouperLoaderBasePropertiesFile = grouperInstaller.findClasspathFile("grouper-loader.base.properties", false);
5522         grouperInstaller.grouperLoaderExamplePropertiesFile = grouperInstaller.findClasspathFile("grouper-loader.example.properties", false);
5523 
5524         if (grouperInstaller.grouperLoaderBasePropertiesFile == null 
5525             && grouperInstaller.grouperLoaderPropertiesFile == null 
5526             && grouperInstaller.grouperLoaderExamplePropertiesFile == null) {
5527           return false;
5528         }
5529         
5530         grouperInstaller.grouperCachePropertiesFile = grouperInstaller.findClasspathFile("grouper.cache.properties", false);
5531         grouperInstaller.grouperCacheBasePropertiesFile = grouperInstaller.findClasspathFile("grouper.cache.base.properties", false);
5532 
5533 //        //these must exist after 2.3.1+
5534 //        if (grouperInstaller.grouperCacheBasePropertiesFile == null 
5535 //            && grouperInstaller.grouperCachePropertiesFile == null 
5536 //            && new GiGrouperVersion(grouperInstaller.version).greaterOrEqualToArg(new GiGrouperVersion("2.3.1"))
5537 //            ) {
5538 //          return false;
5539 //        }
5540 
5541         //this must exist
5542         grouperInstaller.grouperJar = grouperInstaller.findLibraryFile("grouper.jar", false);
5543         if (grouperInstaller.grouperJar == null) {
5544           return false;
5545         }
5546 
5547         grouperInstaller.ehcacheFile = grouperInstaller.findClasspathFile("ehcache.xml", false);
5548         grouperInstaller.ehcacheExampleFile = grouperInstaller.findClasspathFile("ehcache.example.xml", false);        
5549         
5550         //all good
5551         return true;
5552       }
5553 
5554       @Override
5555       public void downloadAndBuildGrouperProjects(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5556         CLIENT.downloadAndBuildGrouperProjects(grouperInstaller);
5557         
5558         //download api and set executable and dos2unix etc
5559         grouperInstaller.downloadAndConfigureApi();
5560 
5561       }
5562 
5563       @Override
5564       public void upgradeApp(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5565         grouperInstaller.upgradeApi();
5566       }
5567 
5568       @Override
5569       public void patch(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5570         grouperInstaller.patchApi();
5571       }
5572 
5573       @Override
5574       public void revertPatch(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5575         grouperInstaller.patchRevertApi();
5576       }
5577 
5578       @Override
5579       public void patchStatus(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5580         grouperInstaller.patchStatusApi();
5581       }
5582 
5583       @Override
5584       public void fixIndexFile(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5585         grouperInstaller.fixIndexFileApi();
5586       }
5587 
5588       @Override
5589       public boolean isApiOrganized() {
5590         return true;
5591       }
5592     },
5593 
5594     /**
5595      * upgrading the client
5596      */
5597     CLIENT {
5598 
5599       @Override
5600       public void patchStatus(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5601         throw new RuntimeException("Cant patch status client.  Client patches will be in the API if applicable");
5602       }
5603 
5604       @Override
5605       public void patch(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5606         throw new RuntimeException("Cant patch client.  Client patches will be in the API if applicable");
5607       }
5608 
5609       @Override
5610       public void revertPatch(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5611         throw new RuntimeException("Cant revert client.  Client patches will be in the API if applicable");
5612       }
5613 
5614       @Override
5615       public boolean validateExistingDirectory(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5616 
5617         grouperInstaller.grouperClientPropertiesFile = grouperInstaller.findClasspathFile("grouper.client.properties", false);
5618         grouperInstaller.grouperClientBasePropertiesFile = grouperInstaller.findClasspathFile("grouper.client.base.properties", false);
5619         grouperInstaller.grouperClientExamplePropertiesFile = grouperInstaller.findClasspathFile("grouper.client.example.properties", false);
5620 
5621         if (grouperInstaller.grouperClientBasePropertiesFile == null 
5622             && grouperInstaller.grouperClientPropertiesFile == null 
5623             && grouperInstaller.grouperClientExamplePropertiesFile == null) {
5624           if (grouperInstaller.appToUpgrade == CLIENT) {
5625             return false;
5626           }
5627         }
5628         
5629         //this must exist
5630         grouperInstaller.grouperClientJar = grouperInstaller.findLibraryFile("grouperClient.jar", false);
5631         if (grouperInstaller.grouperClientJar == null) {
5632           if (grouperInstaller.appToUpgrade == CLIENT) {
5633             return false;
5634           }
5635         }
5636         
5637         //all good
5638         return true;
5639       }
5640 
5641       @Override
5642       public void downloadAndBuildGrouperProjects(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5643         grouperInstaller.downloadAndBuildClient();
5644       }
5645 
5646       @Override
5647       public void upgradeApp(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5648         grouperInstaller.upgradeClient();
5649       }
5650       
5651       @Override
5652       public void fixIndexFile(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5653         throw new RuntimeException("Not implemented");
5654       }
5655 
5656       @Override
5657       public boolean isApiOrganized() {
5658         return false;
5659       }
5660     },
5661 
5662     /**
5663      * upgrading the WS
5664      */
5665     WS {
5666 
5667       @Override
5668       public void patchStatus(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5669         grouperInstaller.patchStatusWs();
5670       }
5671 
5672       @Override
5673       public void patch(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5674         grouperInstaller.patchWs();
5675       }
5676 
5677       @Override
5678       public void revertPatch(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5679         grouperInstaller.patchRevertWs();
5680       }
5681 
5682       @Override
5683       public boolean validateExistingDirectory(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5684         //API and client are in the UI
5685         if (!API.validateExistingDirectory(grouperInstaller)) {
5686           return false;
5687         }
5688 
5689         grouperInstaller.grouperWsPropertiesFile = grouperInstaller.findClasspathFile("grouper-ws.properties", false);
5690         grouperInstaller.grouperWsBasePropertiesFile = grouperInstaller.findClasspathFile("grouper-ws.base.properties", false);
5691         grouperInstaller.grouperWsExamplePropertiesFile = grouperInstaller.findClasspathFile("grouper-ws.example.properties", false);
5692 
5693         if (grouperInstaller.grouperWsBasePropertiesFile == null 
5694             && grouperInstaller.grouperWsPropertiesFile == null 
5695             && grouperInstaller.grouperWsExamplePropertiesFile == null) {
5696           return false;
5697         }
5698 
5699         return true;
5700       }
5701 
5702       @Override
5703       public void downloadAndBuildGrouperProjects(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5704         API.downloadAndBuildGrouperProjects(grouperInstaller);
5705         
5706         //####################################
5707         //download and configure ws
5708         grouperInstaller.downloadAndConfigureWs();
5709 
5710         //####################################
5711         //get ant
5712         grouperInstaller.downloadAndUnzipAnt();
5713 
5714         //####################################
5715         //build Ws
5716         grouperInstaller.buildWs(false);
5717 
5718       }
5719 
5720       @Override
5721       public void upgradeApp(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5722         grouperInstaller.upgradeWs();
5723       }
5724 
5725       @Override
5726       public void fixIndexFile(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5727         grouperInstaller.fixIndexFileWs();
5728       }
5729 
5730       @Override
5731       public boolean isApiOrganized() {
5732         return false;
5733       }
5734     }, 
5735     
5736     /**
5737      * upgrading the UI
5738      */
5739     PSP {
5740 
5741       @Override
5742       public void patchStatus(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5743         grouperInstaller.patchStatusPsp();
5744       }
5745 
5746       @Override
5747       public void patch(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5748         grouperInstaller.patchPsp();
5749       }
5750 
5751       @Override
5752       public void revertPatch(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5753         grouperInstaller.patchRevertPsp();
5754       }
5755 
5756       @Override
5757       public boolean validateExistingDirectory(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5758         //API and client are in the UI
5759         if (!API.validateExistingDirectory(grouperInstaller)) {
5760           return false;
5761         }
5762         
5763         File customLibDir = new File(grouperInstaller.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString + "lib" + File.separator + "custom");
5764         if (!customLibDir.exists()) {
5765           return false;
5766         }
5767 
5768         //see if psp jar is there
5769         List<File> files = GrouperInstallerUtils.jarFindJar(customLibDir, "psp.jar");
5770                 
5771         if (GrouperInstallerUtils.length(files) == 0) {
5772           return false;
5773         }
5774 
5775         return true;
5776       }
5777     
5778       @Override
5779       public void downloadAndBuildGrouperProjects(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5780         API.downloadAndBuildGrouperProjects(grouperInstaller);
5781         
5782         //####################################
5783         //download and configure psp
5784         grouperInstaller.downloadAndBuildPsp();
5785     
5786       }
5787     
5788       @Override
5789       public void upgradeApp(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5790         grouperInstaller.upgradePsp();
5791       }
5792 
5793       @Override
5794       public void fixIndexFile(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5795         grouperInstaller.fixIndexFilePsp();
5796       }
5797       @Override
5798       public boolean isApiOrganized() {
5799         return true;
5800       }
5801     }, 
5802     
5803     /**
5804      * upgrading the UI
5805      */
5806     PSPNG {
5807     
5808       @Override
5809       public void patchStatus(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5810         grouperInstaller.patchStatusPspng();
5811       }
5812     
5813       @Override
5814       public void patch(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5815         grouperInstaller.patchPspng();
5816       }
5817     
5818       @Override
5819       public void revertPatch(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5820         grouperInstaller.patchRevertPspng();
5821       }
5822     
5823       @Override
5824       public boolean validateExistingDirectory(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5825         //API and client are in the UI
5826         if (!API.validateExistingDirectory(grouperInstaller)) {
5827           return false;
5828         }
5829         
5830         File customLibDir = new File(grouperInstaller.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString + "lib" + File.separator + "custom");
5831         if (!customLibDir.exists()) {
5832           return false;
5833         }
5834     
5835         //see if psp jar is there
5836         String grouperVersion = grouperInstaller.grouperVersionOfJar().toString();
5837 
5838         List<File> files = GrouperInstallerUtils.jarFindJar(customLibDir, "grouper-pspng-" + grouperVersion + ".jar");
5839 
5840         if (GrouperInstallerUtils.length(files) == 0) {
5841           return false;
5842         }
5843     
5844         return true;
5845       }
5846     
5847       @Override
5848       public void downloadAndBuildGrouperProjects(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5849         API.downloadAndBuildGrouperProjects(grouperInstaller);
5850         
5851         //####################################
5852         //download and configure psp
5853         grouperInstaller.downloadAndBuildPspng();
5854     
5855       }
5856     
5857       @Override
5858       public void upgradeApp(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5859         grouperInstaller.upgradePspng();
5860       }
5861     
5862       @Override
5863       public void fixIndexFile(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5864         grouperInstaller.fixIndexFilePspng();
5865       }
5866       @Override
5867       public boolean isApiOrganized() {
5868         return true;
5869       }
5870     };
5871 
5872     /**
5873      * if the organization is API organzied (e.g. has lib/jdbcSamples dir)
5874      * @return true/false
5875      */
5876     public abstract boolean isApiOrganized();
5877     
5878     /**
5879      * validate that the existing directory is valid, and find all the file paths
5880      * @param grouperInstaller 
5881      * @return true if valid, false if not
5882      */
5883     public abstract boolean validateExistingDirectory(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller);
5884     
5885     /**
5886      * based on what is being upgraded, download and build the grouper projects
5887      * @param grouperInstaller
5888      */
5889     public abstract void downloadAndBuildGrouperProjects(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller);
5890     
5891     /**
5892      * upgrade this app
5893      * @param grouperInstaller
5894      */
5895     public abstract void upgradeApp(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller);
5896     
5897     /**
5898      * patch this app
5899      * @param grouperInstaller
5900      */
5901     public abstract void patch(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller);
5902     
5903     /**
5904      * revert patch this app
5905      * @param grouperInstaller
5906      */
5907     public abstract void revertPatch(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller);
5908     
5909     /**
5910      * patch status for this app
5911      * @param grouperInstaller
5912      */
5913     public abstract void patchStatus(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller);
5914     
5915     /**
5916      * fix index file for this app
5917      * @param grouperInstaller
5918      */
5919     public abstract void fixIndexFile(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller);
5920     
5921     /**
5922      * 
5923      * @param string
5924      * @param exceptionOnNotFound
5925      * @return the enum of what to upgrade
5926      */
5927     public static AppToUpgrade valueOfIgnoreCase(String string, boolean exceptionOnNotFound) {
5928       return GrouperInstallerUtils.enumValueOfIgnoreCase(AppToUpgrade.class, string, exceptionOnNotFound);
5929     }
5930     
5931   }
5932 
5933   /**
5934    * patch names installed (used for dependency checking), without the file ending e.g. grouper_v2_2_1_api_patch_0
5935    */
5936   private Set<String> patchesInstalled = new HashSet<String>();
5937   
5938   /**
5939    * if grouper is stopped
5940    */
5941   private boolean grouperStopped = false;
5942 
5943   /**
5944    * if should revert all
5945    */
5946   private Boolean revertAllPatches = null;
5947   
5948   /**
5949    * default for revert all patches
5950    */
5951   private boolean revertAllPatchesDefault = false;
5952   
5953   /**
5954    * if should revert all
5955    */
5956   private Boolean installAllPatches = null;
5957   
5958   /**
5959    * revert patches for an app
5960    * @param thisAppToRevert
5961    * @return if reverted
5962    */
5963   private boolean revertPatches(AppToUpgrade thisAppToRevert) {
5964 
5965     if (thisAppToRevert == AppToUpgrade.CLIENT) {
5966       throw new RuntimeException("Cant revert " + thisAppToRevert);
5967     }
5968     
5969     Properties patchesExistingProperties = patchExistingProperties();
5970     
5971     String grouperVersion = this.grouperVersionOfJar().toString();
5972 
5973     grouperVersion = GrouperInstallerUtils.replace(grouperVersion, ".", "_");
5974 
5975     Map<Integer, String> patchNumberToNameBase = new LinkedHashMap<Integer, String>();
5976     
5977     boolean foundPatch = false;
5978 
5979     Map<String, Set<String>> installedPatchDependencies = new HashMap<String, Set<String>>();
5980     
5981     File patchExistingPropertiesFile = patchExistingPropertiesFile();
5982     
5983     for (int i=1000;i>=0;i--) {
5984       
5985       //grouper_v2_2_1_api_patch_0.state
5986       String keyBase = "grouper_v" + grouperVersion + "_" + thisAppToRevert.name().toLowerCase() + "_patch_" + i;
5987       String key = keyBase + ".state";
5988 
5989       patchNumberToNameBase.put(i, keyBase);
5990       
5991       String value = patchesExistingProperties.getProperty(key);
5992 
5993       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(value)) {
5994         
5995         System.out.println("\n################ Checking patch " + keyBase);
5996 
5997         GrouperInstallerPatchStatus grouperInstallerPatchStatus = GrouperInstallerPatchStatus.valueOfIgnoreCase(value, true, true);
5998         
5999         switch (grouperInstallerPatchStatus) {
6000           case skippedPermanently:
6001             
6002             System.out.println("Patch: " + keyBase + ": was skipped permanently on: " + patchesExistingProperties.getProperty(keyBase + ".date") + "\n");
6003             continue;
6004 
6005           case skippedTemporarily:
6006 
6007             System.out.println("Patch: " + keyBase + ": was skipped termporarily on: " + patchesExistingProperties.getProperty(keyBase + ".date") + "\n");
6008             continue;
6009 
6010           case reverted:
6011 
6012             System.out.println("Patch: " + keyBase + ": was removed on: " + patchesExistingProperties.getProperty(keyBase + ".date") + "\n");
6013             continue;
6014 
6015           case error:
6016 
6017             System.out.println("Patch: " + keyBase + ": had an error installing on: " + patchesExistingProperties.getProperty(keyBase + ".date") + "\n");
6018             continue;
6019 
6020           case applied:
6021             
6022             System.out.println("Patch: " + keyBase + ": was applied on: " + patchesExistingProperties.getProperty(keyBase + ".date")  + "\n");
6023             this.patchesInstalled.add(keyBase);
6024             break;
6025 
6026           default:
6027             throw new RuntimeException("Not expecting: " + grouperInstallerPatchStatus);
6028         }
6029 
6030       } else {
6031         continue;
6032       }
6033 
6034       if (!this.patchesInstalled.contains(keyBase)) {
6035         System.out.println("\n");
6036         continue;
6037       }
6038 
6039       //lets see if it exists on the server
6040       File patchUntarredDir = downloadAndUnzipPatch(keyBase);
6041       
6042       //if no more patches
6043       if (patchUntarredDir == null) {
6044         System.out.print("Error: cant find directory for patch: " + keyBase + ", press <enter> to continue");
6045         readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.continueAfterCantFindPatchDir");
6046         continue;
6047       }
6048 
6049       //lets get the description:
6050       //  # will show up on screen so user knows what it is
6051       //  description = This patch fixes GRP-1080: browse folders refresh button only works in chrome, not other browsers
6052       //
6053       //  # patches that this patch is dependant on (comma separated)
6054       //  dependencies = 
6055       //
6056       //  # low, medium, or high risk to applying the patch
6057       //  risk = low
6058       //
6059       //  # is this is a security patch (true or false)
6060       //  security = false
6061       //
6062       //  # if this patch requires restart of processes (true or false)
6063       //  requiresRestart = false
6064       Properties patchProperties = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesFromFile(new File(patchUntarredDir.getAbsoluteFile() + File.separator + keyBase + ".properties"));
6065 
6066       foundPatch = true;
6067 
6068       // check dependencies
6069       {
6070         List<String> dependencies = GrouperInstallerUtils.splitTrimToList(patchProperties.getProperty("dependencies"), ",");
6071         Set<String> dependenciesSet = new HashSet<String>(GrouperInstallerUtils.nonNull(dependencies));
6072         installedPatchDependencies.put(keyBase, dependenciesSet);
6073       }
6074 
6075       boolean securityRelated = GrouperInstallerUtils.booleanValue(patchProperties.getProperty("security"), false);
6076       boolean requiresRestart = GrouperInstallerUtils.booleanValue(patchProperties.getProperty("requiresRestart"), true);
6077 
6078       if (this.revertAllPatches == null) {
6079         System.out.println("Would you like to revert all patches (t|f)? [" + (this.revertAllPatchesDefault ? "t" : "f") + "]: ");
6080         this.revertAllPatches = readFromStdInBoolean(this.revertAllPatchesDefault, "grouperInstaller.autorun.revertAllPatches");
6081       }
6082       
6083       //print description
6084       System.out.println("Patch " + keyBase + " is " + patchProperties.getProperty("risk") + " risk, "
6085           + (securityRelated ? "is a security patch" : "is not a security patch"));
6086       System.out.println(patchProperties.getProperty("description"));
6087       if (!this.revertAllPatches) {
6088         System.out.print("Would you like to revert patch " + keyBase + " (t|f)? [f]: ");
6089         boolean revertPatch = readFromStdInBoolean(false, "grouperInstaller.autorun.revertPatch");
6090 
6091         if (!revertPatch) {
6092           System.out.println("");
6093           continue;
6094         }
6095       }
6096       //check dependencies
6097       for (String patchName : installedPatchDependencies.keySet()) {
6098         
6099         Set<String> dependencies = GrouperInstallerUtils.nonNull(installedPatchDependencies.get(patchName));
6100         
6101         if (dependencies.contains(keyBase)) {
6102           System.out.println("Error: cant revert " + keyBase + " because an installed patch is dependent on it: " + patchName);
6103           System.exit(1);
6104         }
6105       }
6106 
6107       if (requiresRestart && !this.grouperStopped) {
6108         System.out.println("This patch requires all processes that user Grouper to be stopped.\n  "
6109             + "Please stop these processes if they are running and press <enter> to continue...");
6110         this.grouperStopped = true;
6111         readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.continueAfterStoppingGrouperProcesses");
6112       }
6113       
6114       Map<String, String> patchDirToApplicationPath = new LinkedHashMap<String, String>();
6115       patchDirToApplicationPath.put("files", this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString);
6116       patchDirToApplicationPath.put("classes", this.upgradeExistingClassesDirectoryString);
6117       patchDirToApplicationPath.put("lib", this.upgradeExistingLibDirectoryString);
6118 
6119       boolean patchHasProblem = false;
6120       
6121       //we are reverting this patch, lets see if the files are there...
6122       //this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString
6123       //patchUntarredDir
6124       File newDir = new File(patchUntarredDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "new");
6125       File oldDir = new File(patchUntarredDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "old");
6126       {
6127 
6128         for (String patchDir : patchDirToApplicationPath.keySet()) {
6129 
6130           String applicationPath = patchDirToApplicationPath.get(patchDir);
6131 
6132           File newDirFiles = new File(newDir.getAbsoluteFile() + File.separator + patchDir);
6133           File oldDirFiles = new File(oldDir.getAbsoluteFile() + File.separator + patchDir);
6134           
6135           if (newDirFiles.exists() && newDirFiles.isDirectory()) {
6136 
6137             // relative, e.g. WEB-INF/jsp/someFile.jsp
6138             Set<String> newFileRelativePaths = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileDescendantRelativePaths(newDirFiles);
6139 
6140             for (String newFilePath : GrouperInstallerUtils.nonNull(newFileRelativePaths)) {
6141               File newFileInPatch = new File(newDirFiles.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + newFilePath);
6142               File oldFileInPatch = new File(oldDirFiles.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + newFilePath);
6143 
6144               File newFileInGrouper = new File(applicationPath + newFilePath);
6145 
6146               if (!newFileInGrouper.exists() || !newFileInGrouper.isFile() 
6147                   || (!GrouperInstallerUtils.contentEquals(newFileInPatch, newFileInGrouper)
6148                       //its ok if the patch is already reverted?
6149                       && !GrouperInstallerUtils.contentEquals(oldFileInPatch, newFileInGrouper))) {
6150                 
6151                 System.out.print("Problem reverting patch since this patch file:\n  " + newFileInPatch.getAbsolutePath() 
6152                     + "\n  is not the same as what the patch expects:\n  " + newFileInGrouper.getAbsolutePath()
6153                     + "\n  Do you want to force revert this patch (t|f)? [f]: ");
6154                 
6155                 boolean forceRevertPatch = readFromStdInBoolean(false, "grouperInstaller.autorun.forceRevertPatch");
6156                 
6157                 if (!forceRevertPatch) {
6158                   System.out.println("\nCannot revert patch since this patch file:\n  " + newFileInPatch.getAbsolutePath() 
6159                       + "\n  is not the same as what the patch expects:\n  " + newFileInGrouper.getAbsolutePath());
6160                   patchHasProblem = true;
6161                 }
6162               }
6163             }
6164           }
6165         }
6166       }
6167 
6168       {
6169         //deletes
6170         for (String patchDir : patchDirToApplicationPath.keySet()) {
6171 
6172           String applicationPath = patchDirToApplicationPath.get(patchDir);
6173 
6174           File newDirFiles = new File(newDir.getAbsoluteFile() + File.separator + patchDir);
6175           File oldDirFiles = new File(oldDir.getAbsoluteFile() + File.separator + patchDir);
6176           
6177           if (oldDirFiles.exists() && oldDirFiles.isDirectory()) {
6178 
6179             // relative, e.g. WEB-INF/jsp/someFile.jsp
6180             Set<String> oldFileRelativePaths = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileDescendantRelativePaths(oldDirFiles);
6181 
6182             for (String oldFilePath : GrouperInstallerUtils.nonNull(oldFileRelativePaths)) {
6183               File newFileInPatch = new File(newDirFiles.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + oldFilePath);
6184               File oldFileInPatch = new File(oldDirFiles.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + oldFilePath);
6185 
6186               //if there is a new file, then its not a delete
6187               if (newFileInPatch.exists()) {
6188                 continue;
6189               }
6190               
6191               File newFileInGrouper = new File(applicationPath + oldFilePath);
6192 
6193               if (newFileInGrouper.exists() && newFileInGrouper.isFile() 
6194                   && !GrouperInstallerUtils.contentEquals(oldFileInPatch, newFileInGrouper)) {
6195                 
6196                 System.out.print("Problem reverting patch since this patch file:\n  " + oldFileInPatch.getAbsolutePath() 
6197                     + "\n  is not the same as what the patch expects (shouldnt exist):\n  " + newFileInGrouper.getAbsolutePath()
6198                     + "\n  Do you want to force revert this patch (t|f)? [f]: ");
6199                 
6200                 boolean forceRevertPatch = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.forceRevertPatch");
6201                 
6202                 if (!forceRevertPatch) {
6203                   System.out.println("\nCannot revert patch since this patch file:\n  " + newFileInPatch.getAbsolutePath() 
6204                       + "\n  is not the same as what the patch expects:\n  " + newFileInGrouper.getAbsolutePath());
6205                   patchHasProblem = true;
6206                 }
6207               }
6208             }
6209           }
6210         }
6211       }
6212 
6213       if (patchHasProblem) {
6214         System.out.println("Cannot continue since patch has problem");
6215         System.exit(1);
6216       }
6217       
6218       //so far so good, all the new files are all good, revert the patch
6219       for (String patchDir : patchDirToApplicationPath.keySet()) {
6220         
6221         String applicationPath = patchDirToApplicationPath.get(patchDir);
6222 
6223         File oldDirFiles = new File(oldDir.getAbsoluteFile() + File.separator + patchDir);
6224         File newDirFiles = new File(newDir.getAbsoluteFile() + File.separator + patchDir);
6225         
6226         if (newDirFiles.exists() && newDirFiles.isDirectory()) {
6227         
6228           // relative, e.g. WEB-INF/jsp/someFile.jsp
6229           Set<String> newFileRelativePaths = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileDescendantRelativePaths(newDirFiles);
6230           
6231           for (String newFilePath : GrouperInstallerUtils.nonNull(newFileRelativePaths)) {
6232 
6233             File oldFileInPatch = new File(oldDirFiles.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + newFilePath);
6234 
6235             File newFileInGrouper = new File(applicationPath + newFilePath);
6236             
6237             if (oldFileInPatch.exists() && oldFileInPatch.isFile()) {
6238               System.out.println("Reverting file: " + newFileInGrouper.getAbsolutePath());
6239               GrouperInstallerUtils.copyFile(oldFileInPatch, newFileInGrouper, false);
6240             } else {
6241               System.out.println("Reverting (deleting) file: " + newFileInGrouper.getAbsolutePath());
6242               GrouperInstallerUtils.fileDelete(newFileInGrouper);
6243             }
6244           }
6245         }
6246       }
6247       
6248       //so far so good, revert the deletes
6249       for (String patchDir : patchDirToApplicationPath.keySet()) {
6250         
6251         String applicationPath = patchDirToApplicationPath.get(patchDir);
6252 
6253         File oldDirFiles = new File(oldDir.getAbsoluteFile() + File.separator + patchDir);
6254         File newDirFiles = new File(newDir.getAbsoluteFile() + File.separator + patchDir);
6255         
6256         if (oldDirFiles.exists() && oldDirFiles.isDirectory()) {
6257         
6258           // relative, e.g. WEB-INF/jsp/someFile.jsp
6259           Set<String> oldFileRelativePaths = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileDescendantRelativePaths(oldDirFiles);
6260           
6261           for (String oldFilePath : GrouperInstallerUtils.nonNull(oldFileRelativePaths)) {
6262 
6263             File oldFileInPatch = new File(oldDirFiles.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + oldFilePath);
6264             File newFileInPatch = new File(newDirFiles.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + oldFilePath);
6265 
6266             if (newFileInPatch.exists()) {
6267               continue;
6268             }
6269             
6270             File newFileInGrouper = new File(applicationPath + oldFilePath);
6271             
6272             if (oldFileInPatch.exists() && oldFileInPatch.isFile()) {
6273               System.out.println("Reverting deleted file: " + newFileInGrouper.getAbsolutePath());
6274               GrouperInstallerUtils.copyFile(oldFileInPatch, newFileInGrouper, false);
6275             }
6276           }
6277         }
6278       }
6279       
6280       this.patchesInstalled.remove(keyBase);
6281       installedPatchDependencies.remove(keyBase);
6282       System.out.println("Patch successfully reverted: " + keyBase);
6283 
6284       editPropertiesFile(patchExistingPropertiesFile, keyBase + ".date", 
6285           GrouperInstallerUtils.dateMinutesSecondsFormat.format(new Date()), false);
6286       editPropertiesFile(patchExistingPropertiesFile, keyBase + ".state", 
6287           GrouperInstallerPatchStatus.reverted.name(), false);
6288 
6289       System.out.println("");
6290     }
6291 
6292     if (!foundPatch) {
6293       System.out.println("There are no new " + thisAppToRevert + " patches to revert\n");
6294       return false;
6295     }
6296     
6297     return true;
6298       
6299   }
6300   
6301   /**
6302    * get the patches available to apply that are not already applied
6303    * @param thisAppToUpgrade app to upgrade to check
6304    * @return if patches were installed
6305    */
6306   private boolean downloadAndInstallPatches(AppToUpgrade thisAppToUpgrade) {
6307 
6308     if (thisAppToUpgrade == AppToUpgrade.CLIENT) {
6309       throw new RuntimeException("Cant install patches for " + thisAppToUpgrade);
6310     }
6311     
6312     Properties patchesExistingProperties = patchExistingProperties();
6313 
6314     String grouperVersion = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("grouper.version", true);
6315 
6316     grouperVersion = GrouperInstallerUtils.replace(grouperVersion, ".", "_");
6317 
6318     Map<Integer, String> patchNumberToNameBase = new LinkedHashMap<Integer, String>();
6319     
6320     boolean foundNewPatch = false;
6321     
6322     File patchExistingPropertiesFile = patchExistingPropertiesFile();
6323     
6324     OUTER: for (int i=0;i<1000;i++) {
6325       
6326       //grouper_v2_2_1_api_patch_0.state
6327       String keyBase = "grouper_v" + grouperVersion + "_" + thisAppToUpgrade.name().toLowerCase() + "_patch_" + i;
6328       System.out.println("\n################ Checking patch " + keyBase);
6329       String key = keyBase + ".state";
6330 
6331       patchNumberToNameBase.put(i, keyBase);
6332       
6333       String value = patchesExistingProperties.getProperty(key);
6334 
6335       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(value)) {
6336         
6337         GrouperInstallerPatchStatus grouperInstallerPatchStatus = GrouperInstallerPatchStatus.valueOfIgnoreCase(value, true, true);
6338         
6339         switch (grouperInstallerPatchStatus) {
6340           case applied:
6341             
6342             System.out.println("Patch: " + keyBase + ": was applied on: " + patchesExistingProperties.getProperty(keyBase + ".date") + "\n");
6343             this.patchesInstalled.add(keyBase);
6344             
6345             continue;
6346 
6347           case skippedPermanently:
6348             
6349             System.out.println("Patch: " + keyBase + ": was skipped permanently on: " + patchesExistingProperties.getProperty(keyBase + ".date") + "\n");
6350             continue;
6351 
6352           case skippedTemporarily:
6353 
6354             System.out.println("Patch: " + keyBase + ": was skipped termporarily on: " + patchesExistingProperties.getProperty(keyBase + ".date") + "\n");
6355 
6356             break;
6357 
6358           case reverted:
6359 
6360             System.out.println("Patch: " + keyBase + ": was reverted on: " + patchesExistingProperties.getProperty(keyBase + ".date") + "\n");
6361 
6362             break;
6363 
6364           case error:
6365 
6366             System.out.println("Patch: " + keyBase + ": had an error installing on: " + patchesExistingProperties.getProperty(keyBase + ".date") + "\n");
6367 
6368             break;
6369 
6370           default:
6371             throw new RuntimeException("Not expecting: " + grouperInstallerPatchStatus);
6372         }
6373         
6374       }
6375 
6376       //lets see if it exists on the server
6377       File patchUntarredDir = downloadAndUnzipPatch(keyBase);
6378       
6379       //if no more patches
6380       if (patchUntarredDir == null) {
6381         System.out.println("");
6382         break OUTER;
6383       }
6384       
6385       //lets get the description:
6386       //  # will show up on screen so user knows what it is
6387       //  description = This patch fixes GRP-1080: browse folders refresh button only works in chrome, not other browsers
6388       //
6389       //  # patches that this patch is dependant on (comma separated)
6390       //  dependencies = 
6391       //
6392       //  # low, medium, or high risk to applying the patch
6393       //  risk = low
6394       //
6395       //  # is this is a security patch (true or false)
6396       //  security = false
6397       //
6398       //  # if this patch requires restart of processes (true or false)
6399       //  requiresRestart = false
6400       Properties patchProperties = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesFromFile(new File(patchUntarredDir.getAbsoluteFile() + File.separator + keyBase + ".properties"));
6401 
6402       foundNewPatch = true;
6403 
6404       // check dependencies
6405       {
6406         String[] dependencies = GrouperInstallerUtils.splitTrim(patchProperties.getProperty("dependencies"), ",");
6407   
6408         boolean invalidDependency = false;
6409         for (String dependency : GrouperInstallerUtils.nonNull(dependencies, String.class)) {
6410           if (!this.patchesInstalled.contains(dependency)) {
6411             System.out.println("Cannot install patch " + keyBase + " since it is dependent on a patch which is not installed: " + dependency);
6412             invalidDependency = true;
6413           }
6414         }
6415         if (invalidDependency) {
6416           System.out.println("Press <enter> to continue");
6417           readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.continueAfterPatchDependencyFails");
6418           continue OUTER;
6419         }
6420       }
6421       
6422       boolean securityRelated = GrouperInstallerUtils.booleanValue(patchProperties.getProperty("security"), false);
6423       boolean requiresRestart = GrouperInstallerUtils.booleanValue(patchProperties.getProperty("requiresRestart"), true);
6424       
6425       if (this.installAllPatches == null) {
6426         System.out.println("Would you like to install all patches (t|f)? [t]: ");
6427         this.installAllPatches = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.installAllPatches");
6428       }
6429       
6430       //print description
6431       System.out.println("Patch " + keyBase + " is " + patchProperties.getProperty("risk") + " risk, "
6432           + (securityRelated ? "is a security patch" : "is not a security patch"));
6433       System.out.println(patchProperties.getProperty("description"));
6434       boolean installPatch = false;
6435       if (!this.installAllPatches) {
6436         System.out.println("Would you like to install patch " + keyBase + " (t|f)? [t]: ");
6437       }
6438       installPatch = this.installAllPatches || readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.installPatch");
6439 
6440       //keep track that we skipped this in the patch properties file
6441       editPropertiesFile(patchExistingPropertiesFile, keyBase + ".date", 
6442           GrouperInstallerUtils.dateMinutesSecondsFormat.format(new Date()), true);
6443 
6444       if (!installPatch) {
6445 
6446         System.out.println("Would you like to be prompted about this patch next time? (t|f)? [t]: ");
6447 
6448         boolean temporary = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.promptAboutPatchNextTime");
6449 
6450         GrouperInstallerPatchStatus grouperInstallerPatchStatus = null;
6451 
6452         if (temporary) {
6453           grouperInstallerPatchStatus = GrouperInstallerPatchStatus.skippedTemporarily;
6454         } else {
6455           grouperInstallerPatchStatus = GrouperInstallerPatchStatus.skippedPermanently;
6456         }
6457 
6458         editPropertiesFile(patchExistingPropertiesFile, keyBase + ".state", 
6459             grouperInstallerPatchStatus.name(), true);
6460         System.out.println("");
6461         continue OUTER;
6462       }
6463 
6464       if (requiresRestart && !this.grouperStopped) {
6465         System.out.println("This patch requires all processes that user Grouper to be stopped.\n  "
6466             + "Please stop these processes if they are running and press <enter> to continue...");
6467         this.grouperStopped = true;
6468         readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.continueAfterPatchStopProcesses");
6469       }
6470       
6471       Map<String, String> patchDirToApplicationPath = new LinkedHashMap<String, String>();
6472       patchDirToApplicationPath.put("files", this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString);
6473       patchDirToApplicationPath.put("classes", this.upgradeExistingClassesDirectoryString);
6474       patchDirToApplicationPath.put("lib", this.upgradeExistingLibDirectoryString);
6475 
6476       boolean patchHasProblem = false;
6477       
6478       //we are installing this patch, lets see if the files are there...
6479       //this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString
6480       //patchUntarredDir
6481       File oldDir = new File(patchUntarredDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "old");
6482       File newDir = new File(patchUntarredDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "new");
6483       {
6484 
6485         for (String patchDir : patchDirToApplicationPath.keySet()) {
6486           
6487           String applicationPath = patchDirToApplicationPath.get(patchDir);
6488 
6489           File oldDirFiles = new File(oldDir.getAbsoluteFile() + File.separator + patchDir);
6490           File newDirFiles = new File(newDir.getAbsoluteFile() + File.separator + patchDir);
6491           
6492           if (oldDirFiles.exists() && oldDirFiles.isDirectory()) {
6493           
6494             // relative, e.g. WEB-INF/jsp/someFile.jsp
6495             Set<String> oldFileRelativePaths = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileDescendantRelativePaths(oldDirFiles);
6496             
6497             for (String oldFilePath : GrouperInstallerUtils.nonNull(oldFileRelativePaths)) {
6498               File oldFileInPatch = new File(oldDirFiles.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + oldFilePath);
6499               File newFileInPatch = new File(newDirFiles.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + oldFilePath);
6500               File oldFileInGrouper = new File(applicationPath + oldFilePath);
6501   
6502               if (!oldFileInPatch.exists() || !oldFileInPatch.isFile()) {
6503                 throw new RuntimeException("Why does file not exist or not file??? " + oldFileInPatch.getAbsolutePath());
6504               }
6505               boolean deletedNewPatchFile = !newFileInPatch.exists();
6506               boolean deletedGrouperFile = !oldFileInGrouper.exists();
6507               //if both deleted thats ok
6508               if ((!deletedGrouperFile || !deletedNewPatchFile) &&
6509                  ( !oldFileInGrouper.exists() || !oldFileInGrouper.isFile() 
6510                   || (!GrouperInstallerUtils.contentEquals(oldFileInPatch, oldFileInGrouper)
6511                       //patch is already applied?  thats ok i guess
6512                       && !GrouperInstallerUtils.contentEquals(newFileInPatch, oldFileInGrouper)))) {
6513                 
6514                 System.out.println("Problem applying patch since this patch old file:\n  " + oldFileInPatch.getAbsolutePath() 
6515                     + "\n  is not the same as what the patch expects:\n  " + oldFileInGrouper.getAbsolutePath()
6516                     + "\n  Do you want to force install this patch (t|f)? [f]: ");
6517                 
6518                 boolean forceInstallPatch = readFromStdInBoolean(false, "grouperInstaller.autorun.forceInstallPatch");
6519                 
6520                 if (!forceInstallPatch) {
6521                   System.out.println("Cannot apply patch since this patch file:\n  " + oldFileInPatch.getAbsolutePath() 
6522                       + "\n  is not the same as what the patch expects:\n  " + oldFileInGrouper.getAbsolutePath());
6523                   patchHasProblem = true;
6524                 }
6525               }
6526             }
6527           }
6528         }
6529       }
6530 
6531       //lets make sure that files which are new which dont have an old version do not exist in the application
6532       for (String patchDir : patchDirToApplicationPath.keySet()) {
6533         
6534         String applicationPath = patchDirToApplicationPath.get(patchDir);
6535 
6536         File newDirFiles = new File(newDir.getAbsoluteFile() + File.separator + patchDir);
6537         File oldDirFiles = new File(oldDir.getAbsoluteFile() + File.separator + patchDir);
6538         
6539         if (newDirFiles.exists() && newDirFiles.isDirectory()) {
6540         
6541           // relative, e.g. WEB-INF/jsp/someFile.jsp
6542           Set<String> newFileRelativePaths = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileDescendantRelativePaths(newDirFiles);
6543 
6544           Set<String> oldFileRelativePaths = (oldDirFiles.exists() && oldDirFiles.isDirectory()) ? 
6545               GrouperInstallerUtils.fileDescendantRelativePaths(oldDirFiles) : new HashSet<String>();
6546 
6547           for (String newFilePath : GrouperInstallerUtils.nonNull(newFileRelativePaths)) {
6548 
6549             File newFileInPatch = new File(newDirFiles.getAbsoluteFile() + File.separator + newFilePath);
6550             File oldFileInGrouper = new File(applicationPath + newFilePath);
6551 
6552             if (!newFileInPatch.isFile()) {
6553               continue;
6554             }
6555             
6556             //if there wasnt a corresponding old file path
6557             if (!oldFileRelativePaths.contains(newFilePath) && !GrouperInstallerUtils.contentEquals(oldFileInGrouper, newFileInPatch)) {
6558 
6559               //then the file shouldnt exist
6560               if (oldFileInGrouper.exists()) {
6561 
6562                 System.out.println("Problem applying patch since this file:\n  " + oldFileInGrouper.getAbsolutePath() 
6563                   + "\n  should not exist yet\n  Do you want to force install this patch (t|f)? [f]: ");
6564             
6565                 boolean forceInstallPatch = readFromStdInBoolean(false, "grouperInstaller.autorun.forceInstallPatch");
6566                 
6567                 if (!forceInstallPatch) {
6568                 
6569                 
6570                   System.out.println("Cannot apply patch since this patch file:\n  " + newFileInPatch.getAbsolutePath() 
6571                       + "\n  is supposed to be new, but it already exists:\n  " + oldFileInGrouper.getAbsolutePath());
6572                   patchHasProblem = true;
6573 
6574                 }
6575               }
6576             }
6577           }
6578         }
6579       }
6580 
6581       if (patchHasProblem) {
6582         editPropertiesFile(patchExistingPropertiesFile, keyBase + ".state", 
6583             GrouperInstallerPatchStatus.error.name(), true);
6584 
6585         continue OUTER;
6586       }
6587 
6588       //so far so good, all the old files are all good, install the patch
6589       for (String patchDir : patchDirToApplicationPath.keySet()) {
6590         
6591         String applicationPath = patchDirToApplicationPath.get(patchDir);
6592 
6593         File newDirFiles = new File(newDir.getAbsoluteFile() + File.separator + patchDir);
6594         
6595         if (newDirFiles.exists() && newDirFiles.isDirectory()) {
6596         
6597           // relative, e.g. WEB-INF/jsp/someFile.jsp
6598           Set<String> newFileRelativePaths = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileDescendantRelativePaths(newDirFiles);
6599           
6600           for (String newFilePath : GrouperInstallerUtils.nonNull(newFileRelativePaths)) {
6601             File newFileInPatch = new File(newDirFiles.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + newFilePath);
6602             if (!newFileInPatch.isFile()) {
6603               continue;
6604             }
6605             File oldFileInGrouper = new File(applicationPath + newFilePath);
6606             if (!oldFileInGrouper.exists() && !oldFileInGrouper.getParentFile().exists()) {
6607               GrouperInstallerUtils.mkdirs(oldFileInGrouper.getParentFile());
6608             }
6609             System.out.println("Applying file: " + oldFileInGrouper.getAbsolutePath());
6610             GrouperInstallerUtils.copyFile(newFileInPatch, oldFileInGrouper, false);
6611           }
6612         }
6613         
6614         File oldDirFiles = new File(oldDir.getAbsoluteFile() + File.separator + patchDir);
6615         
6616         if (oldDirFiles.exists() && oldDirFiles.isDirectory()) {
6617         
6618           // relative, e.g. WEB-INF/jsp/someFile.jsp
6619           Set<String> oldFileRelativePaths = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileDescendantRelativePaths(oldDirFiles);
6620           
6621           for (String oldFilePath : GrouperInstallerUtils.nonNull(oldFileRelativePaths)) {
6622             File oldFileInPatch = new File(oldDirFiles.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + oldFilePath);
6623             File newFileInPatch = new File(newDirFiles.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + oldFilePath);
6624             File oldFileInGrouper = new File(applicationPath + oldFilePath);
6625 
6626             if (oldFileInPatch.exists() && !newFileInPatch.exists() && oldFileInGrouper.exists() && oldFileInGrouper.isFile()) {
6627 
6628               System.out.println("Deleting file: " + oldFileInGrouper.getAbsolutePath());
6629               GrouperInstallerUtils.fileDelete(oldFileInGrouper);
6630               
6631             }
6632           }
6633         }
6634       }
6635       
6636       this.patchesInstalled.add(keyBase);
6637       System.out.println("Patch successfully applied: " + keyBase);
6638       
6639       editPropertiesFile(patchExistingPropertiesFile, keyBase + ".state", 
6640           GrouperInstallerPatchStatus.applied.name(), true);
6641       System.out.println("");
6642     }
6643 
6644     if (!foundNewPatch) {
6645       System.out.println("There are no new " + thisAppToUpgrade + " patches to install\n");
6646       return false;
6647     } 
6648     return true;
6649   }
6650   
6651   /**
6652    * fix the index file
6653    * @param thisAppToUpgrade app to upgrade to check
6654    */
6655   private void fixIndexFile(AppToUpgrade thisAppToUpgrade) {
6656 
6657     if (thisAppToUpgrade == AppToUpgrade.CLIENT) {
6658       throw new RuntimeException("Cant fix index file for " + thisAppToUpgrade);
6659     }
6660     
6661     Properties patchesExistingProperties = patchExistingProperties();
6662 
6663     String grouperVersion = this.grouperVersionOfJar().toString();
6664 
6665     grouperVersion = GrouperInstallerUtils.replace(grouperVersion, ".", "_");
6666 
6667     //lets download all patches
6668     int nextPatchIndex = downloadPatches(thisAppToUpgrade, grouperVersion);
6669     
6670     File patchExistingPropertiesFile = patchExistingPropertiesFile();
6671 
6672     Map<String, String> patchDirToApplicationPath = new LinkedHashMap<String, String>();
6673     patchDirToApplicationPath.put("files", this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString);
6674     patchDirToApplicationPath.put("classes", this.upgradeExistingClassesDirectoryString);
6675     patchDirToApplicationPath.put("lib", this.upgradeExistingLibDirectoryString);
6676 
6677     //map of full patch file name to the patch number that is installed
6678     Map<String, Integer> fileInMoreRecentPatchMap = new HashMap<String, Integer>();
6679 
6680     boolean patchesOverallOk = true;
6681     
6682     //process patches from greatest to least
6683     for (int i=nextPatchIndex-1;i>=0;i--) {
6684       
6685       //grouper_v2_2_1_api_patch_0.state
6686       String patchName = "grouper_v" + grouperVersion + "_" + thisAppToUpgrade.name().toLowerCase() + "_patch_" + i;
6687 
6688       String key = patchName + ".state";
6689 
6690       //see what is already there
6691       String existingState = patchesExistingProperties.getProperty(key);
6692       
6693       GrouperInstallerPatchStatus grouperInstallerPatchStatus = GrouperInstallerPatchStatus.valueOfIgnoreCase(existingState, false, true);
6694 
6695       File patchUntarredDir = new File(this.grouperTarballDirectoryString + "patches" + File.separator + patchName);
6696 
6697       //keep track that we skipped this in the patch properties file
6698       //editPropertiesFile(patchExistingPropertiesFile, keyBase + ".date", 
6699       //    GrouperInstallerUtils.dateMinutesSecondsFormat.format(new Date()));
6700       //editPropertiesFile(patchExistingPropertiesFile, keyBase + ".state", 
6701       //    grouperInstallerPatchStatus.name());
6702 
6703       boolean patchHasProblem = false;
6704       boolean patchHasAtLeastOneFile = false;
6705       boolean patchHasAtLeastOneFileInAnotherPatch = false;
6706       Set<String> patchErrors = new LinkedHashSet<String>();
6707       
6708       //keep track of patch paths (full path in patch)
6709       Set<String> patchPaths = new HashSet<String>();
6710       
6711       //we are installing this patch, lets see if the files are there...
6712       //this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString
6713       //patchUntarredDir
6714       File newDir = new File(patchUntarredDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "new");
6715       //loop through lib, classes, files
6716       for (String patchDir : patchDirToApplicationPath.keySet()) {
6717 
6718         String applicationPath = patchDirToApplicationPath.get(patchDir);
6719 
6720         File newDirFiles = new File(newDir.getAbsoluteFile() + File.separator + patchDir);
6721 
6722         // relative, e.g. WEB-INF/jsp/someFile.jsp
6723         Set<String> newFileRelativePaths = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileDescendantRelativePaths(newDirFiles);
6724         // go through all files of the patches in the new dir
6725         for (String newFilePath : GrouperInstallerUtils.nonNull(newFileRelativePaths)) {
6726 
6727           String patchPath = patchDir + File.separator + newFilePath;
6728           
6729           Integer existsInPatchVersion = fileInMoreRecentPatchMap.get(patchPath);
6730           
6731           //if this file was in a newer patch, then thats ok
6732           if (existsInPatchVersion != null) {
6733             //this file is ok, its in a more recent patch
6734             patchHasAtLeastOneFileInAnotherPatch = true;
6735             continue;
6736           }
6737 
6738           File newFileInGrouper = new File(applicationPath + newFilePath);
6739 
6740           File newFileInPatch = new File(newDirFiles.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + newFilePath);
6741           
6742           //see if the contents of the patch match those in grouper
6743           if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.contentEquals(newFileInPatch, newFileInGrouper)) {
6744 
6745             patchErrors.add("Problem in patch:\n  " + newFileInPatch.getAbsolutePath() 
6746                 + "\n  is not the same as what the patch expects:\n  " + newFileInGrouper.getAbsolutePath());
6747             patchHasProblem = true;
6748           } else {
6749 
6750             patchPaths.add(patchPath);
6751 
6752             patchHasAtLeastOneFile = true;
6753           }
6754         }
6755       }
6756         
6757       //is any file installed?  or if there are only files in other patches... hmm
6758       if (patchHasAtLeastOneFile || (patchHasAtLeastOneFileInAnotherPatch && !patchHasProblem )) {
6759         
6760         //add files in this patch to the list
6761         for (String patchPath : patchPaths) {
6762           fileInMoreRecentPatchMap.put(patchPath, i);
6763         }
6764         
6765         //one or more of the files in the patch had a problem
6766         if (patchHasProblem) {
6767           for (String patchError: patchErrors) {
6768             System.out.println(patchError);
6769           }
6770           if (grouperInstallerPatchStatus == null || (grouperInstallerPatchStatus != GrouperInstallerPatchStatus.applied
6771               && grouperInstallerPatchStatus != GrouperInstallerPatchStatus.error)) {
6772             patchesOverallOk = false;
6773             editPropertiesFile(patchExistingPropertiesFile, patchName + ".date", 
6774                 GrouperInstallerUtils.dateMinutesSecondsFormat.format(new Date()), true);
6775             editPropertiesFile(patchExistingPropertiesFile, patchName + ".state", 
6776                 GrouperInstallerPatchStatus.applied.name(), true);
6777             System.out.println("Patch " + patchName + " was listed as " + grouperInstallerPatchStatus + " but was changed to applied (even though there are files missing)");
6778             
6779           }
6780           continue;          
6781         }
6782         
6783         if (grouperInstallerPatchStatus == null || grouperInstallerPatchStatus != GrouperInstallerPatchStatus.applied) {
6784           patchesOverallOk = false;
6785           editPropertiesFile(patchExistingPropertiesFile, patchName + ".date", 
6786               GrouperInstallerUtils.dateMinutesSecondsFormat.format(new Date()), true);
6787           editPropertiesFile(patchExistingPropertiesFile, patchName + ".state", 
6788               GrouperInstallerPatchStatus.applied.name(), true);
6789           System.out.println("Patch " + patchName + " was listed as " + grouperInstallerPatchStatus + " but was changed to applied");
6790           
6791         }
6792         
6793       } else {
6794         if (grouperInstallerPatchStatus == null || grouperInstallerPatchStatus != GrouperInstallerPatchStatus.applied) {
6795           continue;
6796         }
6797         
6798         patchesOverallOk = false;
6799         editPropertiesFile(patchExistingPropertiesFile, patchName + ".date", 
6800             GrouperInstallerUtils.dateMinutesSecondsFormat.format(new Date()), true);
6801         editPropertiesFile(patchExistingPropertiesFile, patchName + ".state", 
6802             GrouperInstallerPatchStatus.skippedTemporarily.name(), true);
6803         System.out.println("Patch " + patchName + " was listed as applied but was changed to skippedTemporarily");
6804         continue;
6805       }
6806 
6807     }
6808 
6809     //tell the properties file that we have fixed the index file now
6810     editPropertiesFile(patchExistingPropertiesFile, "grouperInstallerLastFixedIndexFile.date", 
6811         GrouperInstallerUtils.dateMinutesSecondsFormat.format(new Date()), true);
6812   
6813     if (patchesOverallOk) {
6814       System.out.println("Patches for " + thisAppToUpgrade + " for version " + grouperVersion + " were in the index file correctly");
6815     }
6816   }
6817   
6818   /**
6819    * get all patches
6820    * @param thisAppToUpgrade app to upgrade to check
6821    * @param grouperVersion
6822    * @return next patch index
6823    */
6824   private int downloadPatches(AppToUpgrade thisAppToUpgrade, String grouperVersion) {
6825 
6826     if (thisAppToUpgrade == AppToUpgrade.CLIENT) {
6827       throw new RuntimeException("Cant install patches for " + thisAppToUpgrade);
6828     }
6829     
6830     Map<Integer, String> patchNumberToNameBase = new LinkedHashMap<Integer, String>();
6831     
6832     int nextPatchIndex = 0;
6833 
6834     OUTER: for (int i=0;i<1000;i++) {
6835 
6836       //grouper_v2_2_1_api_patch_0.state
6837       String keyBase = "grouper_v" + grouperVersion + "_" + thisAppToUpgrade.name().toLowerCase() + "_patch_" + i;
6838 
6839       patchNumberToNameBase.put(i, keyBase);
6840 
6841       //lets see if it exists on the server
6842       File patchUntarredDir = downloadAndUnzipPatch(keyBase);
6843 
6844       //if no more patches
6845       if (patchUntarredDir == null) {
6846         System.out.println("");
6847         break OUTER;
6848       }
6849 
6850       nextPatchIndex = i+1;
6851     }
6852 
6853     return nextPatchIndex;
6854 
6855   }
6856   
6857   /**
6858    * 
6859    * @param patchName e.g. grouper_v2_2_1_api_patch_0.tar.gz
6860    * @return the directory of the unzipped patch
6861    */
6862   public File downloadAndUnzipPatch(String patchName) {
6863     String urlToDownload = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("download.server.url", true);
6864     
6865     if (!urlToDownload.endsWith("/")) {
6866       urlToDownload += "/";
6867     }
6868     urlToDownload += "release/";
6869     
6870     //e.g. 2.2.2
6871     Matcher patchNameMatcher = patchNamePattern.matcher(patchName);
6872     if (!patchNameMatcher.matches()) {
6873       throw new RuntimeException("Invalid patch name: " + patchName);
6874     }
6875     
6876     //String grouperVersion = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("grouper.version", true);
6877     String grouperVersion = patchNameMatcher.group(1) + "." + patchNameMatcher.group(2) + "." + patchNameMatcher.group(3);
6878     
6879     urlToDownload +=  grouperVersion + "/patches/" + patchName + ".tar.gz";
6880 
6881     File patchFile = new File(this.grouperTarballDirectoryString + "patches" + File.separator + patchName + ".tar.gz");
6882     
6883     if (GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValueBoolean("grouperInstaller.default.downloadPatches", true, false)) {
6884 
6885       boolean foundFile = downloadFile(urlToDownload, patchFile.getAbsolutePath(), true, "Patch doesnt exist yet (not an error): ", 
6886           "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalPatchIfExists");
6887       
6888       if (!foundFile) {
6889 
6890         //if we are doing test patches
6891         if (GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValueBoolean("grouperInstaller.useTestPatches", false, false)) {
6892           String testUrlToDownload = GrouperInstallerUtils.replace(urlToDownload, ".tar.gz", "_test.tar.gz");
6893           
6894           //its a test url, but download to the same file name
6895           foundFile = downloadFile(testUrlToDownload, patchFile.getAbsolutePath(), true, "Patch doesnt exist yet (not an error): ", 
6896               "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalPatchIfExists");
6897         }
6898 
6899         if (!foundFile) {
6900           return null;
6901         }
6902       }
6903     } else {
6904       if (!patchFile.exists()) {
6905         return null;
6906       }
6907     }
6908     
6909     //####################################
6910     //unzip/untar the patch file
6911     
6912     File unzippedFile = unzip(patchFile.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalPatchIfExists");
6913     File untarredDir = untar(unzippedFile.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalPatchIfExists", null);
6914     return untarredDir;
6915   }
6916 
6917   /**
6918    * 
6919    * @param branchName
6920    * @return the directory of the unzipped source repo
6921    */
6922   public File downloadAndUnzipGrouperSource(String branchName) {
6923     String urlToDownload = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("download.source.url", false);
6924     
6925     if (GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(urlToDownload)) {
6926       urlToDownload = "https://github.com/Internet2/grouper/archive/$BRANCH_NAME$.zip";
6927     }
6928     
6929     urlToDownload = GrouperInstallerUtils.replace(urlToDownload, "$BRANCH_NAME$", branchName);
6930 
6931     String fileToDownload = GrouperInstallerUtils.substringAfterLast(urlToDownload, "/");
6932     
6933     File sourceFile = new File(this.grouperTarballDirectoryString + fileToDownload);
6934     
6935     if (GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValueBoolean("grouperInstaller.default.downloadSource", true, false)) {
6936 
6937       downloadFile(urlToDownload, sourceFile.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.createPatchDownloadSourceUseLocalIfExist");
6938       
6939     } else {
6940       if (!sourceFile.exists()) {
6941         throw new RuntimeException("Cant find grouper source");
6942       }
6943     }
6944     
6945     //####################################
6946     //unzip/untar the source file
6947     File unzippedDir = unzipFromZip(sourceFile.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.createPatchDownloadSourceUseLocalIfExist");
6948     return unzippedDir;
6949   }
6950 
6951   /**
6952    * 
6953    * @param branchName
6954    * @return the directory of the unzipped source repo
6955    */
6956   public File downloadAndUnzipPspSource(String branchName) {
6957     String urlToDownload = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("download.pspSource.url", false);
6958     
6959     if (GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(urlToDownload)) {
6960       urlToDownload = "https://github.com/Internet2/grouper-psp/archive/$BRANCH_NAME$.zip";
6961     }
6962     
6963     urlToDownload = GrouperInstallerUtils.replace(urlToDownload, "$BRANCH_NAME$", branchName);
6964 
6965     String fileToDownload = GrouperInstallerUtils.substringAfterLast(urlToDownload, "/");
6966     
6967     File sourceFile = new File(this.grouperTarballDirectoryString + fileToDownload);
6968     
6969     if (GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValueBoolean("grouperInstaller.default.downloadSource", true, false)) {
6970 
6971       downloadFile(urlToDownload, sourceFile.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.createPatchDownloadSourceUseLocalIfExist");
6972       
6973     } else {
6974       if (!sourceFile.exists()) {
6975         throw new RuntimeException("Cant find grouper psp source");
6976       }
6977     }
6978     
6979     //####################################
6980     //unzip/untar the source file
6981     File unzippedDir = unzipFromZip(sourceFile.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.createPatchDownloadSourceUseLocalIfExist");
6982     return unzippedDir;
6983   }
6984 
6985   /**
6986    * 
6987    */
6988   public static enum GrouperInstallerPatchStatus {
6989 
6990     /**
6991      * patch was applied
6992      */
6993     applied, 
6994     
6995     /**
6996      * patch was removed
6997      */
6998     reverted, 
6999     
7000     /**
7001      * patch was skipped temporarily, prompt again
7002      */
7003     skippedTemporarily, 
7004 
7005     /**
7006      * patch had an error applying
7007      */
7008     error, 
7009 
7010     /**
7011      * patch was skipped permanently, dont prompt again
7012      */
7013     skippedPermanently;
7014 
7015     /**
7016      * 
7017      * @param string
7018      * @param exceptionIfNotFound
7019      * @param exceptionIfInvalid
7020      * @return the patch status
7021      */
7022     public static GrouperInstallerPatchStatus valueOfIgnoreCase(String string, boolean exceptionIfNotFound, boolean exceptionIfInvalid) {
7023       return GrouperInstallerUtils.enumValueOfIgnoreCase(GrouperInstallerPatchStatus.class, string, exceptionIfNotFound, exceptionIfInvalid);
7024     }
7025     
7026   }
7027 
7028   /**
7029    * patch status api
7030    */
7031   private void patchStatusApi() {
7032     this.patchStatus(AppToUpgrade.API);
7033   }
7034 
7035 
7036   /**
7037    * patch the api
7038    */
7039   private void patchApi() {
7040     this.downloadAndInstallPatches(AppToUpgrade.API);
7041   }
7042

7044    * fix index file api
7045    */
7046   private void fixIndexFileApi() {
7047     this.fixIndexFile(AppToUpgrade.API);
7048   }
7049 
7050   /**
7051    * fix index file ui
7052    */
7053   private void fixIndexFileUi() {
7054     this.fixIndexFile(AppToUpgrade.UI);
7055     this.fixIndexFile(AppToUpgrade.API);
7056   }
7057 
7058   /**
7059    * fix index file ws
7060    */
7061   private void fixIndexFileWs() {
7062     this.fixIndexFile(AppToUpgrade.WS);
7063     this.fixIndexFile(AppToUpgrade.API);
7064   }
7065

7067    * fix index file psp
7068    */
7069   private void fixIndexFilePsp() {
7070     this.fixIndexFile(AppToUpgrade.PSP);
7071     this.fixIndexFile(AppToUpgrade.API);
7072   }
7073

7075    * fix index file psp
7076    */
7077   private void fixIndexFilePspng() {
7078     this.fixIndexFile(AppToUpgrade.PSPNG);
7079     this.fixIndexFile(AppToUpgrade.API);
7080   }

7087     this.patchStatus(AppToUpgrade.UI);
7088   }

7096   }

7104   }

7107    * patch status pspng

7111     this.patchStatus(AppToUpgrade.PSPNG);
7112   }
