7114 
7115   /**
7116    * patch the client
7117    */
7118   private void patchUi() {
7119     this.downloadAndInstallPatches(AppToUpgrade.API);
7120     boolean patchesApplied = this.downloadAndInstallPatches(AppToUpgrade.UI);
7121     if (patchesApplied && (this.grouperInstallerMainFunction == GrouperInstallerMainFunction.patch 
7122         || this.grouperInstallerMainFunction == GrouperInstallerMainFunction.upgrade)) {
7123       System.out.print("Since patches were applied, you should delete files in your app server work directory,"
7124           + "\n  in tomcat it is named 'work'.  Hit <enter> to continue: ");
7125       readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.continueAfterDeleteUiWorkDirectory");
7126     }
7127   }
7128   
7129   /**
7130    * patch the client
7131    */
7132   private void patchWs() {
7133     this.downloadAndInstallPatches(AppToUpgrade.API);
7134     boolean patchesApplied = this.downloadAndInstallPatches(AppToUpgrade.WS);
7135     if (patchesApplied && (this.grouperInstallerMainFunction == GrouperInstallerMainFunction.patch 
7136         || this.grouperInstallerMainFunction == GrouperInstallerMainFunction.upgrade)) {
7137       System.out.print("Since patches were applied, you should delete files in your app server work directory,"
7138           + "\n  in tomcat it is named 'work'.  Hit <enter> to continue: ");
7139       readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.continueAfterDeleteWsWorkDirectory");
7140     }
7141   }
7142   
7143   /**
7144    * patch the psp
7145    */
7146   private void patchPsp() {
7147     this.downloadAndInstallPatches(AppToUpgrade.API);
7148     this.downloadAndInstallPatches(AppToUpgrade.PSP);
7149   }
7150 
7151   /**
7152    * patch the pspng
7153    */
7154   private void patchPspng() {
7155     this.downloadAndInstallPatches(AppToUpgrade.API);
7156     this.downloadAndInstallPatches(AppToUpgrade.PSPNG);
7157   }
7158 
7159   /**
7160    * revert patch the client
7161    */
7162   private void patchRevertApi() {
7163     this.revertPatches(AppToUpgrade.API);
7164   }
7165 
7166   /**
7167    * revert patch the client
7168    */
7169   private void patchRevertUi() {
7170     this.revertPatches(AppToUpgrade.UI);
7171     boolean patchesReverted = this.revertPatches(AppToUpgrade.API);
7172     if (patchesReverted && (this.grouperInstallerMainFunction == GrouperInstallerMainFunction.patch 
7173         || this.grouperInstallerMainFunction == GrouperInstallerMainFunction.upgrade)) {
7174       System.out.print("Since patches were reverted, you should delete files in your app server work directory,"
7175           + "\n  in tomcat it is named 'work'.  Hit <enter> to continue: ");
7176       readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.continueAfterDeleteUiWorkDirectory");
7177     }
7178   }
7179   
7180   /**
7181    * revert patch the client
7182    */
7183   private void patchRevertWs() {
7184     this.revertPatches(AppToUpgrade.WS);
7185     boolean patchesReverted = this.revertPatches(AppToUpgrade.API);
7186     if (patchesReverted && (this.grouperInstallerMainFunction == GrouperInstallerMainFunction.patch 
7187         || this.grouperInstallerMainFunction == GrouperInstallerMainFunction.upgrade)) {
7188       System.out.print("Since patches were reverted, you should delete files in your app server work directory,"
7189           + "\n  in tomcat it is named 'work'.  Hit <enter> to continue: ");
7190       readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.continueAfterDeleteWsWorkDirectory");
7191     }
7192   }
7193   
7194   /**
7195    * revert patch the psp
7196    */
7197   private void patchRevertPsp() {
7198     this.revertPatches(AppToUpgrade.PSP);
7199     this.revertPatches(AppToUpgrade.API);
7200   }
7201 
7202   /**
7203    * revert patch the pspng
7204    */
7205   private void patchRevertPspng() {
7206     this.revertPatches(AppToUpgrade.PSPNG);
7207     this.revertPatches(AppToUpgrade.API);
7208   }
7209 
7210   /**
7211    * owasp csrf guard file
7212    */
7213   private File owaspCsrfGuardFile;
7214   
7215   /**
7216    * owasp csrf guard base file
7217    */
7218   private File owaspCsrfGuardBaseFile;
7219   
7220   /**
7221    * on an upgrade, compare a new jar and an existing jar and see if needs to be updated, and if so, update it
7222    * @param existingJarFile
7223    * @param newJarFile
7224    * @param printResultIfNotUpgrade
7225    * @param toDir if file not there, copy here.  If null, then go to upgrade existing lib directory string
7226    * @return true if upgraded, false if not
7227    */
7228   private boolean compareAndReplaceJar(File existingJarFile, File newJarFile, boolean printResultIfNotUpgrade, File toDir) {
7229     
7230     if (toDir == null) {
7231       toDir = new File(this.upgradeExistingLibDirectoryString);
7232     }
7233     
7234     if (existingJarFile == null || !existingJarFile.exists()) {
7235       System.out.println(newJarFile.getName() + " is a new file and is being copied to the application lib dir");
7236       existingJarFile = new File(toDir.getAbsoluteFile() + File.separator + newJarFile.getName());
7237       GrouperInstallerUtils.copyFile(newJarFile, existingJarFile, true);
7238       return true;
7239     }
7240 
7241     String existingJarFilePath = existingJarFile.getAbsolutePath();
7242     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.filePathStartsWith(existingJarFilePath,this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString)) {
7243       throw new RuntimeException("Why does existing path not start with upgrade path??? " + existingJarFilePath + ", " + this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString);
7244     }
7245     
7246     String bakJarFileString = this.grouperBaseBakDir + existingJarFilePath.substring(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString.length());
7247     File bakJarFile = new File(bakJarFileString);
7248     
7249     String existingVersion = GrouperInstallerUtils.jarVersion(existingJarFile);
7250     String newVersion = GrouperInstallerUtils.jarVersion(newJarFile);
7251     
7252     long existingSize = existingJarFile.length();
7253     long newSize = newJarFile.length();
7254     
7255     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(existingVersion, newVersion) || existingSize != newSize) {
7256 
7257       //make sure parents exist
7258       GrouperInstallerUtils.createParentDirectories(bakJarFile);
7259       
7260       System.out.println(existingJarFile.getName() + " had version " + existingVersion + " and size " + existingSize + " bytes and is being upgraded to version "
7261           + newVersion + " and size " + newSize + " bytes.\n  It is backed up to " + bakJarFile);
7262 
7263       GrouperInstallerUtils.fileMove(existingJarFile, bakJarFile);
7264       
7265       GrouperInstallerUtils.copyFile(newJarFile, existingJarFile, true);
7266       
7267       return true;
7268     }
7269     
7270     if (printResultIfNotUpgrade) {
7271       System.out.println(existingJarFile.getName() + " is up to date");
7272     }
7273     return false;
7274   }
7275 
7276   /**
7277    * on an upgrade, compare a new file and an existing file and see if needs to be updated, and if so, update it
7278    * @param existingFile
7279    * @param newFile
7280    * @param printResultIfNotUpgrade
7281    * @param toDir if file not there, copy here.  If null, then go to upgrade existing lib directory string
7282    * @return true if upgraded, false if not
7283    */
7284   private boolean compareAndCopyFile(File existingFile, File newFile, boolean printResultIfNotUpgrade, File toDir) {
7285     
7286     if (toDir == null) {
7287       throw new RuntimeException("Which dir to copy to??? " + newFile + ", " + existingFile);
7288     }
7289     
7290     if (existingFile == null || !existingFile.exists()) {
7291       System.out.println(newFile.getName() + " is a new file and is being copied to the application dir: " + toDir.getAbsolutePath());
7292       existingFile = new File(toDir.getAbsoluteFile() + File.separator + newFile.getName());
7293       GrouperInstallerUtils.copyFile(newFile, existingFile, true);
7294       return true;
7295     }
7296 
7297     String existingFilePath = existingFile.getAbsolutePath();
7298     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.filePathStartsWith(existingFilePath,this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString)) {
7299       throw new RuntimeException("Why does existing path not start with upgrade path??? " + existingFilePath + ", " + this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString);
7300     }
7301     
7302     String bakFileString = this.grouperBaseBakDir + existingFilePath.substring(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString.length());
7303     File bakFile = new File(bakFileString);
7304     
7305     String existingChecksum = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileSha1(existingFile);
7306     String newChecksum = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileSha1(newFile);
7307     
7308     long existingSize = existingFile.length();
7309     long newSize = newFile.length();
7310     
7311     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(existingChecksum, newChecksum) || existingSize != newSize) {
7312 
7313       //make sure parents exist
7314       GrouperInstallerUtils.createParentDirectories(bakFile);
7315       
7316       System.out.println(existingFile.getName() + " had checksum " + existingChecksum + " and size " + existingSize + " bytes and is being upgraded to checksum "
7317           + newChecksum + " and size " + newSize + " bytes.\n  It is backed up to " + bakFile);
7318 
7319       GrouperInstallerUtils.fileMove(existingFile, bakFile);
7320       
7321       GrouperInstallerUtils.copyFile(newFile, existingFile, true);
7322       
7323       return true;
7324     }
7325     
7326     if (printResultIfNotUpgrade) {
7327       System.out.println(existingFile.getName() + " is up to date");
7328     }
7329     return false;
7330   }
7331

7333    * grouper.client.properties
7334    */
7335   private File grouperClientPropertiesFile;
7336   
7337   /**
7338    * grouper.client.base.properties
7339    */
7340   private File grouperClientBasePropertiesFile;
7341

7343    * grouper.client.example.properties
7344    */
7345   private File grouperClientExamplePropertiesFile;

7348    * grouperClient.jar
7349    */
7350   private File grouperClientJar;
7351 
7352   /**
7353    * grouper.properties
7354    */
7355   private File grouperPropertiesFile;
7356   
7357   /**
7358    * grouper.base.properties
7359    */
7360   private File grouperBasePropertiesFile;
7361

7363    * subject.properties
7364    */
7365   private File subjectPropertiesFile;
7366   
7367   /**
7368    * subject.base.properties
7369    */
7370   private File subjectBasePropertiesFile;
7371

7373    * grouperUtf8.txt
7374    */
7375   private File grouperUtf8File;
7376   
7377   /**
7378    * grouper.example.properties
7379    */
7380   private File grouperExamplePropertiesFile;
7381 
7382   /**
7383    * grouper.hibernate.properties
7384    */
7385   private File grouperHibernatePropertiesFile;
7386   
7387   /**
7388    * grouper.hibernate.base.properties
7389    */
7390   private File grouperHibernateBasePropertiesFile;
7391   
7392   /**
7393    * grouper.hibernate.example.properties
7394    */
7395   private File grouperHibernateExamplePropertiesFile;
7396 
7397   /**
7398    * grouper-ws.properties
7399    */
7400   private File grouperWsPropertiesFile;
7401   
7402   /**
7403    * grouper-ws.example.properties
7404    */
7405   private File grouperWsBasePropertiesFile;
7406 
7407   /**
7408    * grouper-ws.base.properties
7409    */
7410   private File grouperWsExamplePropertiesFile;
7411   
7412   /**
7413    * ehcache.xml
7414    */
7415   private File ehcacheFile;
7416 
7417   /**
7418    * ehcache.example.xml
7419    */
7420   private File ehcacheExampleFile;
7421   
7422   /**
7423    * grouper-loader.properties
7424    */
7425   private File grouperLoaderPropertiesFile;
7426   
7427   /**
7428    * grouper-loader.base.properties
7429    */
7430   private File grouperLoaderBasePropertiesFile;
7431   
7432   /**
7433    * grouper.cache.properties
7434    */
7435   private File grouperCachePropertiesFile;
7436   
7437   /**
7438    * grouper.cache.base.properties
7439    */
7440   private File grouperCacheBasePropertiesFile;
7441   
7442   /**
7443    * grouper-loader.example.properties
7444    */
7445   private File grouperLoaderExamplePropertiesFile;
7446 
7447   /**
7448    * grouper.jar
7449    */
7450   private File grouperJar;
7451 
7452   
7453   /**
7454    * find a classpath file on classpath by resourceName
7455    * @param resourceName resource name of file
7456    * @param exceptionIfNotFound 
7457    * @return the file or null if not exception if not found
7458    */
7459   private File findClasspathFile(String resourceName, boolean exceptionIfNotFound) {
7460     
7461     Set<String> fileNamesTried = new LinkedHashSet<String>();
7462     
7463     File file = new File(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString + "classes" + File.separator + resourceName);
7464     if (file.exists()) {
7465       return file;
7466     }
7467     
7468     fileNamesTried.add(file.getAbsolutePath());
7469     
7470     file = new File(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString + "conf" + File.separator + resourceName);
7471     if (file.exists()) {
7472       return file;
7473     }
7474 
7475     fileNamesTried.add(file.getAbsolutePath());
7476 
7477     //these could be in this location
7478     if (GrouperInstallerUtils.equals("nav.properties", resourceName) 
7479         || GrouperInstallerUtils.equals("media.properties", resourceName)) {
7480       file = new File(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString + "WEB-INF" + File.separator 
7481           + "classes" + File.separator + "resources" + File.separator + "grouper" + File.separator + resourceName);
7482       if (file.exists()) {
7483         return file;
7484       }
7485       
7486       fileNamesTried.add(file.getAbsolutePath());
7487     }
7488     
7489     file = new File(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString + "WEB-INF" + File.separator + "classes" 
7490         + File.separator + resourceName);
7491     if (file.exists()) {
7492       return file;
7493     }
7494 
7495     fileNamesTried.add(file.getAbsolutePath());
7496     
7497     file = new File(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString + resourceName);
7498     if (file.exists()) {
7499       return file;
7500     }
7501 
7502     fileNamesTried.add(file.getAbsolutePath());
7503     
7504     if (exceptionIfNotFound) {
7505       throw new RuntimeException("Cant find file, looked in: " + GrouperInstallerUtils.join(fileNamesTried.iterator(), ", "));
7506     }
7507     
7508     return null;
7509   }
7510 
7511   /**
7512    * lib dirs where libs might be in this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString
7513    */
7514   private static List<String> libDirs = GrouperInstallerUtils.toList(
7515       "lib" + File.separator, 
7516       "WEB-INF" + File.separator + "lib" + File.separator,
7517       "lib" + File.separator + "grouper" + File.separator,
7518       "lib" + File.separator + "custom" + File.separator,
7519       "lib" + File.separator + "jdbcSamples" + File.separator,
7520       "dist" + File.separator + "lib" + File.separator,
7521       "");
7522 
7523   /**
7524    * get all library files
7525    * @return the list of files
7526    */
7527   private List<File> findAllLibraryFiles() {
7528     List<File> result = new ArrayList<File>();
7529     for (String libDir : libDirs) {
7530 
7531       File dir = new File(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString + libDir);
7532       if (dir.exists() && dir.isDirectory()) {
7533         for (File file : dir.listFiles()) {
7534           if (file.getName().endsWith(".jar")) {
7535             result.add(file);
7536           }
7537         }
7538       }
7539       
7540     }
7541     return result;
7542   }
7543   
7544   /**
7545    * find a library file on lib dir by libName
7546    * @param libName lib name of file
7547    * @param exceptionIfNotFound 
7548    * @return the file or null if not exception if not found
7549    */
7550   private File findLibraryFile(String libName, boolean exceptionIfNotFound) {
7551     
7552     Set<String> fileNamesTried = new LinkedHashSet<String>();
7553 
7554     for (String libDir : libDirs) {
7555 
7556       File file = new File(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString + libDir + libName);
7557       if (file.exists()) {
7558         return file;
7559       }
7560       
7561       fileNamesTried.add(file.getAbsolutePath());
7562       
7563     }
7564     
7565     if (exceptionIfNotFound) {
7566       throw new RuntimeException("Cant find file, looked in: " + GrouperInstallerUtils.join(fileNamesTried.iterator(), ", "));
7567     }
7568     
7569     return null;
7570   }
7571   
7572   /**
7573    * 
7574    */
7575   private void mainInstallLogic() {
7576     
7577     //####################################
7578     //Find out what directory to install to.  This ends in a file separator
7579     this.grouperInstallDirectoryString = grouperInstallDirectory();
7580 
7581     //Find out what directory to upgrade to.  This ends in a file separator
7582     this.grouperTarballDirectoryString = grouperUpgradeTempDirectory();
7583 
7584     //####################################
7585     //get default ip address
7586     System.out.print("Enter the default IP address for checking ports (just hit enter to accept the default unless on a machine with no network, might want to change to 127.0.0.1): [0.0.0.0]: ");
7587     this.defaultIpAddress = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.defaultIpAddressForPorts");
7588     
7589     if (GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(this.defaultIpAddress)) {
7590       this.defaultIpAddress = "0.0.0.0";
7591     }
7592 
7593     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.equals("0.0.0.0", this.defaultIpAddress)) {
7594       System.out.println("Note, you will probably need to change the hsql IP address, and tomcat server.xml IP addresses...");
7595     }
7596     
7597     //####################################
7598     //System.out.println("Grouper install directory is: " + grouperInstallDirectoryFile.getAbsolutePath());
7599 
7600     this.version = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("grouper.version", true);
7601     System.out.println("Installing grouper version: " + this.version);
7602     //see if it is already downloaded
7603     
7604     //download api and set executable and dos2unix etc
7605     downloadAndConfigureApi();
7606 
7607     //####################################
7608     //ask about database
7609 
7610     File localGrouperHibernatePropertiesFile = new File(this.untarredApiDir.getAbsoluteFile() + File.separator + "conf" 
7611         + File.separator + "grouper.hibernate.properties");
7612 
7613     Properties grouperHibernateProperties = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesFromFile(localGrouperHibernatePropertiesFile);
7614 
7615     this.dbUrl = GrouperInstallerUtils.defaultString(grouperHibernateProperties.getProperty("hibernate.connection.url"), "jdbc:hsqldb:hsql://localhost:9001/grouper");
7616     this.dbUser = GrouperInstallerUtils.defaultString(grouperHibernateProperties.getProperty("hibernate.connection.username"));
7617     this.dbPass = GrouperInstallerUtils.defaultString(grouperHibernateProperties.getProperty("hibernate.connection.password"));
7618 
7619     boolean useHsqldb = false;
7620 
7621     if (this.dbUrl.contains(":hsqldb:")) {
7622       System.out.print("Do you want to use the default and included hsqldb database (t|f)? [t]: ");
7623       useHsqldb = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.useBuiltInHsql");
7624     }
7625 
7626     if (!useHsqldb) {
7627 
7628       System.out.println("\n##################################\n");
7629       System.out.println("Example mysql URL: jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/grouper");
7630       System.out.println("Example oracle URL: jdbc:oracle:thin:@server.school.edu:1521:sid");
7631       System.out.println("Example hsqldb URL: jdbc:hsqldb:hsql://localhost:9001/grouper");
7632       System.out.println("Example postgres URL: jdbc:postgresql://localhost:5432/database");
7633       System.out.println("Example mssql URL: jdbc:sqlserver://localhost:3280;databaseName=grouper");
7634       System.out.print("\nEnter the database URL [" + this.dbUrl + "]: ");
7635       String newDbUrl = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.dbUrl");
7636       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(newDbUrl)) {
7637         this.dbUrl = newDbUrl;
7638         if (newDbUrl.contains("postgresql") || newDbUrl.contains("sqlserver")) {
7639           System.out.println("Note: you need to change the search sql in the jdbc source in the grouperApi/conf/sources.xml... the change is in the comments in that file");
7640           for (int i=0;i<3;i++) {
7641             System.out.print("Ready to continue? (t|f)? [t] ");
7642             boolean shouldContinue = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.dbContinueAfterChangeSourcesXmlForPostgresSqlServer");
7643             if (shouldContinue) {
7644               break;
7645             }
7646           }
7647         }
7648       }
7649       System.out.print("Database user [" + this.dbUser + "]: ");
7650       String newDbUser = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.dbUser");
7651       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(newDbUser)) {
7652         this.dbUser = newDbUser;
7653       }
7654       System.out.print("Database password (note, you aren't setting the pass here, you are using an existing pass, this will be echoed back) [" 
7655           + GrouperInstallerUtils.defaultIfEmpty(this.dbPass, "<blank>") + "]: ");
7656       String newDbPass = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.dbPass");
7657       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(newDbPass)) {
7658         this.dbPass = newDbPass;
7659       }
7660     }
7661 
7662     this.giDbUtils = new GiDbUtils(this.dbUrl, this.dbUser, this.dbPass);
7663 
7664     //####################################
7665     //change the config file
7666     //get the config file
7667 
7668     //lets edit the three properties:
7669     System.out.println("Editing " + localGrouperHibernatePropertiesFile.getAbsolutePath() + ": ");
7670     editPropertiesFile(localGrouperHibernatePropertiesFile, "hibernate.connection.url", this.dbUrl, false);
7671     editPropertiesFile(localGrouperHibernatePropertiesFile, "hibernate.connection.username", this.dbUser, false);
7672     editPropertiesFile(localGrouperHibernatePropertiesFile, "hibernate.connection.password", this.dbPass, false);
7673 
7674     //####################################
7675     //check to see if listening on port?
7676 
7677     //####################################
7678     //lets get the java command
7679     validJavaVersion();
7680 
7681     //#####################################
7682     //add driver to classpath
7683     this.addDriverJarToClasspath();
7684 
7685     //####################################
7686     //start database if needed (check on port?  ask to change port?)
7687     if (this.dbUrl.contains("hsqldb")) {
7688       //C:\mchyzer\grouper\trunk\grouper-installer\grouper.apiBinary-2.1.0
7689       startHsqlDb();
7690     }
7691     
7692     //####################################
7693     //check connection to database
7694     checkDatabaseConnection();
7695     
7696     //####################################
7697     // patch the API
7698     this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileAddLastSlashIfNotExists(this.untarredApiDir.getAbsolutePath());
7699     this.upgradeExistingClassesDirectoryString = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileAddLastSlashIfNotExists(this.untarredApiDir.getAbsolutePath())
7700         + "conf" + File.separator;
7701     this.upgradeExistingLibDirectoryString = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileAddLastSlashIfNotExists(this.untarredApiDir.getAbsolutePath())
7702         + "lib" + File.separator + "grouper" + File.separator;
7703     patchApi();
7704 
7705     //make sure log4j is debugging sql statements
7706     log4jDebugSql(this.upgradeExistingClassesDirectoryString + "log4j.properties");
7707     
7708     //####################################
7709     //ask then init the DB
7710     initDb();
7711     addQuickstartSubjects();
7712     addQuickstartData();
7713     
7714     //####################################
7715     //download and configure ui
7716     System.out.print("Do you want to install the user interface (t|f)? [t]: ");
7717     boolean installUi = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.installUi");
7718     if (installUi) {
7719       downloadAndConfigureUi();
7720     }
7721     
7722     //####################################
7723     //get ant
7724     downloadAndUnzipAnt();
7725     
7726     //####################################
7727     //look for or ask or download tomcat
7728     File tomcatDir = downloadTomcat();
7729     File unzippedTomcatFile = unzip(tomcatDir.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalToolsDownloadTarEtc");
7730     this.untarredTomcatDir = untar(unzippedTomcatFile.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalToolsDownloadTarEtc", 
7731         new File(this.grouperInstallDirectoryString));
7732 
7733     //####################################
7734     //ask for tomcat port
7735     configureTomcat();
7736 
7737     File apiPatchStatusFile = new File(GrouperInstallerUtils.fileAddLastSlashIfNotExists(
7738         this.untarredApiDir.getAbsolutePath()) + "grouperPatchStatus.properties");
7739 
7740     //####################################
7741     //build UI
7742     if (installUi) {
7743 
7744       buildUi(true);
7745 
7746       //####################################
7747       //configureTomcatUiWebapp
7748       configureTomcatUiWebapp();
7749   
7750       //####################################
7751       //copy api patch level to ui
7752       File uiPatchStatusFile = new File(GrouperInstallerUtils.fileAddLastSlashIfNotExists(
7753           this.grouperUiBuildToDirName()) + "WEB-INF" + File.separator + "grouperPatchStatus.properties");
7754       System.out.println("Copying applied API patch status to UI:");
7755       System.out.println("  - from: "  + apiPatchStatusFile.getAbsolutePath());
7756       System.out.println("  - to: "  + uiPatchStatusFile.getAbsolutePath());
7757       GrouperInstallerMergePatchFiles.mergePatchFiles(
7758           apiPatchStatusFile, uiPatchStatusFile, true);
7759 
7760       //####################################
7761       // patch the ui
7762       this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileAddLastSlashIfNotExists(this.grouperUiBuildToDirName());
7763       this.upgradeExistingClassesDirectoryString = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileAddLastSlashIfNotExists(this.grouperUiBuildToDirName())
7764           + "WEB-INF" + File.separator + "classes" + File.separator ;
7765       this.upgradeExistingLibDirectoryString = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileAddLastSlashIfNotExists(this.grouperUiBuildToDirName())
7766           + "WEB-INF" + File.separator + "lib" + File.separator;
7767       this.patchUi();
7768     }
7769     
7770     //####################################
7771     //set the GrouperSystem password
7772     tomcatConfigureGrouperSystem();
7773 
7774     if (installUi) {
7775       //####################################
7776       //bounce tomcat
7777       tomcatBounce("restart");
7778       
7779       //####################################
7780       //tell user to go to url
7781       System.out.println("##################################\n");
7782       System.out.println("Go here for the Grouper UI (change hostname if on different host): http://localhost:" + this.tomcatHttpPort + "/" + this.tomcatUiPath + "/");
7783       System.out.println("\n##################################\n");
7784     }
7785     
7786     System.out.print("Do you want to install web services (t|f)? [t]: ");
7787     boolean installWs = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.installWs");
7788     
7789     if (installWs) {
7790       this.downloadAndConfigureWs();
7791       
7792       //####################################
7793       //build WS
7794       buildWs(true);
7795       
7796       //####################################
7797       //copy to tomcat
7798       configureTomcatWsWebapp();
7799   
7800       //####################################
7801       //copy api patch level to ui
7802       File wsPatchStatusFile = new File(GrouperInstallerUtils.fileAddLastSlashIfNotExists(
7803           this.grouperWsBuildToDirName()) + "WEB-INF" + File.separator + "grouperPatchStatus.properties");
7804       System.out.println("Copying applied API patch status to WS:");
7805       System.out.println("  - from: "  + apiPatchStatusFile.getAbsolutePath());
7806       System.out.println("  - to: "  + wsPatchStatusFile.getAbsolutePath());
7807       GrouperInstallerMergePatchFiles.mergePatchFiles(
7808           apiPatchStatusFile, wsPatchStatusFile, true);
7809   
7810       //####################################
7811       // patch the ws
7812       this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileAddLastSlashIfNotExists(this.grouperWsBuildToDirName());
7813       this.upgradeExistingClassesDirectoryString = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileAddLastSlashIfNotExists(this.grouperWsBuildToDirName())
7814           + "WEB-INF" + File.separator + "classes" + File.separator ;
7815       this.upgradeExistingLibDirectoryString = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileAddLastSlashIfNotExists(this.grouperWsBuildToDirName())
7816           + "WEB-INF" + File.separator + "lib" + File.separator;
7817   
7818       this.patchWs();
7819   
7820       //####################################
7821       //bounce tomcat
7822       tomcatBounce("restart");
7823   
7824       //####################################
7825       //tell user to go to url
7826       System.out.println("This is the Grouper WS URL (change hostname if on different host): http://localhost:" + this.tomcatHttpPort + "/" + this.tomcatWsPath + "/");
7827     }
7828     
7829     System.out.print("Do you want to install the web services client (t|f)? [t]: ");
7830     boolean installClient = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.installClient");
7831     
7832     if (installClient) {
7833       //download and build client
7834       this.downloadAndBuildClient();
7835   
7836       //####################################
7837       //configure where WS is
7838       this.configureClient();
7839       
7840       if (installWs) {
7841         //####################################
7842         //add grouper system to WS group
7843         this.addGrouperSystemWsGroup();
7844         
7845         //####################################
7846         //run a client command
7847         this.runClientCommand();
7848       }
7849     }
7850 
7851     //####################################
7852     //install pspng
7853     System.out.print("Do you want to install the provisioning service provider next generation (t|f)? [t]: ");
7854     boolean installPspng = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.installPspng");
7855     if (installPspng) {
7856       downloadAndBuildPspng();  
7857       
7858       //copy jars
7859       GrouperInstallerUtils.copyDirectory(new File(this.untarredPspngDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "lib" + File.separator + "custom"), 
7860           new File(this.untarredApiDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "lib" + File.separator + "custom"));
7861       GrouperInstallerUtils.copyDirectory(new File(this.untarredPspngDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "dist"), 
7862           new File(this.untarredApiDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "lib" + File.separator + "custom"));
7863 
7864       //####################################
7865       // patch the PSP
7866       this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileAddLastSlashIfNotExists(this.untarredApiDir.getAbsolutePath());
7867       this.upgradeExistingClassesDirectoryString = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileAddLastSlashIfNotExists(this.untarredApiDir.getAbsolutePath())
7868           + "conf" + File.separator;
7869       this.upgradeExistingLibDirectoryString = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileAddLastSlashIfNotExists(this.untarredApiDir.getAbsolutePath())
7870           + "lib" + File.separator + "grouper" + File.separator;
7871       patchPspng();
7872             
7873     }
7874 
7875 
7876     if (!installPspng) {
7877       //####################################
7878       //install psp
7879       System.out.print("Do you want to install the provisioning service provider (t|f)? [t]: ");
7880       if (readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.installPsp")) {
7881         downloadAndBuildPsp();              
7882         GrouperInstallerUtils.copyDirectory(this.untarredPspDir, this.untarredApiDir);
7883   
7884         //####################################
7885         // patch the PSP
7886         this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileAddLastSlashIfNotExists(this.untarredApiDir.getAbsolutePath());
7887         this.upgradeExistingClassesDirectoryString = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileAddLastSlashIfNotExists(this.untarredApiDir.getAbsolutePath())
7888             + "conf" + File.separator;
7889         this.upgradeExistingLibDirectoryString = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileAddLastSlashIfNotExists(this.untarredApiDir.getAbsolutePath())
7890             + "lib" + File.separator + "grouper" + File.separator;
7891         patchPsp();
7892               
7893       }
7894     }
7895     
7896     reportOnConflictingJars();
7897 
7898     //#####################################
7899     //start the loader
7900     startLoader();
7901 
7902     //#####################################
7903     //success
7904     System.out.println("\n##################################\n");
7905 
7906     System.out.println("\nInstallation success!");
7907 
7908 
7909     System.out.println("\nRun the installer's 'admin' function to get information and manage about your installation (db, tomcat, logs, etc)");
7910     
7911     if (installUi) {
7912       System.out.println("\nGo here for the Grouper UI (change hostname if on different host): http://localhost:" + this.tomcatHttpPort + "/" + this.tomcatUiPath + "/");
7913       
7914     }
7915     if (installWs) {
7916       System.out.println("\nThis is the Grouper WS URL (change hostname if on different host): http://localhost:" + this.tomcatHttpPort + "/" + this.tomcatWsPath + "/");
7917     }
7918     System.out.println("\n##################################\n");
7919 
7920   }
7921 
7922   /**
7923    * 
7924    */
7925   private void downloadAndBuildPsp() {
7926     File pspDir = downloadPsp();
7927     File unzippedPspFile = unzip(pspDir.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalPspDownloadTarEtc");
7928     this.untarredPspDir = untar(unzippedPspFile.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalPspDownloadTarEtc", 
7929         null);
7930 
7931   }
7932   
7933   /**
7934    * 
7935    */
7936   private void downloadAndBuildPspng() {
7937     File pspngDir = downloadPspng();
7938     File unzippedPspngFile = unzip(pspngDir.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalPspngDownloadTarEtc");
7939     this.untarredPspngDir = untar(unzippedPspngFile.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalPspngDownloadTarEtc", 
7940         null);
7941 
7942   }
7943   
7944   /** untarred psp dir file */
7945   private File untarredPspDir;
7946   
7947   /** untarred pspng dir file */
7948   private File untarredPspngDir;
7949   
7950   /**
7951    * 
7952    */
7953   public void downloadAndUnzipAnt() {
7954     File antDir = downloadAnt();
7955     File unzippedAntFile = unzip(antDir.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalToolsDownloadTarEtc");
7956     this.untarredAntDir = untar(unzippedAntFile.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalToolsDownloadTarEtc", null);
7957   }
7958 
7959   /**
7960    * 
7961    */
7962   public void downloadAndUnzipMaven() {
7963     File mavenDir = downloadMaven();
7964     File unzippedMavenFile = unzip(mavenDir.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalToolsDownloadTarEtc");
7965     this.untarredMavenDir = untar(unzippedMavenFile.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalToolsDownloadTarEtc", null);
7966   }
7967 
7968   /**
7969    * 
7970    */
7971   public void downloadAndConfigureWs() {
7972 
7973     //####################################
7974     //download the ws
7975     File wsDir = downloadWs();
7976 
7977     //####################################
7978     //unzip/untar the ws file
7979     File unzippedWsFile = unzip(wsDir.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalWsDownloadTarEtc");
7980     this.untarredWsDir = untar(unzippedWsFile.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalWsDownloadTarEtc", 
7981         new File(this.grouperInstallDirectoryString));
7982 
7983     //####################################
7984     //configure where api is
7985     this.configureWs();
7986 
7987   }
7988 
7989   /**
7990    * 
7991    */
7992   public void downloadAndConfigureUi() {
7993     //####################################
7994     //get UI
7995     File uiDir = downloadUi();
7996     
7997     //####################################
7998     //unzip/untar the ui file
7999     File unzippedUiFile = unzip(uiDir.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalUiDownloadTarEtc");
8000     this.untarredUiDir = untar(unzippedUiFile.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalUiDownloadTarEtc", 
8001         new File(this.grouperInstallDirectoryString));
8002 
8003     //####################################
8004     //configure UI
8005     configureUi();
8006   }
8007 
8008   /**
8009    * 
8010    */
8011   public void downloadAndConfigureApi() {
8012     File apiFile = downloadApi();
8013     
8014     //####################################
8015     //unzip/untar the api file
8016     
8017     File unzippedApiFile = unzip(apiFile.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalApiDownloadTarEtc");
8018     File theUntarredApiDir = untar(unzippedApiFile.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalApiDownloadTarEtc", 
8019         new File(this.grouperInstallDirectoryString));
8020     
8021     File theGrouperJar = new File(GrouperInstallerUtils.fileAddLastSlashIfNotExists(theUntarredApiDir.getAbsolutePath())
8022         + "dist" + File.separator + "lib" + File.separator + "grouper.jar");
8023     
8024     gshExcutableAndDos2Unix(theUntarredApiDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "bin" + File.separator);
8025 
8026     //these might be set from UI or WS
8027     if (this.untarredApiDir == null) {
8028       this.untarredApiDir = theUntarredApiDir;
8029     }
8030     
8031     if (this.grouperJar == null) {
8032       this.grouperJar = theGrouperJar;
8033     }
8034   }
8035 
8036   /**
8037    * @param binDirLocation which includes trailing slash
8038    */
8039   public void gshExcutableAndDos2Unix(String binDirLocation) {
8040     gshExcutableAndDos2Unix(binDirLocation, null);
8041   }
8042 
8043   /**
8044    * run dos2unix on a file
8045    * @param file
8046    * @param fileNameInPrompt 
8047    * @param configSuffixAutorun 
8048    */
8049   public static void dos2unix(File file, String fileNameInPrompt, String configSuffixAutorun) {
8050     dos2unix(GrouperInstallerUtils.toSet(file), fileNameInPrompt, configSuffixAutorun);
8051   }
8052 
8053   /**
8054    * run dos2unix on a file
8055    * @param files
8056    * @param fileNameInPrompt e.g. gsh.sh
8057    * @param configSuffixAutorun suffix after grouperInstaller.autorun.dos2unix in properties file
8058    */
8059   public static void dos2unix(Collection<File> files, String fileNameInPrompt, String configSuffixAutorun) {
8060 
8061     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isWindows()) {
8062 
8063       System.out.print("Do you want to run dos2unix on " + fileNameInPrompt + " (t|f)? [t]: ");
8064       boolean dos2unixRunOnFile = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.dos2unix" + configSuffixAutorun);
8065       
8066       if (dos2unixRunOnFile) {
8067 
8068         for (File file : files) {
8069           
8070           if (!file.exists()) {
8071             continue;
8072           }
8073           
8074           List<String> commands = GrouperInstallerUtils.toList("dos2unix", 
8075               file.getAbsolutePath());
8076     
8077           System.out.println("Making sure " + file.getName() + " is in unix format: " + convertCommandsIntoCommand(commands) + "\n");
8078           String error = null;
8079           CommandResult commandResult = null;
8080           boolean didntWork = false;
8081           Throwable throwable = null;
8082           try {
8083             commandResult = GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(
8084                 GrouperInstallerUtils.toArray(commands, String.class), true, true, null, 
8085                 file.getParentFile(), null, false, true, false);
8086 
8087             if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getErrorText())) {
8088               System.out.println("stderr: " + commandResult.getErrorText());
8089             }
8090             if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getOutputText())) {
8091               System.out.println("stdout: " + commandResult.getOutputText());
8092             }
8093             continue;
8094           } catch (Throwable t) {
8095             didntWork = true;
8096             error = t.getMessage();
8097             throwable = t;
8098           }
8099           
8100           if (didntWork) {
8101             try {
8102               //lets try the java way?
8103               String fileContents = GrouperInstallerUtils.readFileIntoString(file);
8104               if (fileContents.contains("\r\n")) {
8105                 System.out.println("Problem with command 'dos2unix'.   Is it installed?  Converting to unix via java replacing \\r\\n with \\n: " + file.getAbsolutePath());
8106                 fileContents = fileContents.replaceAll("\r\n", "\n");
8107                 GrouperInstallerUtils.saveStringIntoFile(file, fileContents);
8108               }
8109               continue;
8110             } catch (Throwable t) {
8111               t.printStackTrace();
8112             }
8113           }
8114           
8115           if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getErrorText())) {
8116             System.out.println("stderr: " + commandResult.getErrorText());
8117           }
8118           if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getOutputText())) {
8119             System.out.println("stdout: " + commandResult.getOutputText());
8120           }
8121           if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(error)) {
8122             if (throwable != null) {
8123               throwable.printStackTrace();
8124             }
8125             System.out.println("Error: " + error);
8126             System.out.println("NOTE: you might need to run this to convert newline characters to mac/unix:\n\n" +
8127                 "cat " + file.getAbsolutePath()
8128                 + " | col -b > " + file.getAbsolutePath() + "\n");
8129           }
8130         }
8131       }
8132 
8133     }
8134   }
8135   
8136   /**
8137    * @param binDirLocation which includes trailing slash
8138    * @param specify if specifying location
8139    */
8140   public void gshExcutableAndDos2Unix(String binDirLocation, String specify) {
8141     //lts make sure gsh is executable and in unix format
8142 
8143     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isWindows()) {
8144 
8145       specify = GrouperInstallerUtils.trimToEmpty(specify);
8146       
8147       if (specify.length() > 0) {
8148         specify += " ";
8149       }
8150       
8151       System.out.print("Do you want to set " + specify + "gsh script to executable (t|f)? [t]: ");
8152       boolean setGshFile = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.setGshScriptsToExecutable");
8153       
8154       if (setGshFile) {
8155       
8156         binDirLocation = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileAddLastSlashIfNotExists(binDirLocation);
8157         
8158         List<String> commands = GrouperInstallerUtils.toList("chmod", "+x", 
8159             binDirLocation + "gsh.sh");
8160   
8161         System.out.println("Making sure gsh.sh is executable with command: " + convertCommandsIntoCommand(commands) + "\n");
8162   
8163         CommandResult commandResult = GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(
8164             GrouperInstallerUtils.toArray(commands, String.class), true, true, null, 
8165             new File(binDirLocation), null, true);
8166         
8167         if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getErrorText())) {
8168           System.out.println("stderr: " + commandResult.getErrorText());
8169         }
8170         if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getOutputText())) {
8171           System.out.println("stdout: " + commandResult.getOutputText());
8172         }
8173 
8174         if (new File(binDirLocation + "gsh").exists()) {
8175           commands = GrouperInstallerUtils.toList("chmod", "+x", 
8176               binDirLocation + "gsh");
8177     
8178           System.out.println("Making sure gsh is executable with command: " + convertCommandsIntoCommand(commands) + "\n");
8179     
8180           commandResult = GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(
8181               GrouperInstallerUtils.toArray(commands, String.class), true, true, null, 
8182               new File(binDirLocation), null, true);
8183           
8184           if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getErrorText())) {
8185             System.out.println("stderr: " + commandResult.getErrorText());
8186           }
8187           if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getOutputText())) {
8188             System.out.println("stdout: " + commandResult.getOutputText());
8189           }
8190         }
8191         
8192         dos2unix(GrouperInstallerUtils.toSet(new File(binDirLocation + "gsh.sh"), new File(binDirLocation + "gsh")), "gsh.sh", "OnGsh");
8193 
8194       }
8195       
8196     }
8197   }
8198   
8199   /**
8200    * if we are debugging sql in log4j
8201    */
8202   private Boolean log4jDebugSql = null;
8203   
8204   /**
8205    * if this file has been taken care of for a while
8206    */
8207   private Set<File> log4jDebugDone = new HashSet<File>();
8208   
8209   /**
8210    * if this file has been taken care of for a while
8211    */
8212   private Set<File> removeLegacyHibernatePropertiesDone = new HashSet<File>();
8213   
8214   /**
8215    * @param hibernateFileLocation
8216    */
8217   public void removeLegacyHibernateProperties(String hibernateFileLocation) {
8218 
8219     //if not a file dont worry about it
8220     File hibernateFile = new File(hibernateFileLocation);
8221 
8222     if (this.removeLegacyHibernatePropertiesDone.contains(hibernateFile)) {
8223       return;
8224     }
8225 
8226     this.removeLegacyHibernatePropertiesDone.add(hibernateFile);
8227 
8228     if (!hibernateFile.exists()) {
8229       System.out.println("Cant find grouper.hibernate.properties: " + hibernateFileLocation);
8230       return;
8231     }
8232     
8233     //see if its there
8234     Properties hibernateProperties = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesFromFile(hibernateFile);
8235     String current = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue(hibernateProperties, "hibernate.cache.region.factory_class");
8236     
8237     if (current == null) {
8238       //not there, we're good
8239       return;
8240     }
8241 
8242 
8243     removeRedundantProperties(hibernateFile, GrouperInstallerUtils.toSet("hibernate.cache.region.factory_class"));
8244     System.out.println("File " + hibernateFile.getAbsolutePath() + " has property hibernate.cache.region.factory_class set to \"" + current + "\".  Removing since this is now in the grouper.hibernate.base.properties file.");
8245   }
8246   
8247   /**
8248    * @param log4jLocation
8249    */
8250   public void log4jDebugSql(String log4jLocation) {
8251 
8252     //if not a file dont worry about it
8253     File log4jFile = new File(log4jLocation);
8254 
8255     if (this.log4jDebugDone.contains(log4jFile)) {
8256       return;
8257     }
8258 
8259     this.log4jDebugDone.add(log4jFile);
8260 
8261     if (!log4jFile.exists()) {
8262       System.out.println("Cant find log4j.properties: " + log4jLocation);
8263       return;
8264     }
8265     
8266     //see if its already there
8267     Properties log4jProperties = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesFromFile(log4jFile);
8268     String currentAntEntry = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue(log4jProperties, "log4j.logger.org.apache.tools.ant");
8269     
8270     if (GrouperInstallerUtils.equalsIgnoreCase(GrouperInstallerUtils.trimToEmpty(currentAntEntry), "DEBUG")
8271         || GrouperInstallerUtils.equalsIgnoreCase(GrouperInstallerUtils.trimToEmpty(currentAntEntry), "INFO")
8272         || GrouperInstallerUtils.equalsIgnoreCase(GrouperInstallerUtils.trimToEmpty(currentAntEntry), "WARN")) {
8273       //we are already there
8274       return;
8275     }
8276 
8277     if (this.log4jDebugSql == null) {
8278       System.out.print("Do you want add log4j.logger.org.apache.tools.ant = WARN to " + log4jFile.getAbsolutePath() + " (recommended so you can see progress of SQL scripts) (t|f)? [t]: ");
8279       this.log4jDebugSql = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.log4jDebugSql");
8280     }
8281 
8282     if (this.log4jDebugSql) {
8283 
8284       editPropertiesFile(log4jFile, "log4j.logger.org.apache.tools.ant", "WARN", false);
8285 
8286     }
8287   }
8288 
8289   /**
8290    * 
8291    */
8292   public void downloadAndBuildClient() {
8293     //####################################
8294     //download the client
8295     File clientDir = downloadClient();
8296 
8297     //####################################
8298     //unzip/untar the client file
8299     File unzippedClientFile = unzip(clientDir.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalClientDownloadTarEtc");
8300     this.untarredClientDir = untar(unzippedClientFile.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalClientDownloadTarEtc", 
8301         new File(this.grouperInstallDirectoryString));
8302     
8303   }
8304 
8305   /**
8306    * 
8307    */
8308   private int tomcatHttpPort = -1;
8309   
8310   
8311   /**
8312    * 
8313    */
8314   private void configureTomcat() {
8315     
8316     System.out.print("Do you want to set the tomcat memory limit (t|f)? [t]: ");
8317     boolean setTomcatMemory = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.setTomcatMemoryLimit");
8318     
8319     if (setTomcatMemory) {
8320       
8321       {
8322         File catalinaBatFile = new File(this.untarredTomcatDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "bin" + File.separator + "catalina.bat");
8323         
8324         System.out.println("Editing file: " + catalinaBatFile.getAbsolutePath());
8325         
8326         Boolean edited = editFile(catalinaBatFile, "^\\s*set\\s+\"JAVA_OPTS\\s*=.*-Xmx([0-9mMgG]+)", null, null, "512M", "max memory");
8327         if (edited == null) {
8328           addToFile(catalinaBatFile, "\nset \"JAVA_OPTS=-server -Xmx512M -XX:MaxPermSize=256M\"\n", 65, "max memory");
8329         }
8330         if (null == editFile(catalinaBatFile, "^\\s*set\\s+\"JAVA_OPTS\\s*=.*-XX:MaxPermSize=([0-9mMgG]+)", null, null, "256M", "permgen memory")) {
8331           throw new RuntimeException("Why not edit permgen in file " + catalinaBatFile);
8332         }
8333       }
8334       
8335       {
8336         File catalinaShFile = new File(this.untarredTomcatDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "bin" + File.separator + "catalina.sh");
8337         
8338         System.out.println("Editing file: " + catalinaShFile.getAbsolutePath());
8339 
8340         Boolean edited = editFile(catalinaShFile, "^\\s*JAVA_OPTS\\s*=\".*-Xmx([0-9mMgG]+)", null, null, "512M", "max memory");
8341         if (edited == null) {
8342           addToFile(catalinaShFile, "\nJAVA_OPTS=\"-server -Xmx512M -XX:MaxPermSize=256M\"\n", 65, "max memory");
8343         }
8344         if (null == editFile(catalinaShFile, "^\\s*JAVA_OPTS\\s*=\".*-XX:MaxPermSize=([0-9mMgG]+)", null, null, "256M", "permgen memory")) {
8345           throw new RuntimeException("Why not edit permgen in file " + catalinaShFile);
8346         }
8347       }
8348     }      
8349     
8350     
8351     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isWindows()) {
8352 
8353       System.out.print("Do you want to set tomcat scripts to executable (t|f)? [t]: ");
8354       boolean setTomcatFiles = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.setTomcatScriptsToExecutable");
8355       
8356       //GrouperInstallerUtils.toSet("catalina.sh", "startup.sh", "shutdown.sh");
8357       Set<String> shFileNames = new HashSet<String>();
8358 
8359       File binDir = new File(this.untarredTomcatDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "bin");
8360 
8361       //get all sh files, doing wildcards doesnt work
8362       for (File file : binDir.listFiles()) {
8363         String fileName = GrouperInstallerUtils.defaultString(file.getName());
8364         if (file.isFile() && fileName.endsWith(".sh")) {
8365           shFileNames.add(fileName);
8366         }
8367       }
8368 
8369       if (setTomcatFiles) {
8370       
8371         for (String command : shFileNames) {
8372           List<String> commands = new ArrayList<String>();
8373           
8374           commands.add("chmod");
8375           commands.add("+x");
8376           //have to do * since all the  sh files need chmod
8377           commands.add(this.untarredTomcatDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "bin" + File.separator + command);
8378     
8379           System.out.println("Making tomcat file executable with command: " + convertCommandsIntoCommand(commands) + "\n");
8380     
8381           CommandResult commandResult = GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(
8382               GrouperInstallerUtils.toArray(commands, String.class), true, true, null, 
8383               new File(this.untarredTomcatDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "bin"), null, true);
8384           
8385           if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getErrorText())) {
8386             System.out.println("stderr: " + commandResult.getErrorText());
8387           }
8388           if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getOutputText())) {
8389             System.out.println("stdout: " + commandResult.getOutputText());
8390           }
8391         }
8392       }
8393       
8394       Set<File> shFiles = new LinkedHashSet<File>();
8395       for (String shFileName : shFileNames) {
8396         shFiles.add(new File(shFileName));
8397       }
8398       
8399       dos2unix(shFiles, "tomcat sh files", "OnTomcatFiles");
8400 
8401     }
8402       
8403     //see what the current ports are
8404     this.tomcatHttpPort = -1;
8405     
8406     File serverXmlFile = new File(this.untarredTomcatDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "conf" + File.separator + "server.xml");
8407     
8408     int shutdownPort = GrouperInstallerUtils.xpathEvaluateAttributeInt(serverXmlFile, "/Server", "port", -1);
8409     
8410     int originalShutdownPort = shutdownPort;
8411     
8412     //  /Server/Service/Connector <Connector port="8080" protocol="HTTP/1.1" 
8413     this.tomcatHttpPort = GrouperInstallerUtils.xpathEvaluateAttributeInt(serverXmlFile, "/Server/Service/Connector[@protocol='HTTP/1.1']", "port", -1);
8414 
8415     int originalTomcatHttpPort = this.tomcatHttpPort;
8416 
8417     // <Connector port="8009" protocol="AJP/1.3" redirectPort="8443" />
8418     int jkPort = GrouperInstallerUtils.xpathEvaluateAttributeInt(serverXmlFile, "/Server/Service/Connector[@protocol='AJP/1.3']", "port", -1);
8419 
8420     int originalJkPort = jkPort;
8421     
8422     String portsCommaSeparated = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("grouperInstaller.default.tomcatPorts", false);
8423     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(portsCommaSeparated)) {
8424       
8425       String[] portsStrings = GrouperInstallerUtils.splitTrim(portsCommaSeparated, ",");
8426       
8427       if (portsStrings.length != 3) {
8428         throw new RuntimeException("Why is grouperInstaller.default.tomcatPorts from grouper.installer.properties not 3 ints comma separated? " + portsCommaSeparated);
8429       }
8430       
8431       this.tomcatHttpPort = GrouperInstallerUtils.intValue(portsStrings[0]);
8432       jkPort = GrouperInstallerUtils.intValue(portsStrings[1]);
8433       shutdownPort = GrouperInstallerUtils.intValue(portsStrings[2]);
8434       
8435     }
8436     
8437     while(true) {
8438       System.out.print("What ports do you want tomcat to run on (HTTP, JK, shutdown): [" + this.tomcatHttpPort + ", " + jkPort + ", " + shutdownPort + "]: ");
8439       
8440       String ports = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.tomcatPorts");
8441       
8442       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(ports)) {
8443         if (this.tomcatHttpPort == originalTomcatHttpPort && jkPort == originalJkPort && shutdownPort == originalShutdownPort) {
8444           break;
8445         }
8446       } else {
8447         String[] portsArray = GrouperInstallerUtils.splitTrim(ports, ",");
8448         if (GrouperInstallerUtils.length(portsArray) == 3) {
8449           for (String portString : portsArray) {
8450             try {
8451               GrouperInstallerUtils.intValue(portString);
8452             } catch (Exception e) {
8453               continue;
8454             }
8455           }
8456         } else {
8457           continue;
8458         }
8459         //ok, we have three integer entries
8460         this.tomcatHttpPort = GrouperInstallerUtils.intValue(portsArray[0]);
8461         jkPort = GrouperInstallerUtils.intValue(portsArray[1]);
8462         shutdownPort = GrouperInstallerUtils.intValue(portsArray[2]);
8463       }
8464       
8465       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.portAvailable(this.tomcatHttpPort, this.defaultIpAddress)) {
8466         System.out.print("The tomcat HTTP port is in use or unavailable: " + this.tomcatHttpPort + ", do you want to pick different ports? (t|f): ");
8467         boolean pickDifferentPorts = readFromStdInBoolean(null, "grouperInstaller.autorun.pickDifferentPortIfInUse");
8468         if (pickDifferentPorts) {
8469           continue;
8470         }
8471       }
8472       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.portAvailable(jkPort, this.defaultIpAddress)) {
8473         System.out.print("The tomcat JK port is in use or unavailable: " + this.tomcatHttpPort + ", do you want to pick different ports? (t|f): ");
8474         boolean pickDifferentPorts = readFromStdInBoolean(null, "grouperInstaller.autorun.pickDifferentPortIfInUse");
8475         if (pickDifferentPorts) {
8476           continue;
8477         }
8478       }
8479       
8480       System.out.println("Editing tomcat config file: " + serverXmlFile.getAbsolutePath());
8481       //lets edit the file
8482       //<Connector port="8080" protocol="HTTP/1.1" 
8483       editFile(serverXmlFile, "port=\"([\\d]+)\"", new String[]{"<Connector", "protocol=\"HTTP/1.1\""}, 
8484           new String[]{"SSLEnabled=\"true\""}, Integer.toString(this.tomcatHttpPort), "tomcat HTTP port");
8485       //<Connector port="8009" protocol="AJP/1.3" redirectPort="8443" />
8486       editFile(serverXmlFile, "port=\"([\\d]+)\"", new String[]{"<Connector", "protocol=\"AJP/1.3\""}, null, Integer.toString(jkPort), "tomcat JK port");
8487       //<Server port="8005" shutdown="SHUTDOWN">
8488       editFile(serverXmlFile, "port=\"([\\d]+)\"", new String[]{"<Server", "shutdown=\"SHUTDOWN\""}, null, Integer.toString(shutdownPort), "tomcat shutdown port");
8489       break;
8490     }
8491 
8492     configureTomcatUriEncoding(serverXmlFile);
8493     
8494   }
8495   /**
8496    * @param serverXmlFile
8497    */
8498   public void configureTomcatUriEncoding(File serverXmlFile) {
8499     //set encoding for connectors
8500     //  /Server/Service/Connector <Connector port="8080" protocol="HTTP/1.1" 
8501     String uriEncodingHttp = GrouperInstallerUtils.xpathEvaluateAttribute(serverXmlFile, 
8502         "/Server/Service/Connector[@protocol='HTTP/1.1']", "URIEncoding");
8503     
8504     // <Connector port="8009" protocol="AJP/1.3" redirectPort="8443" />
8505     String uriEncodingAjp = GrouperInstallerUtils.xpathEvaluateAttribute(serverXmlFile, 
8506         "/Server/Service/Connector[@protocol='AJP/1.3']", "URIEncoding");
8507 
8508     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(uriEncodingAjp, "UTF-8") || !GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(uriEncodingHttp, "UTF-8")) {
8509 
8510       boolean defaultSetUriEncoding = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValueBoolean("grouperInstaller.default.ui.setTomcatUriEncoding", true, false);
8511       System.out.print("Do you want to set URIEncoding to UTF-8 in tomcat server.xml <Connector> elements (t|f)? [" 
8512           + (defaultSetUriEncoding ? "t" : "f") + "]: ");
8513       boolean assignUriEncoding = readFromStdInBoolean(defaultSetUriEncoding, "grouperInstaller.autorun.setUriEncodingToUtf8inServerXml");
8514 
8515       if (assignUriEncoding) {
8516         
8517         if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(uriEncodingAjp, "UTF-8")) {
8518           editFile(serverXmlFile, "URIEncoding=\"([^\"]+)\"", new String[]{"<Connector", "protocol=\"AJP/1.3\""}, 
8519               new String[]{"SSLEnabled=\"true\""}, "UTF-8", "tomcat URIEncoding attribute for element <Connector AJP", true, "URIEncoding");
8520           
8521         }
8522         
8523         if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(uriEncodingHttp, "UTF-8")) {
8524           editFile(serverXmlFile, "URIEncoding=\"([^\"]+)\"", new String[]{"<Connector", "protocol=\"HTTP/1.1\""}, 
8525               new String[]{"SSLEnabled=\"true\""}, "UTF-8", "tomcat URIEncoding attribute for element <Connector HTTP", true, "URIEncoding");
8526           
8527         }
8528       }
8529 
8530     }
8531   }
8532 
8533   /**
8534    * 
8535    * @param newEhcacheExampleFile
8536    * @param existingEhcacheExampleFile
8537    * @param existingEhcacheFile
8538    */
8539   public static void mergeEhcacheXmlFiles(File newEhcacheExampleFile, File existingEhcacheExampleFile, File existingEhcacheFile) {
8540     
8541     try {
8542       //lets get the differences of the existing ehcache file and the existing ehcache example file
8543       DocumentBuilderFactory domFactory = GrouperInstallerUtils.xmlDocumentBuilderFactory();
8544       DocumentBuilder builder = domFactory.newDocumentBuilder();
8545       Document existingEhcacheDoc = builder.parse(existingEhcacheFile);
8546       Document existingEhcacheExampleDoc = builder.parse(existingEhcacheExampleFile);
8547 
8548       Element existingDocumentElement = existingEhcacheDoc.getDocumentElement();
8549       Element existingExampleDocumentElement = existingEhcacheExampleDoc.getDocumentElement();
8550 
8551       Map<String, String> diskStoreDifferences = null;
8552       
8553       {
8554         Element existingDiskStoreElement = (Element)existingDocumentElement.getElementsByTagName("diskStore").item(0);
8555         Element existingExampleDiskStoreElement = (Element)existingExampleDocumentElement.getElementsByTagName("diskStore").item(0);
8556         diskStoreDifferences = xmlNodeAttributeDifferences(existingExampleDiskStoreElement, existingDiskStoreElement);
8557       }
8558 
8559       Map<String, String> defaultCacheDifferences = null;
8560 
8561       {
8562         Element existingDefaultCacheElement = (Element)existingDocumentElement.getElementsByTagName("defaultCache").item(0);
8563         Element existingExampleDefaultCacheElement = (Element)existingExampleDocumentElement.getElementsByTagName("defaultCache").item(0);
8564         defaultCacheDifferences = xmlNodeAttributeDifferences(existingExampleDefaultCacheElement, existingDefaultCacheElement);
8565         
8566       }
8567 
8568       XPath xpath = XPathFactory.newInstance().newXPath();
8569       
8570       //map of cache name to the differences in the attributes of the cache
8571       Map<String, Map<String, String>> cacheDifferencesByCacheName = new LinkedHashMap<String, Map<String, String>>();
8572       
8573       {
8574         NodeList existingCacheNodeList = existingDocumentElement.getElementsByTagName("cache");
8575         
8576         //loop through all the caches
8577         for (int i=0;i<existingCacheNodeList.getLength(); i++) {
8578           
8579           Element existingCacheElement = (Element)existingCacheNodeList.item(i);
8580 
8581           String cacheName = existingCacheElement.getAttribute("name");
8582 
8583           //find the example cache
8584           XPathExpression expr = xpath.compile("cache[@name='" + cacheName + "']");
8585           Element existingExampleCacheElement = (Element)expr.evaluate(existingExampleDocumentElement, XPathConstants.NODE);
8586 
8587           //see if they differ
8588           Map<String, String> differences = xmlNodeAttributeDifferences(existingExampleCacheElement, existingCacheElement);
8589           
8590           if (differences != null) {
8591             cacheDifferencesByCacheName.put(cacheName, differences);
8592           }
8593         }
8594         
8595         //note, dont worry if there were caches in the example that werent in the configured one
8596         
8597       }      
8598       
8599       //lets see if there are any other nodes
8600       Set<Element> otherNodes = new LinkedHashSet<Element>();
8601       {
8602         NodeList nodeList = existingDocumentElement.getChildNodes();
8603         
8604         for (int i=0;i<nodeList.getLength();i++) {
8605           Node node = nodeList.item(i);
8606           if (node instanceof Element) {
8607             Element nodeElement = (Element)node;
8608             String nodeName = nodeElement.getNodeName();
8609             if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(nodeName, "cache")
8610                 && !GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(nodeName, "defaultCache")
8611                 && !GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(nodeName, "diskStore")) {
8612               otherNodes.add(nodeElement);
8613             }
8614           }
8615         }
8616       }
8617       
8618       //lets copy the new example to both the example and the configured ehcache file
8619       //assume this is already backed up
8620       GrouperInstallerUtils.copyFile(newEhcacheExampleFile, existingEhcacheExampleFile, true);
8621       GrouperInstallerUtils.copyFile(newEhcacheExampleFile, existingEhcacheFile, true);
8622 
8623       //now lets do our edits
8624       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.length(diskStoreDifferences) > 0) {
8625         
8626         for (String attributeName : diskStoreDifferences.keySet()) {
8627 
8628           String attributeValue = diskStoreDifferences.get(attributeName);
8629 
8630           editXmlFileAttribute(existingEhcacheFile, "diskStore", null, attributeName, attributeValue, 
8631               "ehcache diskStore attribute '" + attributeName + "'");
8632           
8633         }
8634       }
8635       
8636       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.length(defaultCacheDifferences) > 0) {
8637         
8638         for (String attributeName : defaultCacheDifferences.keySet()) {
8639           
8640           String attributeValue = defaultCacheDifferences.get(attributeName);
8641 
8642           editXmlFileAttribute(existingEhcacheFile, "defaultCache", null, attributeName, attributeValue, 
8643               "ehcache defaultCache attribute '" + attributeName + "'");
8644 
8645         }
8646       }
8647 
8648       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.length(cacheDifferencesByCacheName) > 0) {
8649 
8650         existingEhcacheDoc = builder.parse(existingEhcacheFile);
8651         existingDocumentElement = existingEhcacheDoc.getDocumentElement();
8652         
8653         for (String cacheName : cacheDifferencesByCacheName.keySet()) {
8654 
8655           //see if the name exists
8656           //find the example cache
8657           XPathExpression expr = xpath.compile("cache[@name='" + cacheName + "']");
8658 
8659           Element existingCacheElement = (Element)expr.evaluate(existingDocumentElement, XPathConstants.NODE);
8660 
8661           Map<String, String> attributeMap = cacheDifferencesByCacheName.get(cacheName);
8662 
8663           //it exists
8664           if (existingCacheElement != null) {
8665 
8666             Map<String, String> expectedAttribute = new HashMap<String, String>();
8667 
8668             expectedAttribute.put("name", cacheName);
8669             
8670             for (String attributeName : attributeMap.keySet()) {
8671 
8672               String attributeValue = attributeMap.get(attributeName);
8673 
8674               editXmlFileAttribute(existingEhcacheFile, "cache", expectedAttribute, attributeName, attributeValue, 
8675                   "ehcache cache name=" + cacheName + " attribute '" + attributeName + "'");
8676             }
8677           } else {
8678 
8679               String fileContents = GrouperInstallerUtils.readFileIntoString(existingEhcacheFile);
8680 
8681               String newline = GrouperInstallerUtils.newlineFromFile(fileContents);
8682 
8683               int lastTagStart = fileContents.lastIndexOf("</ehcache>");
8684               
8685               if (lastTagStart == -1) {
8686                 throw new RuntimeException("Why is </ehcache> not found???? " + fileContents);
8687               }
8688 
8689               String tag = GrouperInstallerUtils.xmlElementToXml("cache", null, attributeMap);
8690 //              sdf
8691               String newFileContents = fileContents.substring(0, lastTagStart) + tag + newline 
8692                   + fileContents.substring(lastTagStart, fileContents.length());
8693 
8694               System.out.println(" - adding ehcache cache " + cacheName);
8695 
8696               GrouperInstallerUtils.saveStringIntoFile(existingEhcacheFile, newFileContents);
8697 
8698           }
8699 
8700         }
8701       }
8702 
8703       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.length(otherNodes) > 0) {
8704         String fileContents = GrouperInstallerUtils.readFileIntoString(existingEhcacheFile);
8705         
8706         String newline = GrouperInstallerUtils.newlineFromFile(fileContents);
8707 
8708         StringBuilder otherNodesStringBuilder = new StringBuilder();
8709         for (Element element : otherNodes) {
8710           String elementString = GrouperInstallerUtils.xmlToString(element);
8711           // take out the xml header: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
8712           
8713           int elementStart = elementString.indexOf("<" + element.getNodeName());
8714           
8715           elementString = elementString.substring(elementStart);
8716           
8717           otherNodesStringBuilder.append(elementString).append(newline);
8718           System.out.println(" - adding element " + element.getTagName());
8719         }
8720 
8721         int lastTagStart = fileContents.lastIndexOf("</ehcache>");
8722         
8723         if (lastTagStart == -1) {
8724           throw new RuntimeException("Why is </ehcache> not found???? " + fileContents);
8725         }
8726 
8727         String newFileContents = fileContents.substring(0, lastTagStart) + otherNodesStringBuilder.toString()
8728             + fileContents.substring(lastTagStart, fileContents.length());
8729 
8730         GrouperInstallerUtils.saveStringIntoFile(existingEhcacheFile, newFileContents);
8731 
8732       }
8733 
8734 
8735       // test the new file, look for things
8736       existingEhcacheDoc = builder.parse(existingEhcacheFile);
8737       existingDocumentElement = existingEhcacheDoc.getDocumentElement();
8738 
8739       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.length(diskStoreDifferences) > 0) {
8740         Element existingDiskStoreElement = (Element)existingDocumentElement.getElementsByTagName("diskStore").item(0);
8741         for (String attributeName : diskStoreDifferences.keySet()) {
8742           String attributeValue = diskStoreDifferences.get(attributeName);
8743           if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(attributeValue, existingDiskStoreElement.getAttribute(attributeName))) {
8744             throw new RuntimeException("Why is diskStore attribute " + attributeName + " not '" + attributeValue + "'" 
8745                 + existingEhcacheFile.getAbsolutePath());
8746           }
8747         }
8748       }
8749       
8750       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.length(defaultCacheDifferences) > 0) {
8751         Element existingDefaultCacheElement = (Element)existingDocumentElement.getElementsByTagName("defaultCache").item(0);
8752         for (String attributeName : defaultCacheDifferences.keySet()) {
8753           String attributeValue = defaultCacheDifferences.get(attributeName);
8754           if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(attributeValue, existingDefaultCacheElement.getAttribute(attributeName))) {
8755             throw new RuntimeException("Why is defaultCache attribute " + attributeName + " not '" + attributeValue + "'" 
8756                 + existingEhcacheFile.getAbsolutePath());
8757           }
8758         }
8759       }
8760 
8761       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.length(cacheDifferencesByCacheName) > 0) {
8762         for (String cacheName : cacheDifferencesByCacheName.keySet()) {
8763 
8764           //see if the name exists
8765           //find the example cache
8766           XPathExpression expr = xpath.compile("cache[@name='" + cacheName + "']");
8767           Element existingCacheElement = (Element)expr.evaluate(existingDocumentElement, XPathConstants.NODE);
8768 
8769           Map<String, String> attributeMap = cacheDifferencesByCacheName.get(cacheName);
8770           
8771           for (String attributeName : attributeMap.keySet()) {
8772             
8773             String attributeValue = attributeMap.get(attributeName);
8774 
8775             if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(attributeValue, existingCacheElement.getAttribute(attributeName))) {
8776               throw new RuntimeException("Why is cache " + cacheName + " attribute " + attributeName + " not '" + attributeValue + "'" 
8777                   + existingEhcacheFile.getAbsolutePath());
8778             }
8779             
8780           }
8781         }
8782       }
8783 
8784       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.length(otherNodes) > 0) {
8785         for (Element element : otherNodes) {
8786           
8787           NodeList nodeList = existingDocumentElement.getElementsByTagName(element.getNodeName());
8788           if (nodeList == null || nodeList.getLength() == 0 ) {
8789             throw new RuntimeException("Why is new element not there? " + element.getTagName() + ", "
8790                 + existingEhcacheFile.getAbsolutePath());
8791           }
8792         }
8793       }
8794 
8795     } catch (Exception e) {
8796       throw new RuntimeException(e.getMessage(), e);
8797     }
8798   }
8799 
8800   /**
8801    * 
8802    * @param newEhcacheExampleFile
8803    * @param existingEhcacheExampleFile
8804    * @param existingEhcacheFile
8805    * @return hasMerging
8806    */
8807   @SuppressWarnings("unused")
8808   private static boolean mergeEhcacheXmlFiles_XML_NOT_USED(File newEhcacheExampleFile, File existingEhcacheExampleFile, 
8809       File existingEhcacheFile) {
8810     
8811     boolean hasMerging = false;
8812     
8813     try {
8814       //lets get the differences of the existing ehcache file and the existing ehcache example file
8815       DocumentBuilderFactory domFactory = GrouperInstallerUtils.xmlDocumentBuilderFactory();
8816       DocumentBuilder builder = domFactory.newDocumentBuilder();
8817       Document existingEhcacheDoc = builder.parse(existingEhcacheFile);
8818       Document existingEhcacheExampleDoc = builder.parse(existingEhcacheExampleFile);
8819 
8820       Element existingDocumentElement = existingEhcacheDoc.getDocumentElement();
8821       Element existingExampleDocumentElement = existingEhcacheExampleDoc.getDocumentElement();
8822 
8823       Map<String, String> diskStoreDifferences = null;
8824       
8825       {
8826         Element existingDiskStoreElement = (Element)existingDocumentElement.getElementsByTagName("diskStore").item(0);
8827         Element existingExampleDiskStoreElement = (Element)existingExampleDocumentElement.getElementsByTagName("diskStore").item(0);
8828         diskStoreDifferences = xmlNodeAttributeDifferences(existingExampleDiskStoreElement, existingDiskStoreElement);
8829       }
8830 
8831       Map<String, String> defaultCacheDifferences = null;
8832 
8833       {
8834         Element existingDefaultCacheElement = (Element)existingDocumentElement.getElementsByTagName("defaultCache").item(0);
8835         Element existingExampleDefaultCacheElement = (Element)existingExampleDocumentElement.getElementsByTagName("defaultCache").item(0);
8836         defaultCacheDifferences = xmlNodeAttributeDifferences(existingExampleDefaultCacheElement, existingDefaultCacheElement);
8837         
8838       }
8839 
8840       XPath xpath = XPathFactory.newInstance().newXPath();
8841       
8842       //map of cache name to the differences in the attributes of the cache
8843       Map<String, Map<String, String>> cacheDifferencesByCacheName = new LinkedHashMap<String, Map<String, String>>();
8844       
8845       {
8846         NodeList existingCacheNodeList = existingDocumentElement.getElementsByTagName("cache");
8847         
8848         //loop through all the caches
8849         for (int i=0;i<existingCacheNodeList.getLength(); i++) {
8850           
8851           Element existingCacheElement = (Element)existingCacheNodeList.item(i);
8852 
8853           String cacheName = existingCacheElement.getAttribute("name");
8854 
8855           //find the example cache
8856           XPathExpression expr = xpath.compile("cache[@name='" + cacheName + "']");
8857           Element existingExampleCacheElement = (Element)expr.evaluate(existingExampleDocumentElement, XPathConstants.NODE);
8858 
8859           //see if they differ
8860           Map<String, String> differences = xmlNodeAttributeDifferences(existingExampleCacheElement, existingCacheElement);
8861           
8862           if (differences != null) {
8863             cacheDifferencesByCacheName.put(cacheName, differences);
8864           }
8865         }
8866         
8867         //note, dont worry if there were caches in the example that werent in the configured one
8868         
8869       }      
8870       
8871       //lets see if there are any other nodes
8872       Set<Element> otherNodes = new LinkedHashSet<Element>();
8873       {
8874         NodeList nodeList = existingDocumentElement.getChildNodes();
8875         
8876         for (int i=0;i<nodeList.getLength();i++) {
8877           Node node = nodeList.item(i);
8878           if (node instanceof Element) {
8879             Element nodeElement = (Element)node;
8880             String nodeName = nodeElement.getNodeName();
8881             if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(nodeName, "cache")
8882                 && !GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(nodeName, "defaultCache")
8883                 && !GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(nodeName, "diskStore")) {
8884               otherNodes.add(nodeElement);
8885             }
8886           }
8887         }
8888       }
8889       
8890       //lets copy the new example to both the example and the configured ehcache file
8891       //assume this is already backed up
