8892       GrouperInstallerUtils.copyFile(newEhcacheExampleFile, existingEhcacheExampleFile, true);
8893 
8894       //this is the new existing ehcache file
8895       existingEhcacheExampleDoc = builder.parse(existingEhcacheExampleFile);
8896       existingExampleDocumentElement = existingEhcacheExampleDoc.getDocumentElement();
8897 
8898       //now lets do our edits
8899       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.length(diskStoreDifferences) > 0) {
8900         
8901         hasMerging = true;
8902 
8903         Element existingExampleDiskStoreElement = (Element)existingExampleDocumentElement.getElementsByTagName("diskStore").item(0);
8904 
8905         for (String attributeName : diskStoreDifferences.keySet()) {
8906 
8907           String attributeValue = diskStoreDifferences.get(attributeName);
8908 
8909           existingExampleDiskStoreElement.setAttribute(attributeName, attributeValue);
8910         }
8911       }
8912       
8913       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.length(defaultCacheDifferences) > 0) {
8914 
8915         hasMerging = true;
8916 
8917         Element existingExampleDefaultCacheElement = (Element)existingExampleDocumentElement.getElementsByTagName("defaultCache").item(0);
8918         
8919         for (String attributeName : defaultCacheDifferences.keySet()) {
8920           
8921           String attributeValue = defaultCacheDifferences.get(attributeName);
8922 
8923           existingExampleDefaultCacheElement.setAttribute(attributeName, attributeValue);
8924           
8925         }
8926       }
8927 
8928       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.length(cacheDifferencesByCacheName) > 0) {
8929         hasMerging = true;
8930         for (String cacheName : cacheDifferencesByCacheName.keySet()) {
8931 
8932           //see if the name exists
8933           //find the example cache
8934           XPathExpression expr = xpath.compile("cache[@name='" + cacheName + "']");
8935           Element existingExampleCacheElement = (Element)expr.evaluate(existingExampleDocumentElement, XPathConstants.NODE);
8936 
8937           Map<String, String> attributeMap = cacheDifferencesByCacheName.get(cacheName);
8938           
8939           //it exists
8940           if (existingExampleCacheElement != null) {
8941             
8942             for (String attributeName : attributeMap.keySet()) {
8943               
8944               String attributeValue = attributeMap.get(attributeName);
8945               existingExampleCacheElement.setAttribute(attributeName, attributeValue);
8946               
8947             }
8948           } else {
8949             
8950             Element existingCacheElement = (Element)expr.evaluate(existingDocumentElement, XPathConstants.NODE);
8951             //move a cache from one document to another
8952             existingExampleDocumentElement.appendChild(existingCacheElement.cloneNode(true));
8953             
8954           }
8955           
8956         }
8957       }
8958 
8959       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.length(otherNodes) > 0) {
8960         hasMerging = true;
8961         for (Element element : otherNodes) {
8962           
8963           //move a cache from one document to another
8964           existingExampleDocumentElement.appendChild(element.cloneNode(true));
8965         }
8966       }
8967 
8968 //      System.out.println("Compare you old ehcache.xml with your new ehcache.xml file: " 
8969 //          + "\n  Old file: "
8970 //          + backedUpEhcacheFile.getAbsolutePath()
8971 //          + "\n  New file: " + existingEhcacheFile.getAbsolutePath());
8972 
8973       // save to file
8974       String xml = GrouperInstallerUtils.xmlToString(existingEhcacheExampleDoc);
8975       GrouperInstallerUtils.saveStringIntoFile(existingEhcacheFile, xml);
8976       
8977       // test the new file, look for things
8978       existingEhcacheDoc = builder.parse(existingEhcacheFile);
8979       existingDocumentElement = existingEhcacheDoc.getDocumentElement();
8980 
8981       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.length(diskStoreDifferences) > 0) {
8982         Element existingDiskStoreElement = (Element)existingDocumentElement.getElementsByTagName("diskStore").item(0);
8983         for (String attributeName : diskStoreDifferences.keySet()) {
8984           String attributeValue = diskStoreDifferences.get(attributeName);
8985           if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(attributeValue, existingDiskStoreElement.getAttribute(attributeName))) {
8986             throw new RuntimeException("Why is diskStore attribute " + attributeName + " not '" + attributeValue + "'" 
8987                 + existingEhcacheFile.getAbsolutePath());
8988           }
8989         }
8990       }
8991       
8992       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.length(defaultCacheDifferences) > 0) {
8993         Element existingDefaultCacheElement = (Element)existingDocumentElement.getElementsByTagName("defaultCache").item(0);
8994         for (String attributeName : defaultCacheDifferences.keySet()) {
8995           String attributeValue = defaultCacheDifferences.get(attributeName);
8996           if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(attributeValue, existingDefaultCacheElement.getAttribute(attributeName))) {
8997             throw new RuntimeException("Why is defaultCache attribute " + attributeName + " not '" + attributeValue + "'" 
8998                 + existingEhcacheFile.getAbsolutePath());
8999           }
9000         }
9001       }
9002 
9003       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.length(cacheDifferencesByCacheName) > 0) {
9004         for (String cacheName : cacheDifferencesByCacheName.keySet()) {
9005 
9006           //see if the name exists
9007           //find the example cache
9008           XPathExpression expr = xpath.compile("cache[@name='" + cacheName + "']");
9009           Element existingCacheElement = (Element)expr.evaluate(existingDocumentElement, XPathConstants.NODE);
9010 
9011           Map<String, String> attributeMap = cacheDifferencesByCacheName.get(cacheName);
9012           
9013           for (String attributeName : attributeMap.keySet()) {
9014             
9015             String attributeValue = attributeMap.get(attributeName);
9016 
9017             if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(attributeValue, existingCacheElement.getAttribute(attributeName))) {
9018               throw new RuntimeException("Why is cache " + cacheName + " attribute " + attributeName + " not '" + attributeValue + "'" 
9019                   + existingEhcacheFile.getAbsolutePath());
9020             }
9021             
9022           }
9023         }
9024       }
9025 
9026       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.length(otherNodes) > 0) {
9027         for (Element element : otherNodes) {
9028           
9029           NodeList nodeList = existingDocumentElement.getElementsByTagName(element.getNodeName());
9030           if (nodeList == null || nodeList.getLength() == 0 ) {
9031             throw new RuntimeException("Why is new element not there? " + element.getTagName() 
9032                 + existingEhcacheFile.getAbsolutePath());
9033           }
9034         }
9035       }
9036 
9037     } catch (Exception e) {
9038       throw new RuntimeException(e.getMessage(), e);
9039     }
9040     return hasMerging;
9041   }
9042   /**
9043    * 
9044    * @param baseElement
9045    * @param configuredElement
9046    * @return the map of differences
9047    */
9048   public static Map<String, String> xmlNodeAttributeDifferences(Element baseElement, Element configuredElement) {
9049     NamedNodeMap configuredNamedNodeMap = configuredElement.getAttributes();
9050     
9051     Map<String, String> result = null;
9052     
9053     //see which attributes are new or changed
9054     for (int i=0;i<configuredNamedNodeMap.getLength();i++) {
9055       Node configuredAttribute = configuredNamedNodeMap.item(i);
9056       Node baseAttribute = baseElement == null ? null : baseElement.getAttributeNode(configuredAttribute.getNodeName());
9057 
9058       String configuredValue = configuredAttribute.getNodeValue();
9059       String baseValue = baseAttribute == null ? null : baseAttribute.getNodeValue();
9060       
9061       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(configuredValue, baseValue)) {
9062         if (result == null) {
9063           result = new LinkedHashMap<String, String>();
9064         }
9065         result.put(configuredAttribute.getNodeName(), configuredValue);
9066       }
9067     }
9068     
9069     //see which ones are missing
9070     NamedNodeMap baseNamedNodeMap = baseElement == null ? null : baseElement.getAttributes();
9071     
9072     //see which attributes are new or changed
9073     for (int i=0;i<(baseNamedNodeMap == null ? 0 : baseNamedNodeMap.getLength());i++) {
9074       
9075       Node baseAttribute = configuredNamedNodeMap.item(0);
9076       Node configuredAttribute = configuredElement.getAttributeNode(baseAttribute.getNodeName());
9077 
9078       String baseValue = baseAttribute.getNodeValue();
9079       String configuredValue = configuredAttribute == null ? null : configuredAttribute.getNodeValue();
9080       
9081       if (configuredValue == null && !GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(configuredValue, baseValue)) {
9082         if (result == null) {
9083           result = new LinkedHashMap<String, String>();
9084         }
9085         result.put(baseAttribute.getNodeName(), configuredValue);
9086       }
9087     }
9088     
9089     return result;
9090   }
9091   
9092   /**
9093    * 
9094    * @return the file of the directory of API
9095    */
9096   private File downloadApi() {
9097     String urlToDownload = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("download.server.url", true);
9098     
9099     if (!urlToDownload.endsWith("/")) {
9100       urlToDownload += "/";
9101     }
9102     urlToDownload += "release/";
9103     String apiFileName = "grouper.apiBinary-" + this.version + ".tar.gz";
9104     urlToDownload += this.version + "/" + apiFileName;
9105 
9106     File apiFile = new File(this.grouperTarballDirectoryString + apiFileName);
9107     
9108     downloadFile(urlToDownload, apiFile.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalApiDownloadTarEtc");
9109 
9110     return apiFile;
9111   }
9112 
9113   /**
9114    * 
9115    * @return the file of the directory of UI
9116    */
9117   private File downloadUi() {
9118     String urlToDownload = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("download.server.url", true);
9119     
9120     if (!urlToDownload.endsWith("/")) {
9121       urlToDownload += "/";
9122     }
9123     urlToDownload += "release/";
9124 
9125     String uiFileName = "grouper.ui-" + this.version + ".tar.gz";
9126     urlToDownload += this.version + "/" + uiFileName;
9127 
9128     File uiFile = new File(this.grouperTarballDirectoryString + uiFileName);
9129     
9130     downloadFile(urlToDownload, uiFile.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalUiDownloadTarEtc");
9131 
9132     return uiFile;
9133   }
9134 
9135   /**
9136    * 
9137    * @return the file of the directory of WS
9138    */
9139   private File downloadWs() {
9140     String urlToDownload = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("download.server.url", true);
9141     
9142     if (!urlToDownload.endsWith("/")) {
9143       urlToDownload += "/";
9144     }
9145     urlToDownload += "release/";
9146 
9147     String wsFileName = "grouper.ws-" + this.version + ".tar.gz";
9148     urlToDownload += this.version + "/" + wsFileName;
9149 
9150     File wsFile = new File(this.grouperTarballDirectoryString + wsFileName);
9151     
9152     downloadFile(urlToDownload, wsFile.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalWsDownloadTarEtc");
9153 
9154     return wsFile;
9155   }
9156

9158    * 
9159    * @return the file of the directory of ant
9160    */
9161   private File downloadAnt() {
9162     String urlToDownload = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("download.server.url", true);
9163     
9164     if (!urlToDownload.endsWith("/")) {
9165       urlToDownload += "/";
9166     }
9167 
9168     urlToDownload += "downloads/tools/apache-ant-1.8.2-bin.tar.gz";
9169     
9170     File antFile = new File(this.grouperTarballDirectoryString + "apache-ant-1.8.2-bin.tar.gz");
9171     
9172     downloadFile(urlToDownload, antFile.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalToolsDownloadTarEtc");
9173 
9174     return antFile;
9175   }

9178    * 
9179    * @return the file of the directory of maven
9180    */
9181   private File downloadMaven() {
9182     String urlToDownload = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("download.server.url", true);
9183     
9184     if (!urlToDownload.endsWith("/")) {
9185       urlToDownload += "/";
9186     }
9187 
9188     urlToDownload += "downloads/tools/apache-maven-3.2.5-bin.tar.gz";
9189     
9190     File mavenFile = new File(this.grouperTarballDirectoryString + "apache-maven-3.2.5-bin.tar.gz");
9191     
9192     downloadFile(urlToDownload, mavenFile.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalToolsDownloadTarEtc");
9193 
9194     return mavenFile;
9195   }

9197   /**
9198    * 
9199    * @return the file of the directory of tomcat
9200    */
9201   private File downloadTomcat() {
9202     String urlToDownload = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("download.server.url", true);
9203     
9204     if (!urlToDownload.endsWith("/")) {
9205       urlToDownload += "/";
9206     }
9207 
9208     urlToDownload += "downloads/tools/apache-tomcat-6.0.35.tar.gz";
9209     
9210     File tomcatFile = new File(this.grouperTarballDirectoryString + "apache-tomcat-6.0.35.tar.gz");
9211     
9212     downloadFile(urlToDownload, tomcatFile.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalToolsDownloadTarEtc");
9213 
9214     return tomcatFile;
9215   }
9216 
9217   /**
9218    * add quick start subjects
9219    */
9220   private void addQuickstartSubjects() {
9221     
9222     System.out.print("Do you want to add quickstart subjects to DB (t|f)? [t]: ");
9223     boolean addQuickstartSubjects = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.addQuickstartSubjectsToDb");
9224     
9225     if (addQuickstartSubjects) {
9226 
9227       String url = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("download.server.url", true);
9228       
9229       if (!url.endsWith("/")) {
9230         url += "/";
9231       }
9232       url += "release/" + this.version + "/subjects.sql";
9233 
9234       String subjectsSqlFileName = this.untarredApiDir.getParent() + File.separator + "subjects.sql";
9235       File subjectsSqlFile = new File(subjectsSqlFileName);
9236       downloadFile(url, subjectsSqlFileName, "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalApiDownloadTarEtc");
9237 
9238       List<String> commands = new ArrayList<String>();
9239       
9240       addGshCommands(commands);
9241       commands.add("-registry");
9242       commands.add("-runsqlfile");
9243       commands.add(subjectsSqlFile.getAbsolutePath());
9244       commands.add("-noprompt");
9245       
9246       System.out.println("\n##################################");
9247       System.out.println("Adding sample subjects with command: " + convertCommandsIntoCommand(commands) + "\n");
9248       
9249       CommandResult commandResult = GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(
9250           GrouperInstallerUtils.toArray(commands, String.class), true, true, null, 
9251           this.untarredApiDir, null, true);
9252       
9253       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getErrorText())) {
9254         System.out.println("stderr: " + commandResult.getErrorText());
9255       }
9256       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getOutputText())) {
9257         System.out.println("stdout: " + commandResult.getOutputText());
9258       }
9259       
9260       System.out.println("\nEnd adding sample subjects");
9261       System.out.println("##################################\n");
9262 
9263     }
9264   }
9265 
9266   /**
9267    * add quick start subjects
9268    */
9269   private void addQuickstartData() {
9270 
9271     System.out.print("Do you want to add quickstart data to registry (t|f)? [t] ");
9272     boolean addQuickstartData = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.addQuickstartData");
9273 
9274     if (addQuickstartData) {
9275       String url = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("download.server.url", true);
9276       
9277       if (!url.endsWith("/")) {
9278         url += "/";
9279       }
9280       url += "release/" + this.version + "/quickstart.xml";
9281       String quickstartFileName = this.untarredApiDir.getParent() + File.separator + "quickstart.xml";
9282       
9283       File quickstartFile = new File(quickstartFileName);
9284       downloadFile(url, quickstartFileName, "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalApiDownloadTarEtc");
9285 
9286       List<String> commands = new ArrayList<String>();
9287       
9288       addGshCommands(commands);
9289       commands.add("-xmlimportold");
9290       commands.add("GrouperSystem");
9291       commands.add(quickstartFile.getAbsolutePath());
9292       commands.add("-noprompt");
9293       
9294       System.out.println("\n##################################");
9295       System.out.println("Adding quickstart data with command: " + convertCommandsIntoCommand(commands) + "\n");
9296       
9297       CommandResult commandResult = GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(
9298           GrouperInstallerUtils.toArray(commands, String.class), true, true, null, 
9299           this.untarredApiDir, null, true);
9300       
9301       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getErrorText())) {
9302         System.out.println("stderr: " + commandResult.getErrorText());
9303       }
9304       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getOutputText())) {
9305 
9306         System.out.println("stdout: " + commandResult.getOutputText());
9307       }
9308       System.out.println("\nEnd adding quickstart data");
9309       System.out.println("##################################\n");
9310 
9311     }
9312   }
9313   
9314   /**
9315    * if commands have spaces, put quotes around...
9316    * @param commands
9317    * @return the command
9318    */
9319   private static String convertCommandsIntoCommand(List<String> commands) {
9320     StringBuilder result = new StringBuilder();
9321     for (int i=0;i<GrouperInstallerUtils.length(commands); i++) {
9322       String command = GrouperInstallerUtils.defaultString(commands.get(i));
9323       
9324       //if there is a space, put quotes around command
9325       if (command.contains(" ")) {
9326         result.append("\"").append(command).append("\"");
9327       } else {
9328         result.append(command);
9329       }
9330       if (i != GrouperInstallerUtils.length(commands)-1) {
9331         result.append(" ");
9332       }
9333     }
9334     return result.toString();
9335   }
9336   
9337   /**
9338    * 
9339    */
9340   private void initDb() {
9341     System.out.print("Do you want to init the database (delete all existing grouper tables, add new ones) (t|f)? ");
9342     boolean initdb = readFromStdInBoolean(null, "grouperInstaller.autorun.deleteAndInitDatabase");
9343     
9344     if (initdb) {
9345       List<String> commands = new ArrayList<String>();
9346       
9347       addGshCommands(commands);
9348       commands.add("-registry");
9349       commands.add("-drop");
9350       commands.add("-runscript");
9351       commands.add("-noprompt");
9352       
9353       System.out.println("\n##################################");
9354       System.out.println("Initting DB with command: " + convertCommandsIntoCommand(commands) + "\n");
9355       
9356       CommandResult commandResult = GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(
9357           GrouperInstallerUtils.toArray(commands, String.class), true, true, null, 
9358           this.untarredApiDir, null, true);
9359       
9360       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getErrorText())) {
9361         System.out.println("stderr: " + commandResult.getErrorText());
9362       }
9363       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getOutputText())) {
9364 
9365         System.out.println("stdout: " + commandResult.getOutputText());
9366       }
9367       System.out.println("\nEnd Initting DB");
9368       System.out.println("##################################\n");
9369       
9370       
9371     }
9372 
9373   }
9374   
9375   /**
9376    * 
9377    */
9378   private void startLoader() {
9379     System.out.print("Do you want to start the Grouper loader (daemons)?\n  (note, if it is already running, you need to stop it now, check " 
9380         + (GrouperInstallerUtils.isWindows() ? "the task manager for java.exe" : "ps -ef | grep gsh | grep loader") + ") (t|f)? [f]: ");
9381     boolean startLoader = readFromStdInBoolean(false, "grouperInstaller.autorun.startGrouperDaemons");
9382     
9383     if (startLoader) {
9384       final List<String> commands = new ArrayList<String>();
9385       
9386       addGshCommands(commands);
9387       commands.add("-loader");
9388 
9389       System.out.println("\n##################################");
9390       System.out.println("Starting the Grouper loader (daemons): " + convertCommandsIntoCommand(commands) + "\n");
9391 
9392       //start in new thread
9393       Thread thread = new Thread(new Runnable() {
9394         
9395         @Override
9396         public void run() {
9397           GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(GrouperInstallerUtils.toArray(commands, String.class),
9398               true, true, null, GrouperInstaller.this.untarredApiDir, 
9399               GrouperInstaller.this.grouperInstallDirectoryString + "grouperLoader", false);
9400         }
9401       });
9402       thread.setDaemon(true);
9403       thread.start();
9404       
9405       System.out.println("\nEnd starting the Grouper loader (daemons)");
9406       System.out.println("##################################\n");
9407       
9408     }
9409 
9410   }
9411 
9412   /**
9413    * gsh command fully qualified
9414    */
9415   private String gshCommand;
9416   
9417   /**
9418    * 
9419    * @return the gsh command
9420    */
9421   private String gshCommand() {
9422 
9423     if (this.gshCommand == null) {
9424 
9425       String gshDir = GrouperInstallerUtils.defaultIfBlank(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString, 
9426           this.untarredApiDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator);
9427       
9428       String gsh = gshDir + "bin" + File.separator 
9429           + (GrouperInstallerUtils.isWindows() ? "gsh.bat" : "gsh.sh");
9430       
9431       if (new File(gsh).exists()) {
9432         this.gshCommand = gsh;
9433         return gsh;
9434       }
9435 
9436       gsh = gshDir + "WEB-INF" + File.separator + "bin" + File.separator 
9437           + (GrouperInstallerUtils.isWindows() ? "gsh.bat" : "gsh.sh");
9438 
9439       if (new File(gsh).exists()) {
9440         this.gshCommand = gsh;
9441         return gsh;
9442       }
9443       
9444       throw new RuntimeException("Cant find gsh: " + gshDir);
9445     }
9446 
9447     return this.gshCommand;
9448   }
9449 
9450   /**
9451    * 
9452    */
9453   private void checkDatabaseConnection() {
9454     System.out.println("Checking database with query: " + this.giDbUtils.checkConnectionQuery());
9455     Exception exception = this.giDbUtils.checkConnection();
9456     if (exception == null) {
9457       System.out.println("Successfully tested database connection");
9458     } else {
9459       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.getFullStackTrace(exception).contains(ClassNotFoundException.class.getName())) {
9460         System.out.println("Cannot check connection since driver is not in classpath of installer, this is fine but not sure if connection details work or not");
9461       } else {
9462         System.out.println("Error: could not connect to the database: ");
9463         exception.printStackTrace();
9464       }
9465     }
9466   }
9467 
9468   /**
9469    * get hsql port
9470    * @return port
9471    */
9472   private int hsqlPort() {
9473     //get right port
9474     int port = 9001;
9475     
9476     //match this, get the port: jdbc:hsqldb:hsql://localhost:9001/grouper
9477     Pattern pattern = Pattern.compile("jdbc:hsqldb:.*:(\\d+)/.*");
9478     Matcher matcher = pattern.matcher(this.dbUrl);
9479     if (matcher.matches()) {
9480       port = GrouperInstallerUtils.intValue(matcher.group(1));
9481     }
9482     return port;
9483   }
9484   
9485   /**
9486    * 
9487    */
9488   private void startHsqlDb() {
9489     System.out.print("Do you want this script to start the hsqldb database (note, it must not be running in able to start) (t|f)? [t]: ");
9490     boolean startdb = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.startHsqlDatabase");
9491     if (startdb) {
9492       
9493       shutdownHsql();
9494 
9495       //get right port
9496       int port = hsqlPort();
9497       
9498       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.portAvailable(port, this.defaultIpAddress)) {
9499         System.out.println("This port does not seem available, even after trying to stop the DB! " + port + "...");
9500         if (!shouldContinue("grouperInstaller.autorun.continueAfterPortNotAvailable")) {
9501           throw new RuntimeException("This port is not available, even after trying to stop the DB! " + port);
9502         }
9503       }
9504       
9505       final List<String> command = new ArrayList<String>();
9506 
9507       command.add(GrouperInstallerUtils.javaCommand());
9508       command.add("-cp");
9509       command.add(this.untarredApiDir + File.separator + "lib" + File.separator + "jdbcSamples" + File.separator 
9510           + "hsqldb.jar");
9511       //-cp lib\jdbcSamples\hsqldb.jar org.hsqldb.Server -database.0 file:grouper -dbname.0 grouper -port 9001
9512       command.addAll(GrouperInstallerUtils.splitTrimToList("org.hsqldb.Server -database.0 file:" 
9513           + this.untarredApiDir + File.separator + "grouper -dbname.0 grouper -port " + port, " "));
9514 
9515 //        System.out.println("Starting DB with command: java -cp grouper.apiBinary-" + this.version + File.separator 
9516 //            + "lib" + File.separator + "jdbcSamples" + File.separator 
9517 //            + "hsqldb.jar org.hsqldb.Server -database.0 file:grouper -dbname.0 grouper");
9518 
9519       System.out.println("Starting DB with command: " + GrouperInstallerUtils.join(command.iterator(), " "));
9520 
9521       //start in new thread
9522       Thread thread = new Thread(new Runnable() {
9523         
9524         @Override
9525         public void run() {
9526           GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(GrouperInstallerUtils.toArray(command, String.class),
9527               true, true, null, null, 
9528               GrouperInstaller.this.grouperInstallDirectoryString + "hsqlDb", false, false);
9529         }
9530       });
9531       thread.setDaemon(true);
9532       thread.start();
9533       
9534     }
9535     
9536     //lets sleep for a bit to let it start
9537     GrouperInstallerUtils.sleep(2000);
9538     
9539   }
9540 
9541   /** gi db utils */
9542   private GiDbUtils giDbUtils = null;
9543   
9544   /**
9545    * 
9546    */
9547   private void shutdownHsql() {
9548     
9549     try {
9550       this.giDbUtils.executeUpdate("SHUTDOWN", null, false);
9551       System.out.println("Shutting down HSQL before starting it by sending the SQL: SHUTDOWN");
9552     } catch (Exception e) {
9553       //e.printStackTrace();
9554       System.out.println("HSQL was not detected to be running (did not successfully stop it)");
9555     }
9556   }
9557 
9558   /**
9559    * 
9560    */
9561   private void configureTomcatUiWebapp() {
9562     
9563     File serverXmlFile = new File(this.untarredTomcatDir.getAbsolutePath() 
9564         + File.separator + "conf" + File.separator + "server.xml");
9565     
9566     //C:\mchyzer\grouper\trunk\grouper-installer\grouper.ui-2.0.2\dist\grouper
9567     //
9568     //<Context docBase="C:\mchyzer\grouper\trunk\grouper-ws_trunk\webapp" path="/grouper-ws" reloadable="false"/>
9569     //Server
9570     //Service
9571     //Engine
9572     //Host
9573 
9574     System.out.print("Enter the URL path for the UI [grouper]: ");
9575     this.tomcatUiPath = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.urlPathForUi");
9576     
9577     if (GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(this.tomcatUiPath)) {
9578       this.tomcatUiPath = "grouper";
9579     }
9580 
9581     if (this.tomcatUiPath.endsWith("/") || this.tomcatUiPath.endsWith("\\")) {
9582       this.tomcatUiPath = this.tomcatUiPath.substring(0, this.tomcatUiPath.length()-1);
9583     }
9584     if (this.tomcatUiPath.startsWith("/") || this.tomcatUiPath.startsWith("\\")) {
9585       this.tomcatUiPath = this.tomcatUiPath.substring(1, this.tomcatUiPath.length());
9586     }
9587     
9588     String currentDocBase = GrouperInstallerUtils.xpathEvaluateAttribute(serverXmlFile, 
9589         "Server/Service/Engine/Host/Context[@path='/" + this.tomcatUiPath + "']", "docBase");
9590 
9591     String shouldBeDocBase = grouperUiBuildToDirName();
9592 
9593     System.out.println("Editing tomcat config file: " + serverXmlFile.getAbsolutePath());
9594     
9595     if (GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(currentDocBase)) {
9596 
9597       //need to add it
9598       //<Host appBase="webapps" autoDeploy="true" name="localhost" unpackWARs="true" xmlNamespaceAware="false" xmlValidation="false">
9599       //<Context docBase="C:\mchyzer\grouper\trunk\grouper-ws_trunk\webapp" path="/grouper-ws" reloadable="false"/>
9600       addToXmlFile(serverXmlFile, ">", new String[]{"<Host "}, 
9601           "<Context docBase=\"" + shouldBeDocBase + "\" path=\"/" + this.tomcatUiPath + "\" reloadable=\"false\"/>", "tomcat context for UI");
9602 
9603     } else {
9604 
9605       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(currentDocBase, shouldBeDocBase)) {
9606         
9607         //lets edit the file
9608         //<Context docBase="C:\mchyzer\grouper\trunk\grouper-ws_trunk\webapp" path="/grouper-ws" reloadable="false"/>
9609         editFile(serverXmlFile, "docBase=\"([^\"]+)\"", new String[]{"<Context", "path=\"/" + this.tomcatUiPath + "\""}, 
9610             null, shouldBeDocBase, "tomcat context for UI");
9611 
9612       } else {
9613         
9614         System.out.println("  - Context is already set for Grouper UI");
9615         
9616       }
9617       
9618       
9619     }
9620     
9621     currentDocBase = GrouperInstallerUtils.xpathEvaluateAttribute(serverXmlFile, 
9622         "Server/Service/Engine/Host/Context[@path='/" + this.tomcatUiPath + "']", "docBase");
9623     
9624     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(currentDocBase, shouldBeDocBase)) {
9625       System.out.println("Tried to edit server.xml but it didnt work, should have context of: '" 
9626           + shouldBeDocBase + "', but was: '" + currentDocBase + "'");
9627     }
9628     
9629   }
9630 
9631   /**
9632    * 
9633    * @return grouper ui build to name
9634    */
9635   private String grouperUiBuildToDirName() {
9636     return this.untarredUiDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "dist" + File.separator + "grouper";
9637   }
9638 
9639   /**
9640    * @param isInstallNotUpgrade
9641    */
9642   private void buildWs(boolean isInstallNotUpgrade) {
9643     
9644     File grouperWsBuildToDir = new File(this.grouperWsBuildToDirName());
9645     
9646     if (grouperWsBuildToDir.exists()) {
9647 
9648       boolean rebuildWs = true;
9649       
9650       boolean defaultRebuild = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValueBoolean("grouperInstaller.default.ws.rebuildIfBuilt", true, false);
9651       System.out.print("The Grouper WS has been built in the past, do you want it rebuilt? (t|f) [" 
9652           + (defaultRebuild ? "t" : "f") + "]: ");
9653       rebuildWs = readFromStdInBoolean(defaultRebuild, "grouperInstaller.autorun.rebuildWsIfBuiltAlready");
9654   
9655       if (!rebuildWs) {
9656         return;
9657       }
9658     }
9659     
9660     if (isInstallNotUpgrade) {
9661       //stop tomcat
9662       try {
9663         tomcatBounce("stop");
9664       } catch (Throwable e) {
9665         System.out.println("Couldnt stop tomcat, ignoring...");
9666       }
9667     }
9668     
9669     List<String> commands = new ArrayList<String>();
9670     
9671     addAntCommands(commands);
9672     commands.add("dist");
9673     
9674     System.out.println("\n##################################");
9675     System.out.println("Building WS with command:\n" + this.untarredWsDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-ws" + "> " 
9676         + convertCommandsIntoCommand(commands) + "\n");
9677     
9678     CommandResult commandResult = GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(GrouperInstallerUtils.toArray(commands, String.class),
9679         true, true, null, new File(this.untarredWsDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-ws"), null, true);
9680     
9681     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getErrorText())) {
9682       System.out.println("stderr: " + commandResult.getErrorText());
9683     }
9684     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getOutputText())) {
9685       System.out.println("stdout: " + commandResult.getOutputText());
9686     }
9687 
9688     if (isInstallNotUpgrade) {
9689       System.out.print("Do you want to set the log dir of WS (t|f)? [t]: ");
9690       boolean setLogDir = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.setWsLogDir");
9691       
9692       if (setLogDir) {
9693         
9694         ////set the log dir
9695         //C:\apps\grouperInstallerTest\grouper.ws-2.0.2\grouper-ws\build\dist\grouper-ws\WEB-INF\classes\log4j.properties
9696         //
9697         //${grouper.home}logs
9698   
9699         String defaultLogDir = this.untarredTomcatDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "logs" + File.separator + "grouperWs";
9700         System.out.print("Enter the WS log dir: [" + defaultLogDir + "]: ");
9701         String logDir = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.wsLogDir");
9702         logDir = GrouperInstallerUtils.defaultIfBlank(logDir, defaultLogDir);
9703         
9704         //lets replace \\ with /
9705         logDir = GrouperInstallerUtils.replace(logDir, "\\\\", "/");
9706         //lets replace \ with /
9707         logDir = GrouperInstallerUtils.replace(logDir, "\\", "/");
9708   
9709         File log4jFile = new File(grouperWsBuildToDirName() + File.separator + "WEB-INF" + File.separator + "classes"
9710             + File.separator + "log4j.properties");
9711         
9712         System.out.println("Editing file: " + log4jFile.getAbsolutePath());
9713         
9714         editFile(log4jFile, "log4j\\.\\S+\\.File\\s*=\\s*([^\\s]+logs)/grouper_[^\\s]+\\.log", null, 
9715             null, logDir, "WS log directory");
9716         
9717         File logDirFile = new File(defaultLogDir);
9718         if (!logDirFile.exists()) {
9719           System.out.println("Creating log directory: " + logDirFile.getAbsolutePath());
9720           GrouperInstallerUtils.mkdirs(logDirFile);
9721         }
9722         //test log dir
9723         File testLogDirFile = new File(logDirFile.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "testFile" + GrouperInstallerUtils.uniqueId() + ".txt");
9724         GrouperInstallerUtils.saveStringIntoFile(testLogDirFile, "test");
9725         if (!testLogDirFile.delete()) {
9726           throw new RuntimeException("Cant delete file: " +  testLogDirFile.getAbsolutePath());
9727         }
9728         System.out.println("Created and deleted a test file successfully in dir: " + logDirFile.getAbsolutePath());
9729       }
9730     }
9731     
9732     System.out.println("\nEnd building Ws");
9733     System.out.println("##################################\n");
9734   
9735     
9736   }
9737 
9738   /**
9739    * 
9740    */
9741   private void configureTomcatWsWebapp() {
9742     
9743     File serverXmlFile = new File(this.untarredTomcatDir.getAbsolutePath() 
9744         + File.separator + "conf" + File.separator + "server.xml");
9745     
9746     //C:\mchyzer\grouper\trunk\grouper-installer\grouper.ui-2.0.2\dist\grouper
9747     //
9748     //<Context docBase="C:\mchyzer\grouper\trunk\grouper-ws_trunk\webapp" path="/grouper-ws" reloadable="false"/>
9749     //Server
9750     //Service
9751     //Engine
9752     //Host
9753   
9754     System.out.print("Enter the URL path for the WS [grouper-ws]: ");
9755     this.tomcatWsPath = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.wsUrlPath");
9756     
9757     if (GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(this.tomcatWsPath)) {
9758       this.tomcatWsPath = "grouper-ws";
9759     }
9760   
9761     if (this.tomcatWsPath.endsWith("/") || this.tomcatWsPath.endsWith("\\")) {
9762       this.tomcatWsPath = this.tomcatWsPath.substring(0, this.tomcatWsPath.length()-1);
9763     }
9764     if (this.tomcatWsPath.startsWith("/") || this.tomcatWsPath.startsWith("\\")) {
9765       this.tomcatWsPath = this.tomcatWsPath.substring(1);
9766     }
9767     
9768     String currentDocBase = GrouperInstallerUtils.xpathEvaluateAttribute(serverXmlFile, 
9769         "Server/Service/Engine/Host/Context[@path='/" + this.tomcatWsPath + "']", "docBase");
9770   
9771     //grouper.ws-2.0.2\grouper-ws\build\dist\grouper-ws
9772     
9773     String shouldBeDocBase = grouperWsBuildToDirName();
9774   
9775     System.out.println("Editing tomcat config file: " + serverXmlFile.getAbsolutePath());
9776     
9777     if (GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(currentDocBase)) {
9778   
9779       //need to add it
9780       //<Host appBase="webapps" autoDeploy="true" name="localhost" unpackWARs="true" xmlNamespaceAware="false" xmlValidation="false">
9781       //<Context docBase="C:\mchyzer\grouper\trunk\grouper-ws_trunk\webapp" path="/grouper-ws" reloadable="false"/>
9782       addToXmlFile(serverXmlFile, ">", new String[]{"<Host "}, 
9783           "<Context docBase=\"" + shouldBeDocBase + "\" path=\"/" + this.tomcatWsPath + "\" reloadable=\"false\"/>", "tomcat context for WS");
9784   
9785     } else {
9786   
9787       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(currentDocBase, shouldBeDocBase)) {
9788         
9789         //lets edit the file
9790         //<Context docBase="C:\mchyzer\grouper\trunk\grouper-ws_trunk\webapp" path="/grouper-ws" reloadable="false"/>
9791         editFile(serverXmlFile, "docBase=\"([^\"]+)\"", new String[]{"<Context", "path=\"/" + this.tomcatWsPath + "\""}, 
9792             null, shouldBeDocBase, "tomcat context for WS");
9793   
9794       } else {
9795         
9796         System.out.println("  - Context is already set for Grouper WS");
9797         
9798       }
9799       
9800       
9801     }
9802     
9803     currentDocBase = GrouperInstallerUtils.xpathEvaluateAttribute(serverXmlFile, 
9804         "Server/Service/Engine/Host/Context[@path='/" + this.tomcatWsPath + "']", "docBase");
9805     
9806     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(currentDocBase, shouldBeDocBase)) {
9807       System.out.println("Tried to edit server.xml but it didnt work, should have context of: '" 
9808           + shouldBeDocBase + "', but was: '" + currentDocBase + "'");
9809     }
9810     
9811   }
9812 
9813   /**
9814    * @return grouper ws build to dir name
9815    */
9816   private String grouperWsBuildToDirName() {
9817     return this.untarredWsDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-ws" + File.separator 
9818       + "build" + File.separator + "dist" + File.separator + "grouper-ws";
9819   }
9820 
9821   /**
9822      * 
9823      */
9824     private void configureClient() {
9825       //properties file
9826       File localGrouperClientPropertiesFile = new File(this.untarredClientDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator 
9827           + "grouper.client.properties");
9828       
9829       //set the grouper property
9830       System.out.println("Editing " + localGrouperClientPropertiesFile.getAbsolutePath() + ": ");
9831       editPropertiesFile(localGrouperClientPropertiesFile, "grouperClient.webService.url", "http://localhost:" 
9832           + this.tomcatHttpPort + "/" + this.tomcatWsPath + "/servicesRest", false);
9833       editPropertiesFile(localGrouperClientPropertiesFile, "grouperClient.webService.login", "GrouperSystem", false);
9834       editPropertiesFile(localGrouperClientPropertiesFile, "grouperClient.webService.password", this.grouperSystemPassword, false);
9835       
9836       
9837 //      grouperClient.webService.url = http://localhost:8200/grouper-ws/servicesRest
9838 //
9839 //      # kerberos principal used to connect to web service
9840 //      grouperClient.webService.login = GrouperSystem
9841 //
9842 //      # password for shared secret authentication to web service
9843 //      # or you can put a filename with an encrypted password
9844 //      grouperClient.webService.password = myNewPass
9845 
9846       
9847     }
9848 
9849   /**
9850    * 
9851    * @return the file of the directory of WS
9852    */
9853   private File downloadClient() {
9854     String urlToDownload = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("download.server.url", true);
9855     
9856     if (!urlToDownload.endsWith("/")) {
9857       urlToDownload += "/";
9858     }
9859     urlToDownload += "release/";
9860   
9861     String clientFileName = "grouper.clientBinary-" + this.version + ".tar.gz";
9862     urlToDownload += this.version + "/" + clientFileName;
9863   
9864     File clientFile = new File(this.grouperTarballDirectoryString + clientFileName);
9865     
9866     downloadFile(urlToDownload, clientFile.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalClientDownloadTarEtc");
9867 
9868     return clientFile;
9869   }
9870 
9871   /**
9872    * 
9873    */
9874   private void addGrouperSystemWsGroup() {
9875 
9876     //C:\mchyzer\grouper\trunk\grouper-installer\grouper.apiBinary-2.0.2\bin>gsh -runarg "grouperSession = GrouperSession.startRootSession();\nwsGroup = new GroupSave(grouperSession).assignName(\"etc:webServiceClientUsers\").assignCreateParentStemsIfNotExist(true).save();\nwsGroup.addMember(SubjectFinder.findRootSubject(), false);"
9877 
9878     //running with command on command line doenst work on linux since the args with whitespace translate to 
9879     //save the commands to a file, and runt he file
9880     StringBuilder gshCommands = new StringBuilder();
9881     gshCommands.append("grouperSession = GrouperSession.startRootSession();\n");
9882     gshCommands.append("wsGroup = new GroupSave(grouperSession).assignName(\"etc:webServiceClientUsers\").assignCreateParentStemsIfNotExist(true).save();\n");
9883     gshCommands.append("wsGroup.addMember(SubjectFinder.findRootSubject(), false);\n");
9884     
9885     File gshFile = new File(this.untarredApiDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "gshAddGrouperSystemWsGroup.gsh");
9886     GrouperInstallerUtils.saveStringIntoFile(gshFile, gshCommands.toString());
9887     
9888     List<String> commands = new ArrayList<String>();
9889 
9890     addGshCommands(commands);
9891     commands.add(gshFile.getAbsolutePath());
9892 
9893     System.out.println("\n##################################");
9894     System.out.println("Adding user GrouperSystem to grouper-ws users group with command:\n  " + convertCommandsIntoCommand(commands) + "\n");
9895 
9896     CommandResult commandResult = GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(
9897         GrouperInstallerUtils.toArray(commands, String.class), true, true, null, 
9898         this.untarredApiDir, null, true);
9899 
9900     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getErrorText())) {
9901       System.out.println("stderr: " + commandResult.getErrorText());
9902     }
9903     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getOutputText())) {
9904       System.out.println("stdout: " + commandResult.getOutputText());
9905     }
9906 
9907 
9908   }
9909 
9910   /**
9911    * 
9912    */
9913   private void runChangeLogTempToChangeLog() {
9914 
9915     boolean defaultBoolean = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValueBoolean("grouperInstaller.default.api.runChangeLogToChangeLogTemp", true, false);
9916     System.out.print("Is it ok to run a script that copies change log temp records to the change log (recommended) (t|f)? [" 
9917         + (defaultBoolean ? "t" : "f") + "]: ");
9918     boolean runScript = readFromStdInBoolean(defaultBoolean, "grouperInstaller.autorun.runChangeLogTempToChangeLog");
9919 
9920     
9921     if (!runScript) {
9922       return;
9923     }
9924     
9925     //running with command on command line doenst work on linux since the args with whitespace translate to 
9926     //save the commands to a file, and runt he file
9927     StringBuilder gshCommands = new StringBuilder();
9928     gshCommands.append("grouperSession = GrouperSession.startRootSession();\n");
9929     gshCommands.append("loaderRunOneJob(\"CHANGE_LOG_changeLogTempToChangeLog\");\n");
9930     
9931     File gshFile = new File(this.untarredApiDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "gshChangeLogTempToChangeLog.gsh");
9932     GrouperInstallerUtils.saveStringIntoFile(gshFile, gshCommands.toString());
9933     
9934     List<String> commands = new ArrayList<String>();
9935 
9936     addGshCommands(commands);
9937     commands.add(gshFile.getAbsolutePath());
9938 
9939     System.out.println("\n##################################");
9940     System.out.println("Copying records from change log temp to change log with command:\n  " + convertCommandsIntoCommand(commands) + "\n");
9941 
9942     CommandResult commandResult = GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(
9943         GrouperInstallerUtils.toArray(commands, String.class), true, true, null, 
9944        new File(this.gshCommand()).getParentFile(), null, true);
9945 
9946     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getErrorText())) {
9947       System.out.println("stderr: " + commandResult.getErrorText());
9948     }
9949     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getOutputText())) {
9950       System.out.println("stdout: " + commandResult.getOutputText());
9951     }
9952 
9953 
9954   }
9955 
9956   /**
9957    * 
9958    */
9959   private void runClientCommand() {
9960     System.out.println("##################################");
9961     System.out.println("Running client command:");
9962     System.out.println(this.untarredClientDir.getAbsolutePath() + "> " + GrouperInstallerUtils.javaCommand() 
9963         + " -jar grouperClient.jar --operation=getMembersWs --groupNames=etc:webServiceClientUsers");
9964     
9965     final List<String> command = new ArrayList<String>();
9966 
9967     command.add(GrouperInstallerUtils.javaCommand());
9968     command.add("-jar");
9969     command.addAll(GrouperInstallerUtils.splitTrimToList(
9970         "grouperClient.jar --operation=getMembersWs --groupNames=etc:webServiceClientUsers", " "));
9971             
9972     CommandResult commandResult = GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(GrouperInstallerUtils.toArray(command, String.class), 
9973         true, true, null, this.untarredClientDir, null, true);
9974 
9975     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getErrorText())) {
9976       System.out.println("stderr: " + commandResult.getErrorText());
9977     }
9978     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getOutputText())) {
9979       System.out.println("stdout: " + commandResult.getOutputText());
9980     }
9981     System.out.println("Success running client command:");
9982     System.out.println("##################################");
9983 
9984   }
9985 
9986   /**
9987    * edit a property in a property file
9988    * @param file
9989    * @param valueRegex 
9990    * @param lineMustHaveRegexes 
9991    * @param lineCantHaveRegexes 
9992    * @param newValue 
9993    * @param description of change for sys out print
9994    * @return true if edited file, or false if not but didnt need to, null if not found
9995    */
9996   public static Boolean editFile(File file, String valueRegex, String[] lineMustHaveRegexes, 
9997       String[] lineCantHaveRegexes, String newValue, String description) {
9998     return editFile(file, valueRegex, lineMustHaveRegexes, lineCantHaveRegexes, newValue, description, false, null);
9999   }
10000 
10001   /**
10002    * edit a property in a property file
10003    * @param file
10004    * @param valueRegex 
10005    * @param lineMustHaveRegexes 
10006    * @param lineCantHaveRegexes 
10007    * @param newValue 
10008    * @param description of change for sys out print
10009    * @param addAttributeIfNotExists if attribute isnt there, then if true, then add the attribute
10010    * @param newAttributeName if adding new attribute, this is the name
10011    * @return true if edited file, or false if not but didnt need to, null if not found
10012    */
10013   public static Boolean editFile(File file, String valueRegex, String[] lineMustHaveRegexes, 
10014       String[] lineCantHaveRegexes, String newValue, String description, boolean addAttributeIfNotExists, String newAttributeName) {
10015     
10016     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(newAttributeName) != addAttributeIfNotExists) {
10017       throw new RuntimeException("newAttributeName cant be null if addAttributeIfNotExists, and must be null if not addAttributeIfNotExists");
10018     }
10019     
10020     if (!file.exists() || file.length() == 0) {
10021       throw new RuntimeException("Why does " + file.getName() + " not exist and have contents? " 
10022           + file.getAbsolutePath());
10023     }
10024     
10025     String fileContents = GrouperInstallerUtils.readFileIntoString(file);
10026     
10027     String newline = GrouperInstallerUtils.newlineFromFile(fileContents);
10028     
10029     String[] lines = GrouperInstallerUtils.splitLines(fileContents);
10030     
10031     Pattern pattern = Pattern.compile(valueRegex);
10032     
10033     Pattern[] lineMustHavePatterns = new Pattern[GrouperInstallerUtils.length(lineMustHaveRegexes)];
10034     
10035     {
10036       int index = 0;
10037       for (String lineMustHaveRegex : GrouperInstallerUtils.nonNull(lineMustHaveRegexes, String.class)) {
10038         Pattern lineMustHavePattern = Pattern.compile(lineMustHaveRegex);
10039         lineMustHavePatterns[index] = lineMustHavePattern;
10040         
10041         index++;
10042       }
10043     }    
10044   
10045     Pattern[] lineCantHavePatterns = new Pattern[GrouperInstallerUtils.length(lineCantHaveRegexes)];
10046     
10047     {
10048       int index = 0;
10049       for (String lineCantHaveRegex : GrouperInstallerUtils.nonNull(lineCantHaveRegexes, String.class)) {
10050         Pattern lineCantHavePattern = Pattern.compile(lineCantHaveRegex);
10051         lineCantHavePatterns[index] = lineCantHavePattern;
10052         
10053         index++;
10054       }
10055     }    
10056   
10057     StringBuilder newfile = new StringBuilder();
10058     
10059     boolean madeChange = false;
10060     boolean noChangeNeeded = false;
10061     
10062     OUTER: for (String line : lines) {
10063       line = GrouperInstallerUtils.defaultString(line);
10064       
10065       //lets see if it satisfies all
10066       for (Pattern lineMustHavePattern : lineMustHavePatterns) {
10067         if (!lineMustHavePattern.matcher(line).find()) {
10068           newfile.append(line).append(newline);
10069           continue OUTER;
10070         }
10071       }
10072       
10073       //lets see if it doesnt have these
10074       for (Pattern lineCantHavePattern : lineCantHavePatterns) {
10075         if (lineCantHavePattern.matcher(line).find()) {
10076           newfile.append(line).append(newline);
10077           continue OUTER;
10078         }
10079       }
10080       
10081       //see if satisfies current
10082       Matcher matcher = pattern.matcher(line);
10083       if (!matcher.find()) {
10084         
10085         if (addAttributeIfNotExists) {
10086           
10087           System.out.println(" - adding " + description + " with value: '" + newValue + "'");
10088           
10089           line = GrouperInstallerUtils.trimEnd(line);
10090           
10091           boolean endsWithCloseTag = false;
10092           boolean endElement = false;
10093           
10094           if (line.endsWith("/>")) {
10095             line = line.substring(0, line.length()-2);
10096             line = GrouperInstallerUtils.trimEnd(line);
10097             endsWithCloseTag = true;
10098           } else if (line.endsWith(">")) {
10099             line = line.substring(0, line.length()-1);
10100             line = GrouperInstallerUtils.trimEnd(line);
10101             endElement = true;
10102           }
10103           
10104           newfile.append(line).append(" ").append(newAttributeName).append("=\"").append(newValue).append("\"");
10105           
10106           if (endsWithCloseTag) {
10107             newfile.append(" />");
10108           } else if (endElement) {
10109             newfile.append(" >");
10110           }
10111           
10112           newfile.append(newline);
10113           madeChange = true;
10114           
10115         } else {
10116         
10117           newfile.append(line).append(newline);
10118         }
10119         continue;
10120       }
10121       
10122       String oldValue = matcher.group(1);
10123       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(newValue, oldValue)) {
10124         System.out.println(" - old " + description + " value is same as new value: " + newValue);
10125         noChangeNeeded = true;
10126         newfile.append(line).append(newline);
10127         continue;
10128       }
10129       
10130       //we need to change the value
10131       System.out.println(" - changing " + description + " from: '" + oldValue + "' to: '" + newValue + "'");
10132       newfile.append(line.substring(0, matcher.start(1)));
10133       newfile.append(newValue);
10134       newfile.append(line.substring(matcher.end(1), line.length()));
10135       newfile.append(newline);
10136       madeChange = true;
10137       continue;
10138     }
10139     
10140     if (!madeChange) {
10141       //true if edited file, or false if not but didnt need to, null if not found
10142       if (noChangeNeeded) {
10143         return false;
10144       }
10145       return null;
10146     }
10147     
10148     GrouperInstallerUtils.writeStringToFile(file, newfile.toString());
10149     
10150     return true;
10151   }
10152 
10153   /**
10154    * add a line to a file.  will replace \n with whatever newline is
10155    * @param file
10156    * @param line (not ending in newline)
10157    * @param lineNumber 1 indexed.  If not exist, add to end of file
10158    * @param description is a description of what was just changed
10159    */
10160   public static void addToFile(File file, String line, int lineNumber, String description) {
10161     if (!file.exists() || file.length() == 0) {
10162       throw new RuntimeException("Why does " + file.getName() + " not exist and have contents? " 
10163           + file.getAbsolutePath());
10164     }
10165     
10166     String fileContents = GrouperInstallerUtils.readFileIntoString(file);
10167     
10168     String newline = GrouperInstallerUtils.newlineFromFile(fileContents);
10169     
10170     String[] lines = GrouperInstallerUtils.splitLines(fileContents);
10171 
10172     line = GrouperInstallerUtils.replace(line, "\n", newline);
10173     
10174     line += newline;
10175     
10176     StringBuilder newfile = new StringBuilder();
10177     
10178     boolean madeChange = false;
10179     
10180     int index = 0;
10181     
10182     for (String fileLine : lines) {
10183       fileLine = GrouperInstallerUtils.defaultString(fileLine);
10184       newfile.append(fileLine).append(newline);
10185       index++;
10186       
10187       if (index >= lineNumber  && !madeChange) {
10188 
10189         System.out.println("Adding " + description + " to file at line number: " + lineNumber);        
10190         
10191         newfile.append(line);
10192         madeChange = true;
10193       }
10194     }
10195     
10196     if (!madeChange) {
10197       System.out.println("Appending " + description + " to end of file");        
10198       newfile.append(line);
10199     }
10200     
10201     GrouperInstallerUtils.writeStringToFile(file, newfile.toString());
10202     
10203   }
10204 
10205   /** tomcat ui path */
10206   private String tomcatUiPath = null;
10207 
10208   /** tomcat ws path */
10209   private String tomcatWsPath = null;
10210 
10211   /** untarred dir, this does NOT end in file.separator */
10212   private File untarredClientDir;
10213   
10214   /**
10215    * 
10216    */
10217   private static void validJavaVersion() {
10218     CommandResult commandResult = GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(
10219         GrouperInstallerUtils.javaCommand(), 
10220         new String[]{"-version"}, true);
10221     String javaResult = commandResult.getOutputText();
10222     if (GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(javaResult)) {
10223       javaResult = commandResult.getErrorText();
10224     }
10225     if (!validJava(javaResult)) {
10226       throw new RuntimeException("Expecting Java 6+, but received: " + javaResult + ", run the installer jar with a jdk v6");
10227     }
10228     
10229     //try javac
10230     try {
10231       commandResult = GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(
10232           GrouperInstallerUtils.javaCommand() + "c", 
10233           new String[]{"-version"}, true);
10234       javaResult = commandResult.getOutputText();
10235       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(javaResult)) {
10236         javaResult = commandResult.getErrorText();
10237       }
10238       if (!validJava(javaResult)) {
10239         throw new RuntimeException("Expecting Java 6+, but received: " + javaResult + ", run the installer jar with a jdk v6");
10240       }
10241     } catch (Exception e) {
10242       throw new RuntimeException("This needs to be run from a jdk, but it is detected to be running from a JRE...  run the installed from a JDK!");
10243     }
10244   }
10245 
10246   /**
10247    * see if install, upgrade, patch, etc
10248    * @return true if install, or false if upgrade
10249    */
10250   private GrouperInstallerMainFunction grouperInstallerMainFunction() {
10251 
10252 //    if (GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValueBoolean("grouperInstaller.checkJavaVersion", true, false)) {
10253 //      String javaVersion = System.getProperty("java.version");
10254 //      if (javaVersion != null && !javaVersion.startsWith("1.6") && !javaVersion.startsWith("1.7")) {
10255 //        System.out.println("Error: Java should be version 6 or 7 (1.6 or 1.7), but is detected as: " + javaVersion);        
10256 //        System.out.println("Press <enter> to continue...");
10257 //        readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.wrongJavaContinue");
10258 //      }
10259 //    }
10260 
10261     String input = null;
10262     String defaultAction = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("grouperInstaller.default.installOrUpgrade", false);
10263     defaultAction = GrouperInstallerUtils.defaultIfBlank(defaultAction, "install");
10264     for (int i=0;i<10;i++) {
10265       System.out.print("Do you want to 'install' a new installation of grouper, 'upgrade' an existing installation,\n"
10266           + "  'patch' an existing installation, 'admin' utilities, or 'createPatch' for Grouper developers\n" 
10267           + "  (enter: 'install', 'upgrade', 'patch', 'admin', 'createPatch' or blank for the default) ["
10268           + defaultAction + "]: ");
10269       input = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.actionEgInstallUpgradePatch");
10270       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(input)) {
10271         input = defaultAction;
10272       }
10273       GrouperInstallerMainFunction theGrouperInstallerMainFunction = GrouperInstallerMainFunction.valueOfIgnoreCase(input, false);
10274       if (theGrouperInstallerMainFunction != null) {
10275         return theGrouperInstallerMainFunction;
10276       }
10277       System.out.println("Please enter 'install', 'upgrade', 'patch', 'admin', 'createPatch', or blank for default (which is " + defaultAction + ")");
10278     }
10279     throw new RuntimeException("Expecting 'install', 'upgrade', 'patch', 'admin', or 'createPatch' but was: '" + input + "'");
10280   }
10281 
10282 
10283   
10284   /**
10285    * 
10286    * @return install directory
10287    */
10288   private static String grouperInstallDirectory() {
10289     String grouperInstallDirectoryString;
10290     {
10291       File grouperInstallDirectoryFile = new File("");
10292       String defaultDirectory = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("grouperInstaller.default.installDirectory", false);
10293       System.out.print("Enter in the Grouper install directory (note: better if no spaces or special chars) [" 
10294           + (GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(defaultDirectory) ? grouperInstallDirectoryFile.getAbsolutePath() : defaultDirectory) + "]: ");
10295       String input = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.installDirectory");
10296       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(input)) {
10297         grouperInstallDirectoryFile = new File(input);
10298         if (!grouperInstallDirectoryFile.exists() || !grouperInstallDirectoryFile.isDirectory()) {
10299           System.out.println("Error: cant find directory: '" + input + "'");
10300           System.exit(1);
10301         }
10302       } else {
10303         if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(defaultDirectory)) {
10304           grouperInstallDirectoryFile = new File(defaultDirectory);
10305           if (!grouperInstallDirectoryFile.exists() || !grouperInstallDirectoryFile.isDirectory()) {
10306             System.out.println("Error: cant find directory: '" + input + "'");
10307             System.exit(1);
10308           }
10309         }
10310       }
10311       grouperInstallDirectoryString = grouperInstallDirectoryFile.getAbsolutePath();
10312       if (!grouperInstallDirectoryString.endsWith(File.separator)) {
10313         grouperInstallDirectoryString += File.separator;
10314       }
10315     }
10316     return grouperInstallDirectoryString;
10317   }
10318 
10319   /**
10320    * 
10321    * @return upgrade directory
10322    */
10323   private String grouperUpgradeTempDirectory() {
10324     String localGrouperInstallDirectoryString = null;
10325     {
10326       File grouperInstallDirectoryFile = new File(new File("").getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "tarballs");
10327       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(this.grouperInstallDirectoryString)) {
10328         grouperInstallDirectoryFile = new File(this.grouperInstallDirectoryString + "tarballs");
10329       }
10330       String defaultDirectory = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("grouperInstaller.default.tarballDirectory", false);
10331       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(defaultDirectory)) {
10332         defaultDirectory = grouperInstallDirectoryFile.getAbsolutePath();
10333       }
10334       System.out.print("Enter in a Grouper temp directory to download tarballs (note: better if no spaces or special chars) [" 
10335           + defaultDirectory + "]: ");
10336       localGrouperInstallDirectoryString = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.tarballDirectory");
10337       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(localGrouperInstallDirectoryString)) {
10338         grouperInstallDirectoryFile = new File(localGrouperInstallDirectoryString);
10339         if (!grouperInstallDirectoryFile.exists() || !grouperInstallDirectoryFile.isDirectory()) {
10340           System.out.println("Error: cant find directory: '" + grouperInstallDirectoryFile.getAbsolutePath() + "'");
10341           System.exit(1);
10342         }
10343       } else {
10344         localGrouperInstallDirectoryString = defaultDirectory;
10345       }
10346       if (!localGrouperInstallDirectoryString.endsWith(File.separator)) {
10347         localGrouperInstallDirectoryString += File.separator;
10348       }
10349     }
10350     return localGrouperInstallDirectoryString;
10351   }
10352 
10353   /**
10354    * 
10355    * @return see if operating on a source directory or deployed directory
10356    */
10357   @SuppressWarnings("unused")
10358   private GrouperInstallType sourceOrDeployed() {
10359 
10360     if (this.grouperDirectories.getGrouperInstallType() == null) {
10361              
10362     }
10363     
10364     return this.grouperDirectories.getGrouperInstallType();
10365   }
