10368   
10369   /**
10370    * 
10371    * @return directory where existing installation exists
10372    */
10373   private String upgradeExistingDirectory() {
10374 
10375     //get the directory where the existing installation is
10376     String tempUpgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString = this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString;
10377 
10378     String errorMessage = "Cant find Grouper " + this.appToUpgrade.name() + " properties files or libs, looked in the directory, "
10379         + "/classes/ , /conf/ , /WEB-INF/classes/ , /lib/ , /WEB-INF/lib/ , /lib/grouper/ , /dist/lib/ ";
10380 
10381     try {
10382       String upgradeExistingDirectoryString = null;
10383       for (int i=0;i<10;i++) {
10384         File grouperInstallDirectoryFile = new File("");
10385         String defaultDirectory = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("grouperInstaller.default.existingInstalledDirectory", false);
10386         System.out.print("Where is the grouper " + this.appToUpgrade.name() + " installed? " +
10387           (GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(defaultDirectory) ? "" : ("[" + defaultDirectory + "]: ")));
10388         upgradeExistingDirectoryString = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.grouperWhereInstalled");
10389         if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(upgradeExistingDirectoryString)) {
10390           grouperInstallDirectoryFile = new File(upgradeExistingDirectoryString);
10391           if (!grouperInstallDirectoryFile.exists() || !grouperInstallDirectoryFile.isDirectory()) {
10392             System.out.println("Error: cant find directory: '" + grouperInstallDirectoryFile.getAbsolutePath() + "'");
10393             continue;
10394           }
10395         } else {
10396           upgradeExistingDirectoryString = defaultDirectory;
10397         }
10398         upgradeExistingDirectoryString = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileAddLastSlashIfNotExists(upgradeExistingDirectoryString);
10399 
10400         this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString = upgradeExistingDirectoryString;
10401 
10402         //make sure directory is where the app is
10403         if (!this.appToUpgrade.validateExistingDirectory(this)) {
10404           System.out.println(errorMessage);
10405           continue;
10406         }
10407         //find the resources dir
10408         {
10409           File resourcesDirFile = new File(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString + "classes" + File.separator);
10410           if (resourcesDirFile.exists()) {
10411             this.upgradeExistingClassesDirectoryString = resourcesDirFile.getAbsolutePath();
10412           } else {
10413             resourcesDirFile = new File(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString + "conf" + File.separator);
10414             if (resourcesDirFile.exists()) {
10415               this.upgradeExistingClassesDirectoryString = resourcesDirFile.getAbsolutePath();
10416             } else {
10417               resourcesDirFile = new File(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString + "WEB-INF" + File.separator + "classes" + File.separator);
10418               if (resourcesDirFile.exists()) {
10419                 this.upgradeExistingClassesDirectoryString = resourcesDirFile.getAbsolutePath();
10420               } else {
10421                 this.upgradeExistingClassesDirectoryString = this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString;
10422               }            
10423             }
10424           }
10425           this.upgradeExistingClassesDirectoryString = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileAddLastSlashIfNotExists(this.upgradeExistingClassesDirectoryString);
10426         }
10427         
10428         //find the lib dir
10429         {
10430           File libDirFile = new File(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString + "lib" + File.separator + "grouper" + File.separator);
10431           if (libDirFile.exists()) {
10432             this.upgradeExistingLibDirectoryString = libDirFile.getAbsolutePath();
10433           } else {
10434             libDirFile = new File(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString + "WEB-INF" + File.separator + "lib" + File.separator);
10435             if (libDirFile.exists()) {
10436               this.upgradeExistingLibDirectoryString = libDirFile.getAbsolutePath();
10437             } else {
10438               libDirFile = new File(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString + "lib" + File.separator);
10439               if (libDirFile.exists()) {
10440                 this.upgradeExistingLibDirectoryString = libDirFile.getAbsolutePath();
10441               } else {
10442                 this.upgradeExistingLibDirectoryString = this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString;
10443               }            
10444             }
10445           }
10446           this.upgradeExistingLibDirectoryString = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileAddLastSlashIfNotExists(this.upgradeExistingLibDirectoryString);
10447         }        
10448                 
10449         return upgradeExistingDirectoryString;
10450       }
10451       
10452       throw new RuntimeException(errorMessage);
10453       
10454     } finally {
10455       //set this back
10456       this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString = tempUpgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString;
10457     }
10458   }
10459 
10460   /**
10461    * where classes are in the upgrade directory, ends in file separator
10462    */
10463   private String upgradeExistingClassesDirectoryString;
10464   
10465   /**
10466    * where jars are in the upgrade directory, ends in file separator
10467    */
10468   private String upgradeExistingLibDirectoryString;
10469   
10470   /**
10471    * 
10472    * @param action upgrade or patch
10473    * @return what we are upgrading
10474    */
10475   private AppToUpgrade grouperAppToUpgradeOrPatch(String action) {
10476 
10477     String appToUpgradeString = null;
10478     String defaultAppToUpgrade = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("grouperInstaller.default.appToUpgrade", false);
10479     defaultAppToUpgrade = GrouperInstallerUtils.defaultIfBlank(defaultAppToUpgrade, AppToUpgrade.API.name().toLowerCase());
10480     
10481     for (int i=0;i<10;i++) {
10482       System.out.print("What do you want to " + action + "?  api, ui, ws, pspng, or psp? [" + defaultAppToUpgrade + "]: ");
10483       appToUpgradeString = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.appToUpgrade");
10484       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(appToUpgradeString)) {
10485         appToUpgradeString = defaultAppToUpgrade;
10486       }
10487       try {
10488         return AppToUpgrade.valueOfIgnoreCase(appToUpgradeString, true);
10489       } catch (Exception e) {
10490         System.out.print("Error: please enter: 'api', 'ui', 'ws', 'pspng', 'psp', or blank for default [" + defaultAppToUpgrade + "]");
10491       }
10492     }
10493     throw new RuntimeException("Expecting api, ui, ws, pspng, or psp but was: '" + appToUpgradeString + "'");
10494   }
10495 
10496   /**
10497    * 
10498    * @param javaResult
10499    * @return if valid
10500    */
10501   private static boolean validJava(String javaResult) {
10502     //C:\mchyzer\grouper\trunk\grouper\bin>java -version
10503     //java version "1.6.0_21"
10504     //Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment (build 1.6.0_21-b07)
10505     //Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (build 17.0-b17, mixed mode, sharing)
10506     Pattern pattern = Pattern.compile("(\\d+)\\.(\\d+)\\.\\d+_?\\d*");
10507     Matcher matcher = pattern.matcher(javaResult);
10508     if (matcher.find()) {
10509       int majorVersion = GrouperInstallerUtils.intValue(matcher.group(1));
10510       int minorVersion = GrouperInstallerUtils.intValue(matcher.group(2));
10511       if (majorVersion == 1 && minorVersion >= 6) {
10512         return true;
10513       }
10514       return majorVersion >= 6;
10515     }
10516     return false;
10517   }
10518   
10519   /**
10520    * add something to an xml file
10521    * @param file
10522    * @param addAfterThisRegex 
10523    * @param mustPassTheseRegexes 
10524    * @param newValue 
10525    * @param description of change for sys out print
10526    */
10527   public static void addToXmlFile(File file, String addAfterThisRegex, String[] mustPassTheseRegexes, String newValue, String description) {
10528     if (!file.exists() || file.length() == 0) {
10529       throw new RuntimeException("Why does " + file.getName() + " not exist and have contents? " 
10530           + file.getAbsolutePath());
10531     }
10532     
10533     String fileContents = GrouperInstallerUtils.readFileIntoString(file);
10534     
10535     String newline = GrouperInstallerUtils.newlineFromFile(fileContents);
10536     
10537     Pattern pattern = Pattern.compile(addAfterThisRegex);
10538 
10539     String[] lines = GrouperInstallerUtils.splitLines(fileContents);
10540     
10541     Pattern[] lineMustPassThesePatterns = new Pattern[GrouperInstallerUtils.length(mustPassTheseRegexes)];
10542     
10543     boolean[] hasPassedTheseRegexes = new boolean[lineMustPassThesePatterns.length];
10544     
10545     for (int i=0;i<hasPassedTheseRegexes.length;i++) {
10546       hasPassedTheseRegexes[i] = false;
10547     }
10548     
10549     {
10550       int index = 0;
10551       for (String lineMustHaveRegex : GrouperInstallerUtils.nonNull(mustPassTheseRegexes, String.class)) {
10552         Pattern lineMustHavePattern = Pattern.compile(lineMustHaveRegex);
10553         lineMustPassThesePatterns[index] = lineMustHavePattern;
10554         
10555         index++;
10556       }
10557     }    
10558 
10559     StringBuilder newfile = new StringBuilder();
10560 
10561     boolean madeChange = false;
10562 
10563     OUTER: for (String line : lines) {
10564       line = GrouperInstallerUtils.defaultString(line);
10565       
10566       //lets see if it satisfies all
10567       for (int i=0;i<lineMustPassThesePatterns.length;i++) {
10568         Pattern lineMustHavePattern = lineMustPassThesePatterns[i];
10569         if (lineMustHavePattern.matcher(line).find()) {
10570           hasPassedTheseRegexes[i] = true;
10571         }
10572       }
10573       
10574       //see if we have passed all the prefixes
10575       for (int i=0;i<hasPassedTheseRegexes.length;i++) {
10576         if (!hasPassedTheseRegexes[i]) {
10577           newfile.append(line).append(newline);
10578           continue OUTER;
10579         }
10580       }
10581       
10582       //see if satisfies current, and only add once
10583       Matcher matcher = pattern.matcher(line);
10584       if (!matcher.find() || madeChange) {
10585         newfile.append(line).append(newline);
10586         continue;
10587       }
10588 
10589       //we need to change the value
10590       System.out.println(" - adding " + description + " line: '" + newValue + "'");
10591       newfile.append(line);
10592       newfile.append(newline);
10593       newfile.append(newValue);
10594       newfile.append(newline);
10595       madeChange = true;
10596     }
10597     if (!madeChange) {
10598       throw new RuntimeException("Couldnt find place to add to server.xml!  Are there newlines that werent there before or something?");
10599     }
10600     
10601     GrouperInstallerUtils.writeStringToFile(file, newfile.toString());
10602     
10603   }
10604 
10605   
10606   /**
10607    * edit a property in a property file
10608    * @param file
10609    * @param propertyName
10610    * @param propertyValue
10611    * @param createFileIfNotExist 
10612    */
10613   public static void editPropertiesFile(File file, String propertyName, String propertyValue, boolean createFileIfNotExist) {
10614     if (!file.exists()) {
10615       if (createFileIfNotExist) {
10616         System.out.println("Creating file: " + (file == null ? null : file.getAbsolutePath()));
10617         GrouperInstallerUtils.fileCreate(file);
10618       } else {
10619         throw new RuntimeException("Why does " + file.getName() + " not exist and have contents? " 
10620             + file.getAbsolutePath());
10621       }
10622     }
10623     
10624     propertyValue = GrouperInstallerUtils.defaultString(propertyValue);
10625     
10626     String fileContents = GrouperInstallerUtils.readFileIntoString(file);
10627     
10628     String newline = GrouperInstallerUtils.newlineFromFile(fileContents);
10629     
10630     //if it starts with it, add a newline to start so the regexes work
10631     if (!fileContents.startsWith(newline)) {
10632       fileContents = newline + fileContents;
10633     }
10634     
10635     //lets look for property in file
10636     //this is a newline or form feed then some optional whitespace, and the property name
10637     //then some optional whitespace then an equals, then optional whitespace, then some text
10638     String propertyNameRegex = GrouperInstallerUtils.replace(propertyName, ".", "\\.");
10639     String regex = "[\\n\\r][ \\t]*" + propertyNameRegex + "[ \\t]*=[ \\t]*([^\\n\\r]*)";
10640     Pattern pattern = Pattern.compile(regex, Pattern.DOTALL);
10641     Matcher matcher = pattern.matcher(fileContents);
10642 
10643     if (matcher.find()) {
10644       String previousValue = matcher.group(1);
10645       
10646       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.trimToEmpty(previousValue).equals(GrouperInstallerUtils.trim(propertyValue))) {
10647         System.out.println(" - property " + propertyName + " already was set to: " + propertyValue + ", not changing file");
10648         return;
10649       }
10650       
10651       int startIndex = matcher.start(1);
10652       
10653       int endIndex = matcher.end(1);
10654       
10655       String newContents = fileContents.substring(0, startIndex) + propertyValue;
10656       
10657       //if not the last char
10658       if (endIndex < fileContents.length()-1) {
10659         newContents += fileContents.substring(endIndex, fileContents.length());
10660       }
10661 
10662       //if there is another match, there is a problem
10663       if (matcher.find()) {
10664         throw new RuntimeException("Why are there multiple matches for " + propertyName + " in propertyFile: " + file.getAbsolutePath() + "??????");
10665       }
10666 
10667       System.out.println(" - set property: " 
10668           + propertyName + " from: " + previousValue + " to: " + propertyValue);
10669       GrouperInstallerUtils.writeStringToFile(file, newContents);
10670       return;
10671     }
10672     
10673     //lets see if it is in a comment
10674     //this is a newline or form feed then some optional whitespace, hash, optional whitespace, and the property name
10675     //then some optional whitespace then an equals, then optional whitespace, then some text
10676     regex = ".*[\\n\\r]([ \\t]*#[ \\t]*)" + propertyNameRegex + "[ \\t]*=[ \\t]*([^\\n\\r]*).*";
10677     pattern = Pattern.compile(regex, Pattern.DOTALL);
10678     matcher = pattern.matcher(fileContents);
10679 
10680     if (matcher.matches()) {
10681       String previousValue = matcher.group(2);
10682       
10683       int startIndexHash = matcher.start(1);
10684       
10685       int endIndexHash = matcher.end(1);
10686 
10687       int startIndex = matcher.start(2);
10688       
10689       int endIndex = matcher.end(2);
10690       
10691       String newContents = fileContents.substring(0, startIndexHash) + fileContents.substring(endIndexHash, startIndex)
10692         + propertyValue;
10693       
10694       //if not the last char
10695       if (endIndex < fileContents.length()-1) {
10696         newContents += fileContents.substring(endIndex, fileContents.length());
10697       }
10698       System.out.println(" - uncommented property: " 
10699           + propertyName + " from: " + previousValue + " to: " + propertyValue);
10700       GrouperInstallerUtils.writeStringToFile(file, newContents);
10701       
10702       return;
10703     }
10704     
10705     //it must have not existed
10706     //add a newline..
10707     //add to end in case it was already there, now it will be overwritten
10708     String newContents = fileContents + newline + "# added by grouper-installer" + newline + propertyName + " = " + propertyValue + newline;
10709     GrouperInstallerUtils.writeStringToFile(file, newContents);
10710 
10711     System.out.println(" - added to end of property file: " + propertyName + " = " + propertyValue);
10712     
10713   }
10714 
10715   /**
10716    * untar a file to a dir
10717    * @param fileName
10718    * @param autorunPropertiesKeyIfFileExistsUseLocal key in properties file to automatically fill in a value
10719    * @param dirToUntarTo or null to keep in same dir as tarfile
10720    * @return the directory where the files are (assuming has a single dir the same name as the archive)
10721    */
10722   private static File untar(final String fileName, final String autorunPropertiesKeyIfFileExistsUseLocal,
10723       File dirToUntarTo) {
10724 
10725     if (!fileName.endsWith(".tar")) {
10726       throw new RuntimeException("File doesnt end in .tar: " + fileName);
10727     }
10728     String untarredFileName = fileName.substring(0, fileName.length() - ".tar".length());
10729     
10730     //ant has -bin which is annoying
10731     if (untarredFileName.endsWith("-bin")) {
10732       untarredFileName = untarredFileName.substring(0, untarredFileName.length() - "-bin".length());
10733     }
10734 
10735     if (dirToUntarTo == null) {
10736       dirToUntarTo = new File(untarredFileName).getParentFile();
10737     }
10738     
10739     File untarredFile = new File(dirToUntarTo.getAbsoluteFile() + File.separator + new File(untarredFileName).getName());
10740     untarredFileName = untarredFile.getAbsolutePath();
10741     
10742     if (untarredFile.exists()) {
10743       
10744       System.out.print("Untarred dir exists: " + untarredFileName + ", use untarred dir (t|f)? [t]: ");
10745       boolean useUnzippedFile = readFromStdInBoolean(true, autorunPropertiesKeyIfFileExistsUseLocal);
10746       if (useUnzippedFile) {
10747         return untarredFile;
10748       }
10749       
10750       System.out.println("Deleting: " + untarredFileName);
10751       GrouperInstallerUtils.deleteRecursiveDirectory(untarredFileName);
10752     }
10753     
10754     System.out.println("Expanding: " + fileName + " to " + untarredFile.getAbsolutePath());
10755     
10756     final File[] result = new File[1];
10757     
10758     final File DIR_TO_UNTAR_TO = dirToUntarTo;
10759     
10760     Runnable runnable = new Runnable() {
10761 
10762       public void run() {
10763         result[0] = untarHelper(fileName, autorunPropertiesKeyIfFileExistsUseLocal, DIR_TO_UNTAR_TO);
10764       }
10765     };
10766 
10767     GrouperInstallerUtils.threadRunWithStatusDots(runnable, true);
10768 
10769     return result[0];
10770 
10771   }
10772 
10773   /**
10774    * untar a file to a dir
10775    * @param fileName
10776    * @param autorunPropertiesKeyIfFileExistsUseLocal key in properties file to automatically fill in a value
10777    * @param dirToUntarTo or null to keep in same dir as tarfile
10778    * @return the directory where the files are (assuming has a single dir the same name as the archive)
10779    */
10780   @SuppressWarnings("resource")
10781   private static File untarHelper(String fileName, String autorunPropertiesKeyIfFileExistsUseLocal, File dirToUntarTo) {
10782     TarArchiveInputStream tarArchiveInputStream = null;
10783     
10784     String untarredFileName = fileName.substring(0, fileName.length() - ".tar".length());
10785     
10786     //ant has -bin which is annoying
10787     if (untarredFileName.endsWith("-bin")) {
10788       untarredFileName = untarredFileName.substring(0, untarredFileName.length() - "-bin".length());
10789     }
10790     
10791     if (dirToUntarTo == null) {
10792       dirToUntarTo = new File(untarredFileName).getParentFile();
10793     }
10794 
10795     File untarredFile = new File(dirToUntarTo.getAbsoluteFile() + File.separator + new File(untarredFileName).getName());
10796 
10797     try {
10798 
10799       tarArchiveInputStream = new TarArchiveInputStream(new FileInputStream(fileName));
10800       
10801       while (true) {
10802   
10803         TarArchiveEntry tarArchiveEntry = tarArchiveInputStream.getNextTarEntry();
10804         if (tarArchiveEntry == null) {
10805           break;
10806         }
10807         
10808         //System.out.println("Entry: " + tarArchiveEntry.getName()
10809         //    + ", isDirectory: " + tarArchiveEntry.isDirectory()
10810         //    + ", isFile: " + tarArchiveEntry.isFile());
10811         String fileEntryName = dirToUntarTo.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + tarArchiveEntry.getName();
10812         File tarEntryFile = new File(fileEntryName);
10813         
10814         if (tarArchiveEntry.isDirectory()) {
10815           if (!tarEntryFile.exists() && !tarEntryFile.mkdirs()) {
10816             throw new RuntimeException("Cant create dirs: " + tarEntryFile.getAbsolutePath());
10817           }
10818           continue;
10819         }
10820         
10821         byte[] content = new byte[(int)tarArchiveEntry.getSize()];
10822 
10823         int size = tarArchiveInputStream.read(content, 0, content.length);
10824         
10825         //for some reason we get an error when 0 bytes...
10826         if (size != content.length && (!(size == -1 && content.length == 0))) {
10827           throw new RuntimeException("Didnt read the right amount of bytes: " + size 
10828               + ", should have been: " + content.length + " on entry: " + tarArchiveEntry.getName());
10829         }
10830         
10831         ByteArrayInputStream byteArrayInputStream = null;
10832         FileOutputStream fileOutputStream = null;
10833         
10834         try {
10835           
10836           //create parent directories
10837           if (!tarEntryFile.getParentFile().exists() && !tarEntryFile.getParentFile().mkdirs()) {
10838             throw new RuntimeException("Cant create dirs: " + tarEntryFile.getParentFile().getAbsolutePath());
10839           }
10840 
10841           fileOutputStream = new FileOutputStream(tarEntryFile);
10842           byteArrayInputStream = new ByteArrayInputStream(content);
10843           GrouperInstallerUtils.copy(byteArrayInputStream, fileOutputStream);
10844           
10845         } catch (Exception e) {
10846           throw new RuntimeException("Problem with entry: " + tarArchiveEntry.getName(), e);
10847         } finally {
10848           GrouperInstallerUtils.closeQuietly(byteArrayInputStream);
10849           GrouperInstallerUtils.closeQuietly(fileOutputStream);
10850         }
10851         
10852       }
10853     } catch (Exception e) {
10854       throw new RuntimeException("Error untarring: " + fileName, e);
10855     } finally {
10856       GrouperInstallerUtils.closeQuietly(tarArchiveInputStream);
10857     }
10858     return untarredFile;
10859   }
10860 
10861   /**
10862    * unzip a file, this is for .zip files
10863    * @param fileName
10864    * @param autorunPropertiesKeyIfFileExistsUseLocal key in properties file to automatically fill in a value
10865    * @return the unzipped file
10866    */
10867   private static File unzipFromZip(final String fileName, final String autorunPropertiesKeyIfFileExistsUseLocal) {
10868 
10869     if (!fileName.endsWith(".zip")) {
10870       throw new RuntimeException("File doesnt end in .zip: " + fileName);
10871     }
10872     String unzippedFileName = fileName.substring(0, fileName.length() - ".zip".length());
10873 
10874     File unzippedDir = new File(unzippedFileName);
10875 
10876     if (unzippedDir.exists()) {
10877       
10878       System.out.print("Unzipped dir exists: " + unzippedFileName + ", use unzipped dir (t|f)? [t]: ");
10879       boolean useUnzippedFile = readFromStdInBoolean(true, autorunPropertiesKeyIfFileExistsUseLocal);
10880       if (useUnzippedFile) {
10881         return unzippedDir;
10882       }
10883       System.out.println("Deleting: " + unzippedFileName);
10884       GrouperInstallerUtils.deleteRecursiveDirectory(unzippedFileName);
10885     } else {
10886       if (!unzippedDir.mkdir()) {
10887         throw new RuntimeException("Cant make dir: " + unzippedDir.getAbsolutePath());
10888       }
10889     }
10890 
10891     System.out.println("Unzipping: " + fileName);
10892 
10893     final File[] result = new File[1];
10894     
10895     Runnable runnable = new Runnable() {
10896 
10897       public void run() {
10898         result[0] = unzipFromZipHelper(fileName, autorunPropertiesKeyIfFileExistsUseLocal);
10899       }
10900     };
10901 
10902     GrouperInstallerUtils.threadRunWithStatusDots(runnable, true);
10903 
10904     return result[0];
10905 
10906   }
10907 
10908   /**
10909    * unzip a file, this is for .zip files
10910    * @param fileName
10911    * @param autorunPropertiesKeyIfFileExistsUseLocal key in properties file to automatically fill in a value
10912    * @return the unzipped file
10913    */
10914   private static File unzipFromZipHelper(String fileName, String autorunPropertiesKeyIfFileExistsUseLocal) {
10915 
10916     String unzippedFileName = fileName.substring(0, fileName.length() - ".zip".length());
10917 
10918     File unzippedDir = new File(unzippedFileName);
10919 
10920     ZipFile zipFile = null;
10921     try {
10922       zipFile = new ZipFile(fileName);
10923       Enumeration<? extends ZipEntry> entries = zipFile.entries();
10924       while (entries.hasMoreElements()) {
10925         ZipEntry entry = entries.nextElement();
10926         File entryDestination = new File(unzippedDir, entry.getName());
10927         if (entry.isDirectory()) {
10928           entryDestination.mkdirs();
10929         } else {
10930           entryDestination.getParentFile().mkdirs();
10931           InputStream in = zipFile.getInputStream(entry);
10932           OutputStream out = new FileOutputStream(entryDestination);
10933           try {
10934             IOUtils.copy(in, out);
10935           } finally {
10936             GrouperInstallerUtils.closeQuietly(in);
10937             GrouperInstallerUtils.closeQuietly(out);
10938           }
10939         }
10940       }
10941     } catch (IOException ioe) {
10942       throw new RuntimeException(ioe);
10943     } finally {
10944       GrouperInstallerUtils.closeQuietly(zipFile);
10945     }
10946 
10947     return unzippedDir;
10948 
10949   }
10950 
10951   /**
10952    * unzip a file to another file, this is for .gz files
10953    * @param fileName
10954    * @param autorunPropertiesKeyIfFileExistsUseLocal key in properties file to automatically fill in a value
10955    * @return the unzipped file
10956    */
10957   private static File unzip(final String fileName, final String autorunPropertiesKeyIfFileExistsUseLocal) {
10958 
10959     if (!fileName.endsWith(".gz")) {
10960       throw new RuntimeException("File doesnt end in .gz: " + fileName);
10961     }
10962     String unzippedFileName = fileName.substring(0, fileName.length() - ".gz".length());
10963     
10964     File unzippedFile = new File(unzippedFileName);
10965     if (unzippedFile.exists()) {
10966       
10967       System.out.print("Unzipped file exists: " + unzippedFileName + ", use unzipped file (t|f)? [t]: ");
10968       boolean useUnzippedFile = readFromStdInBoolean(true, autorunPropertiesKeyIfFileExistsUseLocal);
10969       if (useUnzippedFile) {
10970         return unzippedFile;
10971       }
10972       System.out.println("Deleting: " + unzippedFileName);
10973       if (!unzippedFile.delete()) {
10974         throw new RuntimeException("Cant delete file: " + unzippedFileName);
10975       }
10976     }
10977 
10978     System.out.println("Unzipping: " + fileName);
10979     
10980     final File[] result = new File[1];
10981     
10982     Runnable runnable = new Runnable() {
10983 
10984       public void run() {
10985         result[0] = unzipHelper(fileName, autorunPropertiesKeyIfFileExistsUseLocal);
10986       }
10987     };
10988 
10989     GrouperInstallerUtils.threadRunWithStatusDots(runnable, true);
10990 
10991     return result[0];
10992 
10993   }
10994 
10995   /**
10996    * unzip a file to another file, this is for .gz files
10997    * @param fileName
10998    * @param autorunPropertiesKeyIfFileExistsUseLocal key in properties file to automatically fill in a value
10999    * @return the unzipped file
11000    */
11001   private static File unzipHelper(String fileName, String autorunPropertiesKeyIfFileExistsUseLocal) {
11002 
11003     String unzippedFileName = fileName.substring(0, fileName.length() - ".gz".length());
11004     File unzippedFile = new File(unzippedFileName);
11005 
11006     GzipCompressorInputStream gzipCompressorInputStream = null;
11007     FileOutputStream fileOutputStream = null;
11008     try {
11009       gzipCompressorInputStream = new GzipCompressorInputStream(new BufferedInputStream(new FileInputStream(new File(fileName))));
11010       fileOutputStream = new FileOutputStream(unzippedFile);
11011       GrouperInstallerUtils.copy(gzipCompressorInputStream, fileOutputStream);
11012     } catch (Exception e) {
11013       throw new RuntimeException("Cant unzip file: " + fileName, e);
11014     } finally {
11015       GrouperInstallerUtils.closeQuietly(gzipCompressorInputStream);
11016       GrouperInstallerUtils.closeQuietly(fileOutputStream);
11017     }
11018     return unzippedFile;
11019   }
11020 
11021   /**
11022    * 
11023    * @return the file of the directory of the psp
11024    */
11025   private File downloadPsp() {
11026     String urlToDownload = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("download.server.url", true);
11027     
11028     if (!urlToDownload.endsWith("/")) {
11029       urlToDownload += "/";
11030     }
11031     urlToDownload += "release/";
11032 
11033     String pspFileName = "grouper.psp-" + this.version + ".tar.gz";
11034     urlToDownload += this.version + "/" + pspFileName;
11035 
11036     File pspFile = new File(this.grouperTarballDirectoryString + pspFileName);
11037     
11038     downloadFile(urlToDownload, pspFile.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalPspDownloadTarEtc");
11039 
11040     return pspFile;
11041   }
11042   
11043   /**
11044    * 
11045    * @return the file of the directory of the psp
11046    */
11047   private File downloadPspng() {
11048     String urlToDownload = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("download.server.url", true);
11049     
11050     if (!urlToDownload.endsWith("/")) {
11051       urlToDownload += "/";
11052     }
11053     urlToDownload += "release/";
11054 
11055     String pspFileName = "grouper.pspng-" + this.version + ".tar.gz";
11056     urlToDownload += this.version + "/" + pspFileName;
11057 
11058     File pspFile = new File(this.grouperTarballDirectoryString + pspFileName);
11059     
11060     downloadFile(urlToDownload, pspFile.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalPspngDownloadTarEtc");
11061 
11062     return pspFile;
11063   }
11064   
11065   /**
11066    * upgrade the ws
11067    */
11068   private void upgradeWs() {
11069   
11070     this.upgradeApiPreRevertPatch();
11071 
11072     System.out.println("You need to revert all patches to upgrade");
11073     this.patchRevertWs();
11074     
11075     this.upgradeApiPostRevertPatch();
11076     
11077     System.out.println("\n##################################");
11078     System.out.println("Upgrading WS\n");
11079     
11080     //copy the jars there
11081     System.out.println("\n##################################");
11082     System.out.println("Upgrading WS jars\n");
11083   
11084     this.upgradeJars(new File(this.untarredWsDir + File.separator + 
11085         "grouper-ws" + File.separator + "build" + File.separator + "dist" + File.separator + "grouper-ws"
11086         + File.separator + "WEB-INF" + File.separator + "lib" + File.separator));
11087   
11088     System.out.println("\n##################################");
11089     System.out.println("Upgrading WS files\n");
11090   
11091     //copy files there
11092     this.copyFiles(this.untarredWsDir + File.separator + 
11093         "grouper-ws" + File.separator + "build" + File.separator + "dist" + File.separator + "grouper-ws"
11094         + File.separator,
11095         this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString,
11096         GrouperInstallerUtils.toSet("WEB-INF/lib", "WEB-INF/web.xml", "WEB-INF/classes",
11097             "WEB-INF/bin/gsh", "WEB-INF/bin/gsh.bat", "WEB-INF/bin/gsh.sh"));
11098 
11099     {
11100       boolean hadChange = false;
11101       for (String gshName : new String[]{"gsh", "gsh.bat", "gsh.sh"}) {
11102         File newGshFile = new File(this.untarredWsDir + File.separator + "grouper-ws" + File.separator 
11103             + "build" + File.separator + "dist" + File.separator + "grouper-ws"
11104             + File.separator + "WEB-INF" + File.separator + "bin" 
11105             + File.separator + gshName);
11106   
11107         File existingGshFile = new File(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString 
11108             + File.separator + "WEB-INF" + File.separator + "bin" + File.separator + gshName);
11109   
11110         if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.contentEquals(newGshFile, existingGshFile)) {
11111           this.backupAndCopyFile(newGshFile, existingGshFile, true);
11112           if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.equals("gsh.bat", gshName)) {
11113             hadChange = true;
11114           }
11115         }
11116         
11117       }
11118       if (hadChange) {
11119         //set executable and dos2unix
11120         gshExcutableAndDos2Unix(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString + "WEB-INF" 
11121             + File.separator + "bin" 
11122             + File.separator);
11123       }
11124     }
11125     
11126     upgradeWebXml(new File(this.untarredWsDir + File.separator + "grouper-ws" 
11127         + File.separator + "build" + File.separator + "dist" + File.separator + "grouper-ws"
11128         + File.separator + "WEB-INF" + File.separator + "web.xml"),
11129             new File(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString 
11130                 + File.separator + "WEB-INF" + File.separator + "web.xml"));
11131     
11132     System.out.println("\n##################################");
11133     System.out.println("Upgrading WS config files\n");
11134 
11135     this.compareUpgradePropertiesFile(this.grouperWsBasePropertiesFile, 
11136         new File(this.untarredWsDir + File.separator + 
11137             "grouper-ws" + File.separator + "build" + File.separator + "dist" + File.separator + "grouper-ws"
11138             + File.separator + "WEB-INF" + File.separator + "classes" + File.separator + "grouper-ws.base.properties"),
11139         this.grouperWsPropertiesFile,
11140         this.grouperWsExamplePropertiesFile, null, "grouperInstaller.autorun.removeRedundantPropetiesFromGrouperWsProperties"
11141       );
11142 
11143     //patch it
11144     this.patchWs();
11145 
11146   }
11147   /**
11148    * get the patches available to apply that are not already applied
11149    * @param thisAppToUpgrade app to upgrade to check
11150    * @return true if up to date, false if not
11151    */
11152   private boolean patchStatus(AppToUpgrade thisAppToUpgrade) {
11153   
11154     if (thisAppToUpgrade == AppToUpgrade.CLIENT) {
11155       throw new RuntimeException("Cant get status on " + thisAppToUpgrade);
11156     }
11157     
11158     Properties patchesExistingProperties = patchExistingProperties();
11159     
11160     String grouperVersion = this.grouperVersionOfJar().toString();
11161     
11162     grouperVersion = GrouperInstallerUtils.replace(grouperVersion, ".", "_");
11163     
11164     boolean foundNewPatch = false;
11165     
11166     OUTER: for (int i=0;i<1000;i++) {
11167       
11168       //grouper_v2_2_1_api_patch_0.state
11169       String keyBase = "grouper_v" + grouperVersion + "_" + thisAppToUpgrade.name().toLowerCase() + "_patch_" + i;
11170       System.out.println("\n################ Checking patch " + keyBase);
11171       String key = keyBase + ".state";
11172   
11173       String value = patchesExistingProperties.getProperty(key);
11174 
11175       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(value)) {
11176 
11177         GrouperInstallerPatchStatus grouperInstallerPatchStatus = GrouperInstallerPatchStatus.valueOfIgnoreCase(value, true, true);
11178 
11179         switch (grouperInstallerPatchStatus) {
11180           case applied:
11181             
11182             System.out.println("Patch: " + keyBase + ": was applied on: " + patchesExistingProperties.getProperty(keyBase + ".date"));
11183             break;
11184             
11185           case skippedPermanently:
11186             
11187             foundNewPatch = true;
11188             System.out.println("Patch: " + keyBase + ": was skipped permanently on: " + patchesExistingProperties.getProperty(keyBase + ".date"));
11189             break;
11190             
11191           case skippedTemporarily:
11192   
11193             foundNewPatch = true;
11194             System.out.println("Patch: " + keyBase + ": was skipped termporarily on: " + patchesExistingProperties.getProperty(keyBase + ".date"));
11195             break;
11196   
11197           case reverted:
11198   
11199             foundNewPatch = true;
11200             System.out.println("Patch: " + keyBase + ": was reverted on: " + patchesExistingProperties.getProperty(keyBase + ".date"));
11201             break;
11202   
11203           case error:
11204   
11205             foundNewPatch = true;
11206             System.out.println("Patch: " + keyBase + ": had an error installing on: " + patchesExistingProperties.getProperty(keyBase + ".date"));
11207             break;
11208   
11209           default:
11210             throw new RuntimeException("Not expecting: " + grouperInstallerPatchStatus);
11211         }
11212         
11213       }
11214   
11215       //lets see if it exists on the server
11216       File patchUntarredDir = downloadAndUnzipPatch(keyBase);
11217       
11218       //if no more patches
11219       if (patchUntarredDir == null) {
11220         System.out.println("");
11221         break OUTER;
11222       }
11223       
11224       //lets get the description:
11225       //  # will show up on screen so user knows what it is
11226       //  description = This patch fixes GRP-1080: browse folders refresh button only works in chrome, not other browsers
11227       //
11228       //  # patches that this patch is dependant on (comma separated)
11229       //  dependencies = 
11230       //
11231       //  # low, medium, or high risk to applying the patch
11232       //  risk = low
11233       //
11234       //  # is this is a security patch (true or false)
11235       //  security = false
11236       //
11237       //  # if this patch requires restart of processes (true or false)
11238       //  requiresRestart = false
11239       Properties patchProperties = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesFromFile(new File(patchUntarredDir.getAbsoluteFile() + File.separator + keyBase + ".properties"));
11240   
11241       foundNewPatch = true;
11242   
11243       // check dependencies
11244       {
11245         String[] dependencies = GrouperInstallerUtils.splitTrim(patchProperties.getProperty("dependencies"), ",");
11246   
11247         for (String dependency : GrouperInstallerUtils.nonNull(dependencies, String.class)) {
11248           if (!this.patchesInstalled.contains(dependency)) {
11249             System.out.println("Cannot install patch " + keyBase + " since it is dependent on a patch which is not installed: " + dependency);
11250           }
11251         }
11252       }
11253       
11254       boolean securityRelated = GrouperInstallerUtils.booleanValue(patchProperties.getProperty("security"), false);
11255       boolean requiresRestart = GrouperInstallerUtils.booleanValue(patchProperties.getProperty("requiresRestart"), true);
11256       
11257       //print description
11258       System.out.println("Patch " + keyBase + " is " + patchProperties.getProperty("risk") + " risk, "
11259           + (securityRelated ? "is a security patch" : "is not a security patch"));
11260       System.out.println("Patch " + keyBase + (requiresRestart ? " requires" : " does not require") + " a restart");
11261       System.out.println(patchProperties.getProperty("description") + "\n");      
11262     }
11263   
11264     if (!foundNewPatch) {
11265       System.out.println("There are no new " + thisAppToUpgrade + " patches to install");
11266       return true;
11267     }
11268     
11269     return false;
11270   }
11271   /**
11272    * build PSPNG
11273    * @param pspngDir
11274    */
11275   private void buildPspng(File pspngDir) {
11276 
11277     if (!pspngDir.exists() || pspngDir.isFile()) {
11278       throw new RuntimeException("Cant find psp: " + pspngDir.getAbsolutePath());
11279     }
11280     
11281     File pspngBuildToDir = new File(pspngDir.getAbsolutePath() 
11282         + File.separator + "target" + File.separator + "classes");
11283     
11284     boolean rebuildPspng = true;
11285     
11286     if (pspngBuildToDir.exists()) {
11287       System.out.print("The PSPNG has been built in the past, do you want it rebuilt? (t|f) [t]: ");
11288       rebuildPspng = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.rebuildPspngAfterHavingBeenBuilt");
11289     }
11290     
11291     if (!rebuildPspng) {
11292       return;
11293     }
11294     
11295     List<String> commands = new ArrayList<String>();
11296     
11297 //    \bin\mvn compile -DskipTests
11298     addMavenCommands(commands);
11299 
11300     //put 'compile -DskipTests' in there so it wont run tests which we dont want to do
11301     // dependency:copy-dependencies package -DskipTests
11302     //not compile
11303     commands.add("dependency:copy-dependencies");
11304     commands.add("package");
11305     commands.add("-DskipTests");
11306     commands.add("-Drat.ignoreErrors=true");
11307     commands.add("-Dlicense.skip=true");
11308         
11309     System.out.println("\n##################################");
11310     System.out.println("Building PSPNG with command:\n" + pspngDir.getAbsolutePath() + "> " 
11311         + convertCommandsIntoCommand(commands) + "\n");
11312 
11313     CommandResult commandResult = GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(GrouperInstallerUtils.toArray(commands, String.class),
11314         true, true, null, new File(pspngDir.getAbsolutePath()), null, true);
11315     
11316     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getErrorText())) {
11317       System.out.println("stderr: " + commandResult.getErrorText());
11318     }
11319     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getOutputText())) {
11320       System.out.println("stdout: " + commandResult.getOutputText());
11321     }
11322 
11323     System.out.println("\nEnd building PSPNG");
11324     System.out.println("##################################\n");
11325     
11326   }
11327 
11328   /**
11329    * 
11330    * @param grouperCacheBasePropertiesFile 
11331    * @param grouperCachePropertiesFile
11332    * @param ehcacheXmlUrl
11333    */
11334   public static void convertEhcacheXmlToProperties(File grouperCacheBasePropertiesFile, File grouperCachePropertiesFile, URL ehcacheXmlUrl) {
11335 
11336     //look at base properties
11337     Properties grouperCacheProperties = grouperCachePropertiesFile.exists() ? 
11338         GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesFromFile(grouperCachePropertiesFile) : new Properties();
11339 
11340     if (!grouperCacheBasePropertiesFile.exists()) {
11341       throw new RuntimeException(grouperCacheBasePropertiesFile.getAbsolutePath() + " must exist and does not!");
11342     }
11343     
11344     if (grouperCacheProperties.size() > 0) {
11345       throw new RuntimeException(grouperCachePropertiesFile.getAbsolutePath() + " exists and must not.  Delete the file and run this again!");
11346     }
11347 
11348     if (!grouperCachePropertiesFile.getParentFile().exists() || !grouperCachePropertiesFile.getParentFile().isDirectory()) {
11349       throw new RuntimeException(grouperCachePropertiesFile.getParentFile().getAbsolutePath() + " must exist and must be a directory");
11350     }
11351     
11352     //look at base properties
11353     Properties grouperCacheBaseProperties = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesFromFile(grouperCacheBasePropertiesFile);
11354     
11355     StringBuilder grouperEhcachePropertiesContents = new StringBuilder();
11356     
11357     grouperEhcachePropertiesContents.append(
11358               "# Copyright 2016 Internet2\n"
11359             + "#\n"
11360             + "# Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the \"License\");\n"
11361             + "# you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.\n"
11362             + "# You may obtain a copy of the License at\n"
11363             + "#\n"
11364             + "#   http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0\n"
11365             + "#\n"
11366             + "# Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software\n"
11367             + "# distributed under the License is distributed on an \"AS IS\" BASIS,\n"
11368             + "# WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.\n"
11369             + "# See the License for the specific language governing permissions and\n"
11370             + "# limitations under the License.\n"
11371             + "\n"
11372             + "#\n"
11373             + "# Grouper Cache Configuration\n"
11374             + "#\n"
11375             + "\n"
11376             + "# The grouper cache config uses Grouper Configuration Overlays (documented on wiki)\n"
11377             + "# By default the configuration is read from grouper.cache.base.properties\n"
11378             + "# (which should not be edited), and the grouper.cache.properties overlays\n"
11379             + "# the base settings.  See the grouper.cache.base.properties for the possible\n"
11380             + "# settings that can be applied to the grouper.cache.properties\n\n"
11381         );
11382 
11383     {
11384       // <diskStore path="java.io.tmpdir"/>
11385       NodeList diskStoreNodeList = GrouperInstallerUtils.xpathEvaluate(ehcacheXmlUrl, "/ehcache/diskStore");
11386       if (diskStoreNodeList.getLength() != 1) {
11387         throw new RuntimeException("Expecting one diskStore element");
11388       }
11389   
11390       Element element = (Element)diskStoreNodeList.item(0);
11391 
11392       NamedNodeMap configuredNamedNodeMap = element.getAttributes();
11393       if (configuredNamedNodeMap.getLength() != 1 || !"path".equals(configuredNamedNodeMap.item(0).getNodeName())) {
11394         throw new RuntimeException("Expecting one diskStore attribute: path");
11395       }
11396       
11397       String path = element.getAttribute("path");
11398       
11399       if (!"java.io.tmpdir".equals(path)) {
11400         grouperEhcachePropertiesContents.append("grouper.cache.diskStorePath = " + path + "\n\n");
11401       }
11402       
11403     }    
11404 
11405     {
11406       //  <defaultCache
11407       //    maxElementsInMemory="1000"
11408       //    eternal="false"
11409       //    timeToIdleSeconds="10"
11410       //    timeToLiveSeconds="10"
11411       //    overflowToDisk="false"
11412       //    statistics="false"
11413       //  />
11414       
11415       NodeList diskStoreNodeList = GrouperInstallerUtils.xpathEvaluate(ehcacheXmlUrl, "/ehcache/defaultCache");
11416       if (diskStoreNodeList.getLength() != 1) {
11417         throw new RuntimeException("Expecting one defaultCache element");
11418       }
11419   
11420       Element element = (Element)diskStoreNodeList.item(0);
11421 
11422       NamedNodeMap configuredNamedNodeMap = element.getAttributes();
11423       
11424       if (configuredNamedNodeMap.getLength() != 6) {
11425         throw new RuntimeException("Expecting defaultCache with these attributes: maxElementsInMemory, "
11426             + "eternal, timeToIdleSeconds, timeToLiveSeconds, overflowToDisk, statistics");
11427       }
11428 
11429       boolean madeChanges = false;
11430       
11431       for (int i=0;i<configuredNamedNodeMap.getLength(); i++) {
11432         
11433         String attributeName = configuredNamedNodeMap.item(i).getNodeName();
11434         String value = element.getAttribute(attributeName);
11435 
11436         if ("maxElementsInMemory".equals(attributeName)) {
11437           if (!"1000".equals(value)) {
11438             grouperEhcachePropertiesContents.append("cache.defaultCache.maxElementsInMemory = " + value + "\n");
11439             madeChanges = true;
11440           }
11441         } else if ("eternal".equals(attributeName)) {
11442           if (!"false".equals(value)) {
11443             grouperEhcachePropertiesContents.append("cache.defaultCache.eternal = " + value + "\n");
11444             madeChanges = true;
11445           }
11446         } else if ("timeToIdleSeconds".equals(attributeName)) {
11447           if (!"10".equals(value)) {
11448             grouperEhcachePropertiesContents.append("cache.defaultCache.timeToIdleSeconds = " + value + "\n");
11449             madeChanges = true;
11450           }
11451           
11452         } else if ("timeToLiveSeconds".equals(attributeName)) {
11453           if (!"10".equals(value)) {
11454             grouperEhcachePropertiesContents.append("cache.defaultCache.timeToLiveSeconds = " + value + "\n");
11455             madeChanges = true;
11456           }
11457           
11458         } else if ("overflowToDisk".equals(attributeName)) {
11459           if (!"false".equals(value)) {
11460             grouperEhcachePropertiesContents.append("cache.defaultCache.overflowToDisk = " + value + "\n");
11461             madeChanges = true;
11462           }
11463           
11464         } else if ("statistics".equals(attributeName)) {
11465           if (!"false".equals(value)) {
11466             grouperEhcachePropertiesContents.append("cache.defaultCache.statistics = " + value + "\n");
11467             madeChanges = true;
11468           }
11469           
11470         } else {
11471           throw new RuntimeException("Not expecting attribuet defaultCache " + attributeName);
11472         }
11473       }
11474 
11475       if (madeChanges) {
11476         grouperEhcachePropertiesContents.append("\n");
11477       }
11478       
11479     }
11480     
11481     NodeList nodeList = GrouperInstallerUtils.xpathEvaluate(ehcacheXmlUrl, "/ehcache/cache");
11482     
11483     Set<String> usedKeys = new HashSet<String>();
11484     
11485     for (int i=0;i<nodeList.getLength();i++) {
11486       
11487       Element element = (Element)nodeList.item(i);
11488 
11489       //  <cache  name="edu.internet2.middleware.grouper.internal.dao.hib3.Hib3MemberDAO.FindBySubject"
11490       //      maxElementsInMemory="5000"
11491       //      eternal="false"
11492       //      timeToIdleSeconds="5"
11493       //      timeToLiveSeconds="10"
11494       //      overflowToDisk="false"  
11495       //      statistics="false"
11496       //  />
11497       
11498       String name = element.getAttribute("name");
11499       Integer maxElementsInMemory = GrouperInstallerUtils.intObjectValue(element.getAttribute("maxElementsInMemory"), true);
11500       Boolean eternal = GrouperInstallerUtils.booleanObjectValue(element.getAttribute("eternal"));
11501       Integer timeToIdleSeconds = GrouperInstallerUtils.intObjectValue(element.getAttribute("timeToIdleSeconds"), true);
11502       Integer timeToLiveSeconds = GrouperInstallerUtils.intObjectValue(element.getAttribute("timeToLiveSeconds"), true);
11503       Boolean overflowToDisk = GrouperInstallerUtils.booleanObjectValue(element.getAttribute("overflowToDisk"));
11504       Boolean statistics = GrouperInstallerUtils.booleanObjectValue(element.getAttribute("statistics"));
11505 
11506       //any attributes we dont expect?
11507       NamedNodeMap configuredNamedNodeMap = element.getAttributes();
11508       //see which attributes are new or changed
11509       for (int j=0;j<configuredNamedNodeMap.getLength();j++) {
11510         Node configuredAttribute = configuredNamedNodeMap.item(j);
11511         if (!configuredAttribute.getNodeName().equals("name")
11512             && !configuredAttribute.getNodeName().equals("maxElementsInMemory")
11513             && !configuredAttribute.getNodeName().equals("eternal")
11514             && !configuredAttribute.getNodeName().equals("timeToIdleSeconds")
11515             && !configuredAttribute.getNodeName().equals("timeToLiveSeconds")
11516             && !configuredAttribute.getNodeName().equals("overflowToDisk")
11517             && !configuredAttribute.getNodeName().equals("statistics")) {
11518           throw new RuntimeException("Cant process attribute: '" + configuredAttribute.getNodeName() + "'");
11519         }
11520       }
11521       
11522       String key = convertEhcacheNameToPropertiesKey(name, usedKeys);
11523       
11524       //  cache.name.edu_internet2_middleware_grouper_internal_dao_hib3_Hib3GroupDAO.name = edu.internet2.middleware.grouper.internal.dao.hib3.Hib3GroupDAO
11525       //  cache.name.edu_internet2_middleware_grouper_internal_dao_hib3_Hib3GroupDAO.maxElementsInMemory = 500
11526       //  cache.name.edu_internet2_middleware_grouper_internal_dao_hib3_Hib3GroupDAO.eternal = false
11527       //  cache.name.edu_internet2_middleware_grouper_internal_dao_hib3_Hib3GroupDAO.timeToIdleSeconds = 1
11528       //  cache.name.edu_internet2_middleware_grouper_internal_dao_hib3_Hib3GroupDAO.timeToLiveSeconds = 1
11529       //  cache.name.edu_internet2_middleware_grouper_internal_dao_hib3_Hib3GroupDAO.overflowToDisk = false
11530       //  cache.name.edu_internet2_middleware_grouper_internal_dao_hib3_Hib3GroupDAO.statistics = false
11531 
11532       boolean madeChanges = false;
11533       
11534       if (maxElementsInMemory != null && !GrouperInstallerUtils.defaultString((String)grouperCacheBaseProperties.get("cache.name." + key + ".maxElementsInMemory")).equals(maxElementsInMemory.toString())) {
11535         grouperEhcachePropertiesContents.append("cache.name." + key + ".maxElementsInMemory = " + maxElementsInMemory + "\n");
11536         madeChanges = true;
11537       }
11538       if (eternal != null && !GrouperInstallerUtils.defaultString((String)grouperCacheBaseProperties.get("cache.name." + key + ".eternal")).equals(eternal.toString())) {
11539         grouperEhcachePropertiesContents.append("cache.name." + key + ".eternal = " + eternal + "\n");
11540         madeChanges = true;
11541       }
11542       if (timeToIdleSeconds != null && !GrouperInstallerUtils.defaultString((String)grouperCacheBaseProperties.get("cache.name." + key + ".timeToIdleSeconds")).equals(timeToIdleSeconds.toString())) {
11543         grouperEhcachePropertiesContents.append("cache.name." + key + ".timeToIdleSeconds = " + timeToIdleSeconds + "\n");
11544         madeChanges = true;
11545       }
11546       if (timeToLiveSeconds != null && !GrouperInstallerUtils.defaultString((String)grouperCacheBaseProperties.get("cache.name." + key + ".timeToLiveSeconds")).equals(timeToLiveSeconds.toString())) {
11547         grouperEhcachePropertiesContents.append("cache.name." + key + ".timeToLiveSeconds = " + timeToLiveSeconds + "\n");
11548         madeChanges = true;
11549       }
11550       if (overflowToDisk != null && !GrouperInstallerUtils.defaultString((String)grouperCacheBaseProperties.get("cache.name." + key + ".overflowToDisk")).equals(overflowToDisk.toString())) {
11551         grouperEhcachePropertiesContents.append("cache.name." + key + ".overflowToDisk = " + overflowToDisk + "\n");
11552         madeChanges = true;
11553       }
11554       if (statistics != null && !GrouperInstallerUtils.defaultString((String)grouperCacheBaseProperties.get("cache.name." + key + ".statistics")).equals(statistics.toString())) {
11555         grouperEhcachePropertiesContents.append("cache.name." + key + ".statistics = " + statistics + "\n");
11556         madeChanges = true;
11557       }
11558       if (madeChanges) {
11559         grouperEhcachePropertiesContents.append("\n");
11560       }
11561     }
11562   
11563     GrouperInstallerUtils.saveStringIntoFile(grouperCachePropertiesFile, grouperEhcachePropertiesContents.toString());
11564   }
11565 
11566   /**
11567    * edit an xml file attribute in a xml file
11568    * @param file
11569    * @param elementName
11570    * @param elementMustHaveAttributeAndValue
11571    * @param newValue
11572    * @param description of change for sys out print
11573    * @param newAttributeName if adding new attribute, this is the name
11574    * @return true if edited file, or false if not but didnt need to, null if not found
11575    */
11576   public static Boolean editXmlFileAttribute(File file, String elementName, Map<String, String> elementMustHaveAttributeAndValue, 
11577       String newAttributeName, String newValue, String description) {
11578 
11579     if (!file.exists() || file.length() == 0) {
11580       throw new RuntimeException("Why does " + file.getName() + " not exist and have contents? " 
11581           + file.getAbsolutePath());
11582     }
11583     
11584     String fileContents = GrouperInstallerUtils.readFileIntoString(file);
11585     
11586     boolean inComment = false;
11587     
11588     //lets parse the file and get to the element
11589     OUTER: for (int i=0;i<fileContents.length();i++) {
11590       
11591       //look for start element
11592       char curChar = fileContents.charAt(i);
11593 
11594       Character nextChar = (i+1) < fileContents.length() ? fileContents.charAt(i+1) : null;
11595       Character nextNextChar = (i+2) < fileContents.length() ? fileContents.charAt(i+2) : null;
11596       Character nextNextNextChar = (i+3) < fileContents.length() ? fileContents.charAt(i+3) : null;
11597       
11598       //if we are in comment, see when we are out of comment
11599       if (inComment) {
11600         if (curChar == '-' && nextChar != null && nextChar == '-' && nextNextChar != null && nextNextChar == '>') {
11601           inComment = false;
11602         }
11603         continue;
11604         
11605       }
11606 
11607       //look for a tag or comment
11608       if (curChar != '<') {
11609         continue;
11610       }
11611       
11612       //see if this is a comment
11613       if (nextChar != null && nextChar == '!' && nextNextChar != null && nextNextChar == '-' && nextNextNextChar != null && nextNextNextChar == '-') {
11614         inComment = true;
11615         continue;
11616       }
11617 
11618       //get tagName
11619       String currentElementName = _internalXmlTagName(fileContents, i+1);
11620       
11621       //not the right tag
11622       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(currentElementName, elementName)) {
11623         continue;
11624       }
11625       
11626       int tagNameStart = fileContents.indexOf(currentElementName, i+1);
11627       
11628       //get the attributes
11629       int tagAttributesStart = tagNameStart + currentElementName.length();
11630       XmlParseAttributesResult xmlParseAttributesResult = _internalXmlParseAttributes(fileContents, tagAttributesStart);
11631       Map<String, String> currentAttributes = xmlParseAttributesResult.getAttributes();
11632       
11633       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.length(elementMustHaveAttributeAndValue) > 0) {
11634         for (String attributeName : elementMustHaveAttributeAndValue.keySet()) {
11635           String expectedValue = elementMustHaveAttributeAndValue.get(attributeName);
11636           String hasValue = currentAttributes.get(attributeName);
11637 
11638           //if we dont have that value, then keep going
11639           if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(expectedValue, hasValue)) {
11640             continue OUTER;
11641           }
11642         }
11643       }
11644       
11645       //we have the tag and it has the expected attributes
11646 
11647       //see if the attribute is even there...
11648       if (!currentAttributes.containsKey(newAttributeName)) {
11649         System.out.println(" - adding " + description + " with value: '" + newValue + "'");
11650         String newFileContents = fileContents.substring(0, tagAttributesStart) + " " + newAttributeName + "=\"" + newValue + 
11651             "\" " + fileContents.substring(tagAttributesStart, fileContents.length());
11652         GrouperInstallerUtils.writeStringToFile(file, newFileContents);
11653         return true;
11654       }
11655 
11656       //does it already have the value?
11657       String currentValue = currentAttributes.get(newAttributeName);
11658       
11659       //value is already there
11660       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(currentValue, newValue)) {
11661         return false;
11662       }
11663 
11664       //it has the wrong value
11665       int startQuote = xmlParseAttributesResult.getAttributeStartIndex().get(newAttributeName);
11666       int endQuote = xmlParseAttributesResult.getAttributeEndIndex().get(newAttributeName);
11667 
11668       System.out.println(" - changing " + description + " from old value: '" + currentValue 
11669           + "' to new value: '" + newValue + "'");
11670 
11671       String newFileContents = fileContents.substring(0, startQuote+1)  + newValue + 
11672           fileContents.substring(endQuote, fileContents.length());
11673       GrouperInstallerUtils.writeStringToFile(file, newFileContents);
11674       return true;
11675 
11676     }
11677 
11678     return null;
11679 
11680   }
11681 
11682   /**
11683    * 
11684    * @param fileContents
11685    * @param tagIndexStart
11686    * @return the tag name
11687    */
11688   private static String _internalXmlTagName(String fileContents, int tagIndexStart) {
11689     StringBuilder tagName = new StringBuilder();
11690     for (int i=tagIndexStart; i<fileContents.length(); i++) {
11691       char curChar = fileContents.charAt(i);
11692       if (tagName.length() == 0 && Character.isWhitespace(curChar)) {
11693         continue;
11694       }
11695       if (Character.isWhitespace(curChar) || '/' == curChar || '>' == curChar) {
11696         return tagName.toString();
11697       }
11698       tagName.append(curChar);
11699     }
11700     throw new RuntimeException("How did I get here???? '" + tagName.toString() + "'");
11701   }
11702   
11703   /**
11704    * xml parse attribute result
11705    */
11706   private static class XmlParseAttributesResult {
11707 
11708     /**
11709      * attributes name to value
11710      */
11711     private Map<String, String> attributes;
11712     
11713     /**
11714      * attribute name to startIndex (of quote)
11715      */
11716     private Map<String, Integer> attributeStartIndex;
11717 
11718     /**
11719      * attribute name to endIndex (of quote)
11720      */
11721     private Map<String, Integer> attributeEndIndex;
11722 
11723     
11724     /**
11725      * attributes name to value
11726      * @return the attributes
11727      */
11728     public Map<String, String> getAttributes() {
11729       return this.attributes;
11730     }
11731 
11732     
11733     /**
11734      * attributes name to value
11735      * @param attributes1 the attributes to set
11736      */
11737     public void setAttributes(Map<String, String> attributes1) {
11738       this.attributes = attributes1;
11739     }
11740 
11741     
11742     /**
11743      * attribute name to startIndex (of quote)
11744      * @return the attributeStartIndex
11745      */
11746     public Map<String, Integer> getAttributeStartIndex() {
11747       return this.attributeStartIndex;
11748     }
11749     
11750     /**
11751      * attribute name to startIndex (of quote)
11752      * @param attributeStartIndex1 the attributeStartIndex to set
11753      */
11754     public void setAttributeStartIndex(Map<String, Integer> attributeStartIndex1) {
11755       this.attributeStartIndex = attributeStartIndex1;
11756     }
11757     
11758     /**
11759      * attribute name to endIndex (of quote)
11760      * @return the attributeEndIndex
11761      */
11762     public Map<String, Integer> getAttributeEndIndex() {
11763       return this.attributeEndIndex;
11764     }
11765     
11766     /**
11767      * attribute name to endIndex (of quote)
11768      * @param attributeEndIndex1 the attributeEndIndex to set
11769      */
11770     public void setAttributeEndIndex(Map<String, Integer> attributeEndIndex1) {
11771       this.attributeEndIndex = attributeEndIndex1;
11772     }
11773     
11774   }
11775 
11776   /**
11777    * 
11778    */
11779   public static enum GrouperInstallerAdminManageServiceAction {
11780   
11781     /** start */
11782     start,
11783     
11784     /** stop */
11785     stop,
11786     
11787     /** restart */
11788     restart,
11789     
11790     /** status */
11791     status;
11792     
11793     /**
11794      * 
11795      * @param string
11796      * @param exceptionIfInvalid
11797      * @param exceptionIfBlank
11798      * @return the action
11799      */
11800     public static GrouperInstallerAdminManageServiceAction valueOfIgnoreCase(String string, boolean exceptionIfBlank, boolean exceptionIfInvalid) {
11801       return GrouperInstallerUtils.enumValueOfIgnoreCase(GrouperInstallerAdminManageServiceAction.class, string, exceptionIfBlank, exceptionIfInvalid);
11802     }
11803     
11804   }
11805 
11806   /**
11807    * parse attributes
11808    * @param fileContents
11809    * @param tagAttributesStart is the index where the attributes start
11810    * @return the map of attribute names and values
11811    */
11812   private static XmlParseAttributesResult _internalXmlParseAttributes(String fileContents, int tagAttributesStart) {
11813 
11814     XmlParseAttributesResult xmlParseAttributesResult = new XmlParseAttributesResult();
11815 
11816     Map<String, String> attributes = new LinkedHashMap<String, String>();
11817     Map<String, Integer> attributeStartIndex = new LinkedHashMap<String, Integer>();
11818     Map<String, Integer> attributeEndIndex = new LinkedHashMap<String, Integer>();
11819 
11820     xmlParseAttributesResult.setAttributes(attributes);
11821     xmlParseAttributesResult.setAttributeStartIndex(attributeStartIndex);
11822     xmlParseAttributesResult.setAttributeEndIndex(attributeEndIndex);
11823     
11824     boolean inAttributeStartValue = false;
11825     boolean inAttributeStartName = true;
11826     boolean inAttributeName = false;
11827     boolean inAttributeValue = false;
11828     
11829     StringBuilder attributeName = null;
11830     StringBuilder attributeValue = null;
11831     
11832     for (int i=tagAttributesStart; i<fileContents.length(); i++) {
11833       char curChar = fileContents.charAt(i);
11834       boolean isWhitespace = Character.isWhitespace(curChar);
11835 
11836       //waiting for the attribute
11837       if ((inAttributeStartValue || inAttributeStartName) && isWhitespace) {
11838         continue;
11839       }
11840 
11841       //if waiting for value and equals, keep looking
11842       if (inAttributeStartValue && curChar == '=') {
11843         continue;
11844       }
11845 
11846       //waiting to start an attribute name, its not whitespace so do it
11847       if (inAttributeStartName) {
11848         
11849         //we done if we got to this character
11850         if (curChar == '/' || curChar == '>') {
11851           return xmlParseAttributesResult;
11852         }
11853         
11854         inAttributeStartName = false;
11855         inAttributeName = true;
11856         attributeName = new StringBuilder();
11857       }
11858 
11859       //if in an attribute name and whitespace or equals, then we are done
11860       if (inAttributeName && (isWhitespace || curChar == '=' )) {
11861         inAttributeName = false;
11862         inAttributeStartValue = true;
11863         continue;
11864       }
11865 
11866       //getting the attribute name
11867       if (inAttributeName) {
11868         attributeName.append(curChar);
11869         continue;
11870       }
11871 
11872       //if waiting for start value and found quote
11873       if (inAttributeStartValue && curChar == '"') {
11874         inAttributeStartValue = false;
11875         inAttributeValue = true;
11876         attributeValue = new StringBuilder();
11877         attributeStartIndex.put(attributeName.toString(), i);
11878         continue;
11879       }
11880 
11881       //if in attribute value and not quote, append the char
11882       if (inAttributeValue && curChar != '"') {
11883         attributeValue.append(curChar);
11884         continue;
11885       }
11886 
11887       //done with attribute value
11888       if (inAttributeValue && curChar == '"') {
11889         inAttributeValue = false;
11890         inAttributeStartName = true;
11891         if (attributes.containsKey(attributeName.toString())) {
11892           throw new RuntimeException("Duplicate attribute: " + attributeName.toString());
11893         }
11894         attributes.put(attributeName.toString(), attributeValue.toString());
11895         attributeEndIndex.put(attributeName.toString(), i);
11896         continue;
11897       }
11898 
11899       throw new RuntimeException("Why are we here? " + i + ", " + fileContents);
11900     }
11901     return xmlParseAttributesResult;
11902   }
11903   
11904 }
Copyright © 2016 Internet2. All rights reserved.
